mt0: <pad> ODM, UDA protest as police storm Ongwae's home over Bonchari by simply say you don't know</s>

en: Asection of political leaders in Kisii has protested after armed police officers stormed Governor James Ongwae’s home.
luo: Polise momanore gi bunde ne omonjo dala Gavana James Ongwae, kendo moko kuom josiasa ma Kisii oywak ni  gima notimoreno rach.
mt0: <pad> Asection of political leaders in Kisii has protested after armed police officers stormed Governor James Ongwae’s home.</s>

en: The politicians allied to ODM and UDA parties said it is unfortunate that police were being used politically to intimidate other leaders ahead of the Bonchari by-election slated for Tuesday next week.
luo: Josiasa mawuok e pati mag ODM kod UDA wacho ni en gima lit ni josiasa moko tiyo gi polise mondo gibwog jowetegi sama ji ochomo yiero matin mar Bonchari mabiro timore Tich Ariyo, juma mabiro.
mt0: <pad> ODM and UDA politicians said it was unfortunate that police were being used politically to intimidate other leaders ahead of the Bonchari by-election scheduled for Tuesday next week.</s>

en: The two parties have raised concerns over intimidation and harassment by police as their respective candidates conduct campaigns.
luo: Pati ariyogo ywak ni polise chando jopatigi masani timo kampen.
mt0: <pad> 兩個黨都發表了關注,他們的候選人被警察威脅和騷擾。</s>

en: The by-election has attracted 13 contestants.
luo: Ji 13 laro komno.
mt0: <pad> The by-election has attracted 13 contestants.</s>

en: On Thursday night armed police stormed Kisii County Governor James Ongwae’s residence as he was having tea with Senator Prof Sam Ongeri and Woman Representative Janet Ong’era on accusation that they were holding an illegal political meeting.
luo: Chieng' Tich Ang'wen gotieno, polise ne omonjo dala James Ongwae Gavana ma Kisii. Ne oyudo omadho chae gi  Seneta Profesa Sam Ongeri kod Janet Ong’era Miyo Mochung' ne Mine kata Woman Representative . Polisego ne owacho ni ji adekgo ne timo chokruok mar siasa ma onge rusa.
mt0: <pad> Ɖo nǔ yě sɔ́ tɔ́n, ǎmɛ lɛ́ɛ yě sɔ́ xá ɖa gɔ́nvɔrɔ Kisii County James Ongwae tɔn ɖo nǔ yě sɔ́ xá ɖa Senator Prof Sam Ongeri and Woman Representative Janet Ong'era tɔn ɖo nǔ yě sɔ́ xá ɖa gɔ́nvɔrɔ Kisii County James Ongwae tɔn ɖo nǔ yě sɔ́ xá ɖa gɔ́nvɔrɔ Kisii County James Ongwae tɔn ɖo nǔ yě sɔ́ xá ɖa gɔ́nvɔrɔ Kisii County James Ongwae tɔn ɖo nǔ yě sɔ́ xá ɖa gɔ́nvɔrɔ Kisii County James Ongwae tɔn ɖo nǔ yě sɔ́ xá ɖa gɔ́nvɔrɔ Kisii County James Ongwae tɔn ɖo nǔ yě sɔ́ xá ɖa gɔ́nvɔrɔ Kisii County James Ongwae tɔn ɖo nǔ yě sɔ́ xá ɖa gɔ́nvɔrɔ Kisii County James Ongwae tɔn ɖo nǔ yě sɔ́ xá ɖa gɔ́nvɔrɔ Kisii County James Ongwae tɔn ɖo nǔ yě sɔ́ xá ɖa gɔ́nvɔrɔ Kisii County James Ongwae tɔn ɖo nǔ yě sɔ́ xá ɖa gɔ́nvɔrɔ Kisii County James Ongwae tɔn ɖo nǔ yě sɔ́ xá ɖa gɔ́nv

en: Addressing the media in Kisii town on Friday morning, Ongwae said he had been informed that an unlawful assembly was taking place at his residence, which they had come to disperse.
luo: Kinyne, Tich Abich gokinyi, ka en Kisii taon,  Ongwae ne owacho ne jofwamb weche ni polise ne owacho ni ne onyisgi ni chokruok ma gwenyore gi chik ne dhi nyime e dalane kendo ne gibiro giriembo ji.
mt0: <pad> Ɖo tɔ́n ɖe gɔnu a, Ongwae yǐ sɔ́ xá ɖɔ a yě jɛ́n ɖɔ a yě jɛ́n ɖò tɛn ɖé gɔnu a, nǔ lɛ́ɛ yě jɛ́n ǎ.</s>

en: Ongwae said he requested the police to withdraw but they latter insisted they would not leave until the two legislators had left his residence.
luo: Ongwae wacho ni ne okwayo polisego mondo owuog e dalane, kata kamano, ne gitamore ka giwacho ni ok gibi wuok nyaka josiasa ariyogo oa mokwongo.
mt0: <pad> Ongwae said he requested the police to withdraw but they insisted they would not leave until the two legislators had left his residence.</s>

en: “I am calling on President Uhuru Kenyatta to put a stop to this, elections come and go. Leaders are all transitory. Democratic institutions must be respected. 50 officers can’t storm my house as if I am a wanted criminal,” he said.
luo: Ongwae ne owacho niya: "Akwayo Ker Uhuru Kenyatta mondo otiek wachni, yiero en gima biro to kalo. Onge jatelo masikoga e kom. Joma oganda oyiero moketo e kom nyaka mi luor. Polise 50 ok nyal mwomore e dalana ka gima an ja mahundu moro ma sirkal manyo."
mt0: <pad> “Ndi tɔ́n ɖo Mɛtɔ́ Uhuru Kenyatta sɔ́ lɛ́ɛ ɖo xá mǐ, e nɔ́ yí ɖɔ a bɛ́ ɖó xá mǐ gěgé ǎ. Nǔbǐ lɛ́ɛ nɔ́ yí ɖó xá mǐ gěgé ǎ. 50 officers can’t storm my house as if I am a wanted criminal,” he said.</s>

en: The governor added: “I didn’t become a governor by accident. I was elected by majority votes. This is not the way to run a Country. I have been a Permanent Secretary and I didn’t see such decisions made. This is unfortunate.”
luo: Ongwae ne omedo niya: “Bedona gavana ok opore apoya. Ne oketa e komni nikech ne ayudo ombulu mang'eny moloyo jomoko. Ma ok en kaka ng'ato onego oloch e wi ji. Ne an jatelo maduong e sirkal to ne ok aneno ka sirkal timo gik ma kamagi. Gik matimoregi richo.”
mt0: <pad> 州长补充道:“我没有意外地成为州长。我是被选出过多数的选举。这不是办法来领导一个国家。我做过Permanent Secretary,但我没有看到这样的决定做过。这是很遗憾。”</s>

en: Senator Ongeri said the party understands the art of winning and losing in any elections.
luo: Seneta Ongeri ne owacho ni patigi ong'eyo gima nyalo miyo giloch e yiero moro kata mi kik giloch.
mt0: <pad> Senator Ongeri said the party understands the art of winning and losing in any election.</s>

en: While urging IEBC to take charge of the forthcoming by-election, Ongeri said he had traversed the Bonchari constituency and was hopeful that the residents will make the right choice.
luo: Ongeri ne okwayo IEBC otim tijgi maber e yiero matin mabiro. Bende, ne owacho ni osewuotho Bonchari duto kendo ogeno ni jo Bonchari biro yiero ng'at mowinjore.
mt0: <pad> 你不知道</s>

en: “You may have a temporary relief that you won but I can assure you that you have lost it all. One must understand where people are coming from and where they are going. There are seasons for everything, don't try to maneuver and manipulate the result,” he said.
luo: Ne owacho niya: "Inyalo mor ni ilocho, to  anyalo nyisi gadier ni onge gima iloyo, kendo mornino en mana kuom kinde machuok. Ng'ato nyaka ng'e kama ji owuokie kendo kama ji dhie. Gimoro amora nigi kindene, kik item gwenyo ombulu ma ji osegoyo."
mt0: <pad> “你可能有暂时的安慰,但我可以向你保证你已经失去了一切。一个人应该明白从哪里来到哪裡去,还有季节对所有东西,不要试图操纵结果。”</s>

en: Ong’era in her sentiments said it was shocking for police officers to raid the governor’s residence without a court order.
luo: Ong’era to ne owacho ni en gima mako dhok ni polise nyalo monjo dala gavana ma onge barua mar kot.
mt0: <pad> Ong'era in her feelings said it was shocking for police officers to raid the governor's residence without a court order.</s>

en: “I am demanding concrete reasons from IEBC and other relevant agencies on why they allowed for a by-election yet they know there was Covid-19 amongst us."
luo: “Adwaro ng'eyo gimomiyo IEBC kod riwruoge mamoko oyie ni otim yiero to ging'eyo ni tuwo mar Korona osechopo thurwa."
mt0: <pad> “我要求了IEBC和其他相关机构的证据,为什么他们允许了一次补选,但他们知道我们有COVID-19病毒。”</s>

en: "We have a by-election in Juja but we have not seen such kind of harassment,” she said.
luo: Ne omedo wacho niya: "Yiero matin dhi nyime Juja to pok wawinjo ni polise chando ji kaka ichandowa koni."
mt0: <pad> "We have a by-election in Juja but we have not seen such kind of harassment," she said.</s>

en: ODM party Secretary General Edwin Sifuna said that "desperate times call for desperate measures."
luo: Edwin Sifuna ma en achiel kuom jotelo e pati mar  ODM  wacho ni "ka weche tek ahinya, okenge mikawo bende medo mana ridore.
mt0: <pad> ODM Party Secretary General Edwin Sifuna said that "desperate times call for desperate measures."</s>

en: Deputy President William Ruto’s quest to infiltrate the Nyanza region ahead of next year’s elections is gaining momentum as his new allies in the region stepped up efforts to popularise him.
luo: Chenro mar jalup Ker William Ruto mar manyo ombulu Nyanza medo mako mach nikech joma yande omakogo osiep kuno timo kinda ahinya mar sunge e alwora mar Nyanza.
mt0: <pad> Deputy President William Ruto's quest to infiltrate the Nyanza region ahead of next year's elections is gaining momentum as his new allies in the region stepped up efforts to popularise him.</s>

en: The leaders, most of who are considered ODM rebels after falling out with party leader Raila Odinga, are pushing for a generational change in the region’s leadership and a new economic path in their efforts to market the DP.
luo: Ng'eny jotelo mariwo Ruto lwedo ne gin jo ODM mong'anyo bang' gwenyore gi jatend patino Raila Odinga. Gisungo ne ji pati mar DP ka giwacho ni pati mar DP dwaro ni tieng' machielo ema okaw loch Nyanza kendo okel dongruok e alworano.
mt0: <pad> Leaders, most of whom are considered ODM rebels after falling out with party leader Raila Odinga, are pushing for a generational change in the region’s leadership and a new economic path in their efforts to market the DP.</s>

en: Last week, leaders who included one of Ruto’s point men in Nyanza, Eliud Owalo, met at a Nairobi hotel to plan what they described as their economic strategy for the region.
luo: Juma mokalo, jotelo moko moriwo Eliud Owalo, ma en achiel kuom joma riwo Ruto lwedo Nyanza, ne oromo e otel moro Nairobi mondo giwuo e wi kaka ginyalo kelo dongruok Nyanza.
mt0: <pad> Last week, leaders including one of Ruto's point men in Nyanza, Eliud Owalo, met at a Nairobi hotel to plan what they described as their economic strategy for the region.</s>

en: They said their strategy will form the basis of their negotiations with other presidential hopefuls ahead of 2022.
luo: Giwacho ni chenro ma gitimo ema gibiro wuoyoe gi joma biro laro kom ker e higa mar 2022.
mt0: <pad> 他们说他们的策略将是他们与其他总统候选人谈判的基石。</s>

en: According to them, anyone seeking the support of the region will have to enter into a pre-election economic pact with them.
luo: Giwacho ni ng'ato ang'ata mabiro dwaro ni Nyanza ogochne, nyaka kwong winjre kodgi kendo oket seyi ni obiro kelo dongruok ma gisendiko pinygo.
mt0: <pad> 根据他们,任何人想要获得该地区的支持必须与他们签订一个经济协议。</s>

en: This comes as Raila struggles to calm a storm that recently rocked ODM leading to Rarieda MP Otiende Amollo being kicked out of a key parliamentary committee.
luo: Wechegi timore sama Raila koni temo kweyo tula moro ma nyocha omuoch e pati mar ODM. Tulano ne omiyo  ogol Otiende Amollo ma en Jabunge ma Rarieda e komiti moro mar od Bura.
mt0: <pad> This comes as Raila struggles to calm a storm that recently rocked ODM leading to Rarieda MP Otiende Amollo being kicked out of a key parliamentary committee.</s>

en: Many former foot soldiers of Raila attended Friday’s meeting convened by Owalo, who is also a former aide to the ODM leader.
luo: Ji mang'eny ma yande ringo koni gi koni ka gikonyo Raila ne nitie e chokruok ma Owalo ne obedogo chieng' Tich Abich. Owalo bende ne en achiel kuom joma ne konyo  Raila ahinya.
mt0: <pad> Many former foot soldiers of Raila attended Friday's meeting convened by Owalo, who is also a former aide to the leader of the ODM.</s>

en: They include those who decamped after losing ODM nominations in the 2013 and 2017 elections, among them former Kisumu Governor Jack Ranguma, former Rongo MP Dalmas Otieno and former Rangwe MP Martin Ogindo.
luo: Joma ne ni e chokruogno oriwo joma ne oweyo ODM kane  patino ok omiyogi kombe e yiero mag 2013 kod 2017.  Ji kaka Jack Ranguma ma en Gavana machon ma Kisumu, Dalmas Otieno Jabunge machon ma Rongo kod Martin Ogindo Jabunge machon ma Rangwe.
mt0: <pad> 他们包括那些离开了ODM的竞选名额在2013和2017年,包括前基督教州长Jack Ranguma,前罗贡 MPDalmas Otieno和前Rangwe MPMartin Ogindo。</s>

en: Ranguma is hoping to challenge Governor Anyang’ Nyong’o for the Kisumu seat.
luo: Ranguma dwaro golo Gavana Anyang’ Nyong’o  mondo en ema obed gavana ma Kisumu.
mt0: <pad> Ranguma is hoping to challenge Governor Anyang' Nyong'o for the Kisumu seat.</s>

en: A source who did not wish to be named said those present were warming up to join United Democratic Alliance (UDA), which is associated with the deputy president.
luo: Wach ne owuok kamoro ni joma ne nie chokruogno paro mar donjo e pati mar United Democratic Alliance (UDA), ma en pati mar jalup Ker, kata kamano, ng'at ma ne ogolo wachno ok dwar ni ohul nyinge.
mt0: <pad> A source who did not want to be named said they were warming up to join United Democratic Alliance (UDA), which is associated with the deputy president.</s>

en: “We want to challenge ODM’s dominance in the Nyanza region. Our goal is to rally the region to support Ruto’s presidential bid,” said the source.
luo: “Ng'atno wacho niya: Wadwaro kedo mondo ODM owe wiko e Nyanza duto. Wadwaro wuoyo gi Jo Nyanza mondo gigo ne  Ruto ombulu mondo okaw kom mar Ker."
mt0: <pad> “我们想挑战ODM的统治在Nyanza地区。我们的目标是让这个地区支持Ruto的总统竞选,” 该消息来源说。</s>

en: The politician claimed that they have the blessings of Ruto to organise the meeting with one of the agendas being to look for ways to attract more Nyanza leaders to their camp.
luo: Jasiasano wacho ni Ruto ne oyienegi bedo gi chokruogno. Kendo achiel kuom gik ma ne gidwaro timo ne en manyo yore ma ginyalo ywayogo jotelo mamoko mag Nyanza mondo odonj e patigino.
mt0: <pad> 政治家说他们有Ruto的祝福来组织会议,其中一个议题是寻找办法吸引更多Nyanza领袖到他们的阵营。</s>

en: The strategy also involves attracting professionals from the region who will help compile the economic needs of the region in a document that will form the basis for Ruto’s campaigns in Nyanza.
luo: Chenrogi oriwo ywayo  josomo ma Nyanza mabiro konyogi loso ripot mar dongruok madwarore e alworano, kendo ripotno ema ibiro tigo e manyo ombulu ne Ruto Nyanza.
mt0: <pad> 这个策略还包括吸引专业人士从该地区来帮助收集经济需求,这将为Rutto的竞选活动在Nyanza提供基础。</s>

en: The group issued a statement saying it was reviewing Nyanza’s economy with the aim of finding ways to improve it.
luo: Jo grubno ne ogolo ripot ma wacho ni ginono dongruok ma Nyanza kendo gidwaro manyo yore ma ginyalo kelogo dongruok momedore.
mt0: <pad> 该小组发表声明说,他们正在评估Nyanza的经济以寻找方法来改善它。</s>

en: Owalo accused unnamed leaders from Nyanza of being preoccupied with the pursuit of political power and failing to address the economic problems of the region.
luo: Owalo ne owacho ni josiasa moko ma Nyanza dwaro mana telo to ok gichomre gi wach tieko dhier ma Nyanza. Kata kamano, ne ok ohulo nyinge jotelogo.
mt0: <pad> Owalo accused unnamed leaders from Nyanza of being preoccupied with the pursuit of political power and failing to address the economic problems of the region.</s>

en: Luo Nyanza has supported Raila since his first attempt at the presidency in 1997.
luo: Luo Nyanza osebedo ka goyo ombulu ne Raila mondo okaw kom mar ker chakre higa mar  1997.
mt0: <pad> Luo Nyanza has supported Raila since his first attempt at the presidency in 1997.</s>

en: In 2013, President Uhuru Kenyatta, with the help of the former secretary-general of the disbanded.
luo: E higa mar  2013, Ker Uhuru Kenyatta ne otemo tiyo gi  Onyango Oloo  mondo omany ombulu Nyanza.
mt0: <pad> In 2013, President Uhuru Kenyatta, with the help of the former secretary-general of the disbanded.</s>

en: The National Alliance party Onyango Oloo tried to make inroads in the region, but residents voted for the opposition leader.
luo: Onyango Oloo ne oyudo nie pati mar The National Alliance to gie kindeno jopatino ne osewere. Kata kamano, Jo Nyanza ne ogoyo ombulu ne Raila.
mt0: <pad> The National Alliance party of Onyango Oloo tried to make inroads in the region, but residents voted for the opposition leader.</s>

en: Lecturer awarded Sh 416,000 for breach of contract
luo: Kot ong'ado ni ochul japuonj kolej siling 416,000 nikech kolej  ne ok orito winjruok ma ne gitimo kode
mt0: <pad> Lecturer awarded Sh 416,000 for breach of contract</s>

en: Apart-time lecturer has been awarded Sh416,000 after his employer breached his contract by refusing to pay him salary for eleven months.
luo: Kot ne ong'ado ni ochul japuonj kolej siling 416,000. Japuonjno ne puonjo mana kuom seche matin e kolejno, kendo kolej ne ok otimo kaka ne giwinjre mi ne ok ochule kuom dweche apar gachiel.
mt0: <pad> 你不知道</s>

en: The court ruled that the evidence by the E-Smart Technical College lecturer Tobias Andhala would be fully adopted as the college failed to step in court even after being served with a notice.
luo: Kot ne owacho ni gibiro tiyo gi weche ma Tobias Andhala ne owacho nikech weg kolej ne ok obiro e kot kata obedo ni kot ne omiyogi barua manyiso ni idwarogi kuno.  Tobias Andhala en japuonj e  E-Smart Technical College.
mt0: <pad> 法院判决了E-Smart Technical College的教授Tobias Andhala的证据会被完全接受,因为该大学没有在法庭上出庭,即使是收到通知。</s>

en: “Andhala testified on March 4, 2021, and his testimony was not challenged or rebutted, and the court will enter a judgment for him in the sum of Sh416,000 that he demanded from the College,” said Justice Stephen Radido of Kisumu Labour Court on Friday.
luo: Stephen Radido ma en Jang'ad Bura ma  Kisumu Labour Court, ne owacho niya Tich Abich, "Mach Tarik 4, 2021, Andhala ne olero ywakne e kot to onge ng'at ma ne okwedo gik ma ne owacho. Omiyo kot chiko ni ochule siling 416,000 ma ne okwayo ni kolejno ochule.”
mt0: <pad> Andhala testified on March 4, 2021, and his testimony was not challenged or rebutted, and the court will enter a judgment for him in the sum of Sh416,000 that he demanded from the College,” said Justice Stephen Radido of Kisumu Labour Court on Friday.</s>

en: Andhala was employed as a part-time lecturer at the College on June 28, 2015, and by May 27, 2016, the College had not fully paid his salary.
luo: Ne ondik Andhala tich e kolejno Jun tarik 28, 2015, to chop Mei 27, 2016, ne pok ochule msache duto.
mt0: <pad> Andhala was employed as a part-time lecturer at the College on June 28, 2015, and by May 27, 2016, the College had not fully paid his salary.</s>

en: On September 5, 2017, he escalated the dispute at the Labour Court after efforts to compel his employer to pay him.
luo: Septemba tarik 5, 2017, ne otero ywakne e  Labour Court   bang' temo wuoyo gi jo kolej mondo ochule.
mt0: <pad> On September 5, 2017, he escalated the dispute at the Labour Court after efforts to compel his employer to pay him.</s>

en: “The college was served the court papers through its secretary on October 26, 2017, but it did not file a response,” said Radido.
luo: Radido ne owacho niya: "Jandiko mar kot ne otero ne kolejno barua Oktoba tarik 26, 2017,  to jo kolej ne ok obiro e kot."
mt0: <pad> “The college was served the court papers through its secretary on October 26, 2017, but it did not file a response,” Radido said.</s>

en: This prompted the court to direct that the case proceeds without the party that had defied court summons.
luo: Mano ne omiyo kot ong'ado ni kesno odhi adhiya nyime kata obedo ni joma odonjnegigo onge, nimar gifwayo ote mar kot.
mt0: <pad> 这促使法庭指示,该案没有被拒绝的法院通知。</s>

en: At the close of the hearing of the case, the court was convinced that Andhala had a contract with the college which was abused.
luo: Bang' winjo kesno, kot ne oneno ni en adier ni Andhala ne odonjo e winjruok gi kolej to kolej ne ok orito winjruokgino.
mt0: <pad> 在听证会上,法庭被说 Andhala有一份合同与学院,而该合同已被滥用。</s>

en: Justice Radido further ordered that the award would accrue interest from September 5, 2017, when the case was filed.
luo: Radido ne omedo owacho ni pesago ne ochako nyuolre chieng' ma ne ohang ter wachno e kot, Septemba tarik 5, 2017. Omiyo ne ochiko ni ochul Andhalo pesago duto.
mt0: <pad> 法官Radido还命令,该赔偿金将开始计算利息从2017年9月5日开始,也就是案件被提起公诉时。</s>

en: The court directed Andhala to settle all the legal costs in the suit.
luo: Kot ne onyiso Andhala ni obiro chulo kot ne tije duto  ma odhi e kesno.
mt0: <pad> The court directed Andhala to pay all the legal costs in the suit.</s>

en: Police in Kisumu have arrested a 63-year-old woman in connection with theft of mosquito nets which were stolen from government stores.
luo: Polise ma Kisumu omako miyo moro ma jahigni 63. Miyono otudre gi kuo net mag suna ma ne okwal kuonde keno mag sirkal.
mt0: <pad> Police in Kisumu have arrested a 63-year-old woman in connection with theft of mosquito nets which were stolen from government stores.</s>

en: Police said they recovered 19 bales of nets suspected to be part of those stolen from Rabuor and Nyang’ande two weeks ago.
luo: Polise wacho ni ne giyudo miyono gi bel 19 mag net. Gichich ni gin moko kuom net ma ne okwal  Rabuor kod Nyang’ande jumbe ariyo mokalo.
mt0: <pad> Police said they recovered 19 bales of nets suspected to be part of those stolen from Rabuor and Nyang’ande two weeks ago.</s>

en: Officers from Obunga Police Station, working on a tip-off from the public, raided a house at USAID Estate on Friday and nabbed the woman.
luo: Raia ne okwalo wach ne polise ma Obunga  kendo polise ne odhi e od miyono USAID Estate Tich Abich mi gimako miyono.
mt0: <pad> Officers from Obunga Police Station, working on a tip-off from the public, raided a house at USAID Estate on Friday and nabbed the woman.</s>

en: She was taken to Obunga Police Station after failing to explain the source of the nets, then transferred to Central Police Station where she was booked.
luo: Nikech ne ok onyisogi kama ne ogoloe netgo ne gitere Obunga Polis Stesen kae to gitere  Central Police Station kama ne okawie nonrone kendo ondik kuo ma ne ichich ni otudrego.
mt0: <pad> She was taken to Obunga Police Station after failing to explain the source of the nets, then transferred to Central Police Station where she was booked.</s>

en: The woman was later moved to Ahero Police Station in Ntyando, where the initial report about the loss of the nets was made.
luo: Bang'e ne oter miyono  Ahero Polis Stesen, Nyando, kama ne ohang terie ripot mar net ma ne olal.
mt0: <pad> The woman was later moved to Ahero Police Station in Ntyando, where the initial report about the loss of the nets was made.</s>

en: Kisumu Central sub-county police commander James Ng’etich said they are investigating the matter.
luo: James Ng’etich, ma en police kamanda ma  Kisumu Central sab-kaunti, wacho ni ginono wachno.
mt0: <pad> 你不知道</s>

en: “We decided to hand the suspect to officers in Ahero since the theft had been reported there and they had also arrested other suspects,” said Ng’etich
luo: Ng'etich ne owacho ni, " Ne wang'ado mar keto miyono e lwet polise ma Ahero nikech kuno ema ne oterie ripot mar kuo net kendo  gisemako jomoko kuno bende."
mt0: <pad> “We decided to hand the suspect to officers in Ahero since the theft had been reported there and they had also arrested other suspects,” Ng’etichi said.</s>

en: The county launched the distribution of treated mosquito nets to residents two weeks ago in an exercise that will see at least 790, 000 nets given to 1.2 million people.
luo: Kauntino ne ochako chiwo net moseketie yath jumbe ariyo mokalo. Gin gi chenro mar miyo ji milion 1.2 net 790, 000 ka tin.
mt0: <pad> 州开始分发蚊帐两周前,在一项活动中将至少790万张蚊帐分发给1.2万万人。</s>

en: The nets had been kept in various stores, mostly hospitals and schools within Kisumu’s seven sub-counties.
luo: Thoth netgo ne okan kuonde mopogore opogore e sab kaunti abiriyo mag Kisumu. Ng'enyne, ne okan-gi e kuonde keno mag osiptande kod skunde.
mt0: <pad> ao nĩ ũrĩa ũngĩtũmĩra gĩtũmi kĩu, gĩkĩro-inĩ kĩa gĩtũmi kĩa Kisumu gĩa mĩrongo ĩtandatũ.</s>

en: However, the exercise was halted in parts of Nyando after it was discovered 340 bales, each containing 50 nets, had disappeared from Rabuor and Nyang’ande hospitals.
luo: "Kata kamano, ne ochung wach chiwo net kuonde moko Nyando ka ne ofweny ni bel 340 moting'o net 50, 50 ne olal e osiptande mag Rabuor kod Nyang'ande."
mt0: <pad> However, the exercise was halted in parts of Nyando after it was discovered 340 bales, each containing 50 nets, had disappeared from Rabuor and Nyang’ande hospitals.</s>

en: County Malaria Coordinator Lilyana Dayo, who was coordinating the distribution of the nets, noted that the theft was discovered on the day the distribution was to begin.
luo: Lilyana Dayo, Mochung' ne Weche Malaria e Kaunti kendo ma ne ochung' ne wach chiwo net ne owacho ni ne ofweny ni netgo onge chieng' ma ne onego ochak pog ji net.
mt0: <pad> County Malaria Coordinator Lilyana Dayo, who was coordinating the distribution of the nets, noted that the theft was discovered on the day the distribution was to begin.</s>

en: At least four officials from the two hospitals were arrested in connection with the theft.
luo: Jotelo ang'wen e osiptande ariyogo osemak nikech wach kuono.
mt0: <pad> At least four officials from the two hospitals were arrested in connection with the theft.</s>

en: The arrest of the 63-year-old woman at Obunga however marked the first breakthrough in the investigations after police discovered 19 bales of mosquito nets suspected to be part of those that were stolen.
luo: Miyo ma jahigni  63 ma polise ne omako Obunga gi bel 19 mag net, e ng'at mokwong mak e kuono.
mt0: <pad> The arrest of the 63-year-old woman at Obunga however marked the first breakthrough in the investigations after police discovered 19 bales of mosquito nets suspected to be part of those that were stolen.</s>

en: The police said the woman told them she was selling the nets on behalf of an individual she declined to name.
luo: Polise wacho ni miyono ne owachonegi ni ouso netgo e lo ng'ato, kata kamano, otamore hulo nying ng'atno.
mt0: <pad> 警察说,这个女人告诉他们她在卖网的名义上,但拒绝了给一个人一个名字。</s>

en: Nyando sub-county police boss Lewnard Matete said the woman will remain in custody until Monday when she will be arraigned.
luo: Lewnard Matete, ma en Jatend Polis, Nyando sab-kaunti ne owacho ni miyono biro bet e sel nyaka Wuok Tich mondo otere e kot.
mt0: <pad> 你不知道。</s>

en: Matete said the suspect had been uncooperative and has declined to divulge information regarding the nets.
luo: Matete wacho ni miyono ok dwar konyogi fwenyo jokuoyego. Otamore golo weche motudre gi kuo mar netgo.
mt0: <pad> Matete said the suspect had been uncooperative and has declined to divulge information regarding the nets.</s>

en: “She keeps changing her story. Police are unable to trace the movement of the nets because the suspect does not want to give information.
luo: “Osiko oloko weche. Polise ok nyal ng'eyo kaka netgo ne owuotho nikech miyono ok dwar hulo gik mong'eyo.
mt0: <pad> “她一直换故事。警察无法追踪网线移动,因为嫌疑人不愿意提供信息。</s>

en: She is now claiming she cannot recall the name or identity and does not even have the contacts of the person she claims delivered the nets to her house for storage. The suspect says all she knows is that the person comes from Busia,” said Matete.
luo: Matete wacho ni, "Koro miyono wacho ni ok onyal paro nyingi ng'at ma ne okelo netgo mondo okan e ode kendo onge gima ong'eyo kuom ng'atno, mak mana ni owuok Busia. Owacho ni oonge kata mana nambane mar simu."
mt0: <pad> 她现在说她无法记住姓名和身份,甚至没有联系人的人她说把网送到她的家来存放。她说一切她知道是这个人来自Busia。”</s>

en: Efforts by the suspect’s kin to have her released on police bond failed.
luo: Wede miyono ne kwayo ni gichul bond mar polis mondo ogonye to polise ne otamore.
mt0: <pad> 努力的家人试图让她在警局保释金上释放,但没有成功。</s>

en: “With this kind of conflicting information, it is not safe for us to grant her police bond. She will have to wait in the cells until Monday when she will go to court,” said Matete.
luo: Matete ne owacho ni: "Nikech miyoni gwenyo weche ahinya, ok dwamiye bond mar polis, di po ka olalnwa. Nyaka orita arita e sel nyaka Wuok Tich mondo odhi e kot."
mt0: <pad> “With this kind of conflicting information, it is not safe for us to grant her police bond. She will have to wait in the cells until Monday when she will go to court,” said Matete.</s>

en: The implementation of a multi-million-shilling project launched by Dr Ida Odinga in Homa Bay County could delay because of a stalemate between the contractor and Kenya Power.
luo: Chenro mar gedo mar Dr Ida Odinga  e kaunti mar Homa Bay nyalo digni  nikech ywarruok manie kind jal mochung' ne gedono kod jo Kenya Power.
mt0: <pad> Implementation of a multi-million-shilling project launched by Dr Ida Odinga in Homa Bay County could be delayed due to a stalemate between the contractor and Kenya Power.</s>

en: The project christened Dr Ida Odinga Library, Research, Innovation and Resource Centre is under construction at Ogande Girls High School in Homa Bay Town Constituency and is expected to cost over Sh300 million.
luo: Iluongo kama ogerono ni  Dr Ida Odinga Library, Research, Innovation and Resource Centre kendo igere Ogande Girls High School man Homa Bay Town Constituency. Iwacho ni en gedo mabiro kawo milion 300.
mt0: <pad> i don't know</s>

en: The project started in December last year after a groundbreaking ceremony presided over by Interior Cabinet Secretary Fred Matiang’i, his education counterpart Prof George Magoha and Dr Ida.
luo: Ne ochak gedo Desemba higa mokalo bang' nyasi maratipo ma ne ochung'ne gi Fred Matiang’i ma en Jatend Sirkal Mochung'ne Somo, nyawadgi  Prof George Magoha, kod Dr Ida.
mt0: <pad> The project started in December last year after a groundbreaking ceremony presided over by Interior Cabinet Secretary Fred Matiang’i, his education counterpart Prof George Magoha and Dr Ida.</s>

en: Its foundation is complete but the construction cannot go on because of electricity cables hanging over the site.
luo: Osetiek mise, kata kamano, gedo ok nyal dhi nyime nikech weyini mag stima oliero kar gedo.
mt0: <pad> Its foundation is complete but the construction cannot go on because of electricity cables hanging over the site.</s>

en: The cables supply electricity to Suneka town in Kisii County from Homa Bay town.
luo: Weyini mag stimago golo stima Homa Bay katero e  taon ma Suneka man e Kaunti ma Kisii.
mt0: <pad> The cables provide electricity to Suneka town in Kisii County from Homa Bay town.</s>

en: Homa Bay Town MP Peter Kaluma who toured the project accused Kenya Power of failing to move the cables.
luo: Peter Kaluma ma en Jabunge ma Taon ma Homa Bay  ne odhi neno  kanyo. Ne owacho ni jo Kenya Power ema otamore chwalo weyinigo.
mt0: <pad> Homa Bay Town MP Peter Kaluma who toured the project accused Kenya Power of failing to move the cables.</s>

en: “The contractor has told me he asked Kenya Power to relocate the power lines but the organisation has not done so. The company should move with speed and relocate the power lines. Electric cables hang above the site hence the work cannot continue,” said Kaluma.
luo: Kaluma wacho niya: "Ng'at mochung' ne gedono wacho ni osenyiso jo Kenya Power mondo ochwal weyinigo kamachielo, to pok gitimo kamano. Onego gi chwal weyinigo mapiyo nikech weyinigo kalo kama owinjore ogedie, kendo tich ok nyal dhi nyime."
mt0: <pad> “The contractor has told me he asked Kenya Power to relocate the power lines but the organisation has not done so. The company should move with speed and relocate the power lines. Electric cables hang above the site hence the work cannot continue,” said Kaluma.</s>

en: The MP said the cost of the project is likely to go up if the stalemate persists.
luo: Jabungeno ne owacho ni ka ywarruokno odhi nyime kendo tich ochung',  pesa mibiro tigo e gedo biro medore.
mt0: <pad> 你不知道</s>

en: “The stalemate must be resolved. We want to see the project completed as planned delay in implementation of a project has financial implications hence this matter must be handled with the seriousness it deserves,” Kaluma said.
luo: "Kaluma ne owacho niya: "Onego otiek ywarruokno, kendo tich odhi nyime. Wadwaro ni otiek gik migero kae. Sama tich digni, pes gedo medore omiyo wadwaro ni omi wachni pek madwarore."
mt0: <pad> “The stalemate must be resolved. We want to see the project completed as planned delay in implementation of a project has financial implications hence this matter must be handled with the seriousness it deserves,” Kaluma said.</s>

en: Homa Bay County Kenya Power Manager Ken Okumbe said his office is aware of the stalemate and has given the contractor a quotation of the fee he is supposed to pay to facilitate the relocation of the power lines.
luo: Ken Okumbe ma en Jatelo mar  Kenya Power e Homa Bay Kaunti wacho ni ong'eyo wachno kendo osenyiso jal mochung' ne gedono pesa monego ochul mondo ogol weyinigo kama gintiere kendo otergi kamachielo.
mt0: <pad> Homa Bay County Kenya Power Manager Ken Okumbe said his office is aware of the stalemate and has given the contractor a quotation of the fee he should pay to facilitate the relocation of the power lines to facilitate the relocation of the power lines.</s>

en: “It is true they reported the matter to our office. We gave them the quotation for rerouting the power line but they have not paid,” said Okumbe.
luo: Okumbe wacho niya: " En adier, ni  ne gikelo wachno e ofiswa. Ne wanyisogi nengo mar loko ndach stimano to pok gichulowa."
mt0: <pad> “It is true they reported the matter to our office. We gave them the quotation for rerouting the power line but they have not paid,” said Okumbe.</s>

en: The project aims at establishing a library with a capacity of 500 students, an amphitheatre that can accommodate 1,000 people, an ICT hub and a creative centre with a recording studio.
luo: Gidwaro gero laibrari manyalo ting'o jopuonjre 500,  stediam molworore manyalo ting'o ji 1000 kendo ma kar bet opangore  ka ng'as, ot moyang ne weche kompyuta kod kama jopuonjre nyalo bero talantagi kaachiel gi kama inyalo makie dwol."
mt0: <pad> The project aims to establish a library with a capacity of 500 students, an amphitheatre that can accommodate 1,000 people, ICT hub and a creative center with a recording studio.</s>

en: Construction of the resource centre was expected to take 18 months, from December 21 when the groundbreaking ceremony took place.
luo: Gedono ne onego okaw dweche 18, chakre Desemba tarik 21 chieng' ma ne otimie nyasi mar chako gedo.
mt0: <pad> Construction of the resource center was expected to take 18 months, from December 21, when the groundbreaking ceremony took place.</s>

en: The local NG-CDF contributed Sh50 million towards the project.
luo: NG-CDF ma Homa Bay ne ogolo milion 50 ne gedono.
mt0: <pad> The local NG-CDF contributed Sh50 million towards the project.</s>

en: A 77-year-old woman from East Kolwa in Kisumu East Sub-County has been taking care of abandoned teenage mothers and widows for 25 years now.
luo: Miyo moro ma jahigni  77 modak East Kolwa, Kisumu East Sab-Kaunti osebedo karito nyiri matindo mosenyuol kendo ojwang' kod mond liete ma bende ojwang'. Osebedo ka otimo kamano kuom higni 25.
mt0: <pad> A 77-year-old woman from East Kolwa in Kisumu East Sub-County has been taking care of abandoned teenage mothers and widows for 25 years now.</s>

en: Florence Otieno says the initiative has enabled her to “give a second chance to a vulnerable group of women”.
luo: Florence Otieno wacho ni chenrono osemiye thuolo mar konyo joma mine ma jochan mondo ochak ngimagi manyien.
mt0: <pad> Florence Otieno says the initiative has enabled her to "give a second chance to a vulnerable group of women".</s>

en: Otieno first put up the rescue centre at her home in 1996 after being involved in a road accident, which left her partially paralysed.
luo: Florence ne oyawo dalane ne mine ma kamago e higa mar 1996 bang'  hinyore e masira mar  ndara ma ne omiyo dende konchiel otho.
mt0: <pad> Otieno first set up the rescue center at her home in 1996 after being involved in a road accident, which left her partially paralysed.</s>

en: “The crash made me discover that life can be lost within a second. Due to that fact, I pledged to make the society I live in a better place by helping the vulnerable. In this case, it is majorly teenage mothers and the widows,” she told The Standard.
luo: Ne onyiso The Standard niya: "Masirano ne omiyo afwenyo ni kare ng'ato nyalo lalo ngimane ka diemo wang' nono. Nikech mano, ne asingora ni abiro timo kar nyalona mondo ngima obed maber matin e oganda madakie. Omiyo ne achako konyo nyithindo ma nyiri monyuol kod mond liete."
mt0: <pad> “The crash made me discover that life can be lost within a second. Due to that, I pledged to make the society I live in a better place by helping the vulnerable. In this case, it is mainly teenage mothers and the widows,” she told The Standard.</s>

en: The septuagenarian has thus far rescued 38 teenage mothers, and at least 12 widows.
luo: Nyaka chop sani, miyo ma koro hike oseniang'no osereso nyithindo manyiri 38 kod mond liete 12.
mt0: <pad> The seventeenth-century man has rescued 38 teenage mothers, and at least 12 widows.</s>

en: As the number of girls increased in her rescue centre, so did her financial responsibility.
luo: Kaka kwan nyiri ne medore e kaka bende ne dwarore ni oti gi pesa momedore.
mt0: <pad> 隨著女孩的數量增加在她的收容所,她也增加了她的經濟責任。</s>

en: Otieno said she, consequently, had to devise new survival methods.
luo: Florence wacho ni ne ochune manyo yore mamoko mag yuto, nono ne ok odhi nyalo.
mt0: <pad> Otieno said she had to devise new survival methods.</s>

en: “I set aside a parcel of land for farming. The widows and the teenage mums would farm commercial crops, which we’d sell and use the proceeds to feed and clothe ourselves,” she said.
luo: Florence medo niya: "Ne aketo tenge puodho moro ma ne wabiroga puro. Mond lietego kaachiel gi nyirigo ne puro gik ma wauso. Ne wauso gigo kae to pesa ma wayudo wang'iewogo chiemo kod lewni."
mt0: <pad> “我把一块土地留给农业。我们会种商业作物,然后卖掉它们来吃和穿衣服。”她说。</s>

en: Other girls diversified into sandal, shoe and handbag-making business.

en: Otieno says her initiative has helped prevent some of the young girls in her centre from being exposed to sexual predators.

en: Awino’s house in Orongo Village was recently deluged by heavy rains, which forced her to relocate. Otieno took the youthful widow in.

en: More than 2,200 families in Migori and Homa Bay counties have been displaced by floods following heavy rains.

en: At Kakelo Kakoth location in Migori County, some 300 homes were submerged on Monday, forcing locals to move to safer grounds.

mt0: <pad> At Kakelo Kakoth location in Migori County, some 300 homes were submerged on Monday, forcing locals to move to safer grounds.</s>

en: In Lower Karapolo,  60 households had been marooned by the floods while West Kanyuor location had 99 households affected by the floods.

en: According to Lower Central Kadem Chief Philip Orwa, areas around Kuja River such as Lwanda and Kuja were also flooded.

en: Kenya National Highways Authority (KeNHA) has warned motorists against crossing Goye causeway due to the overflowing Lake Victoria.

en: "Since there is no alternative access to Osieko, we wish to advise motorists along that section not to attempt crossing the overtopped section, and to only cross when water levels are low," said KeNHA.

en: Goye crossing, which was built in 1975, was estimated to operate for 20 years before a new one could be built.

en: Oduma said the failure by the government to construct the bridge despite numerous complaints from the residents has led to the current situation, adding several operations have been affected.

mt0: <pad> Oduma said the government's failure to construct the bridge despite numerous complaints from the residents has led to the current situation, adding several operations have been affected.</s>

en: Last week, transport along the busy road was paralysed for hours following an accident.

en: Residents called on the government to repair the road to save them costs they incur and the time they waste using the dilapidated road.

mt0: <pad> 居民呼籲政府修復道路,以免他們花費和浪費時間使用破壞的道路。</s>

en: Aggrey Ochieng, a resident, termed the road critical to the economy of the county and accused local leaders of neglecting it. “We have raised the issue with the MP, governor and KeNHA but nothing has been done.”

Owacho niya: "Wasetero wach ndara ne jabungewa,  ne gavana kendo ne riwruok mar KeNHA, to onge gima gisetimo."
mt0: <pad> Aggrey Ochieng, a resident, termed the road critical to the economy of the county and accused local leaders of neglecting it. "We have raised the issue with the MP, governor and KENHA but nothing has been done."</s>

en: Matatus and boda boda riders have also hiked fares, said Odhiambo.

en: Yesterday, KeNHA said that there were plans of constructing a permanent bridge.

en: "Procurement process is underway to solve the rising Lake Victoria water levels at that crossing," KeNHA said.
