en: Aman burned a relative's cow after he was denied a cup of milk in Bomwagamo, Nyamira County.
luo: E gweng' mar Bomwagamo ma yudore e Kaunti ma Nyamira, jago moro nowang'o dher watne nikech notuone chak.
mt0: <pad> Aman burned a relative's cow after he was denied a cup of milk in Bomwagamo, Nyamira County.</s>

en: Nyambiri assistant chief Peter Oyange said the assailant later surrendered to the police and confessed to burning the lactating cow in the shed after being denied a cup of milk.
luo: Jalup chif ma Nyambiri migosi Peter Oyange nowacho ni jagono noduogo odhi ir stesend obila kendo yie ni nodhi motiayo mach kama ne dhiang' ma ne inyiedhono nitie nikech notuone chak okombe achiel.
mt0: <pad> Peter Oyange, assistant chief of Nyambiri, said the attacker later surrendered to the police and confessed to burning the lactating cow in the shed after being denied a cup of milk.</s>

en: The cow died in the inferno.
luo: Dhiang'no notho e majno.
mt0: <pad> 牛在火灾中死去。</s>

en: Mr Oyange is said to have executed the awful incident at around 4am on Tuesday while the owners were asleep.
luo: Wachore ni Oyange notimo tim marachno chieng' Tich Ariyo kar sa apar okinyi sama ne wuon dhiang'no nindo.
mt0: <pad> Mr Oyange is said to have executed the awful incident at around 4am on Tuesday while the owners were asleep.</s>

en: It is yet to be established what charges police plan to charge the suspect with.
luo: Pok ong'ere ni en ketho mane ma polis biro donjonego ng'ano.
mt0: <pad> 还没决定警察打算以什么罪名起诉嫌疑人。</s>

en: Nyamira County Commissioner Amos Mariba said there are concerns over rising cases of substance abuse among the youth that has contributed to an increase in cases of lawlessness in the county.
luo: Jatend sirikal ma Kaunti ma Nyamira Amos Mariba ogolo milome ni rowere mathoth tiyo gi yedhe ma mero ji to mano miyo timbe ma achach omedore e kauntino.
mt0: <pad> Nyamira County Commissioner Amos Mariba said there are concerns over rising cases of substance abuse among the youth that has contributed to an increase in cases of lawlessness in the county.</s>

en: "We suspect such incidences could be linked to substance abuse among young people. Our fight against the vice is a notch higher and we hope to bring the situation under control," Mariba said.
luo: Mariba nowacho kama: "Wachich ni timbe kaka mago medore nikech rowere tiyo gi yedhe ma mero ji. Wadwa medo rang'iny ma wakwedogo timbe kaka mago kendo wageno ni timbego biro dok chien."
mt0: <pad> "We suspect such incidents could be linked to substance abuse among young people. Our fight against the vice is a notch higher and we hope to bring the situation under control," Mariba said.</s>

en: This is the second incident involving the maiming or killing of animals to happen in the area within a period of less than two months.
luo: Kuom kinde ma ok rom dweche ariyo, gi ma chalo kama osetimore diriyo e gweng'ni ka inego chiaye kata miyo obed gi ng'ol moro.
mt0: <pad> 这是第二次发生在该地区死或被杀的动物死亡事件,在短短两个月内发生的。</s>

en: In March, an unknown person moved into an elderly woman's homestead and slashed her pregnant heifer’s hind legs, rendering it immobile.
luo: E dwe mar adek, ng'at moro nodhi e dala dayo moro kendo tong'o tiende dher dayoni. Noyudo dheno iye odongo kendo mano momiyo koro ok onyal wuotho.
mt0: <pad> 在三月,一个不认识的人搬到了一位老人的家并切断了她怀孕的母牛的后腿,使它不能移动。</s>

en: The once vibrant Yala town is now in the doldrums after the closure of Odera Akang’o College campus that gave it a lifeline.
luo: Boma ma Yala ma e kinde mokalo ne en kama ji ng'enyie kendo modich, sani ong'ich-ng'ich nikech nolor skund tiegruok ma Odera Akang'o.
mt0: <pad> Yala, once vibrant, is now in the doldrums after the closure of Odera Akang'o College campus that gave it a lifeline.</s>

en: When the campus that was a constituent college of Moi University was shut in 2019, the livelihoods of more than 50,000 people was affected.
luo: Ka ne olor skundno, ma ne en bad mbalariany ma Moi e higa mar 2019, ngima mar jo ma diromo 50,000 nochochni.
mt0: <pad> When the campus that was a constituent college of Moi University was shut in 2019, the livelihoods of more than 50,000 people were affected.</s>

en: The town, situated along Kisumu-Busia highway in Gem Sub-county, suffered as a result of closed businesses, deserted restaurants and vacant rental houses.
luo: Taon ma yudore e apaya ma wuok Kisumu Kochomo Busia kendo e sab-kaonti ma Gem, noyudo ng'ikruok nikech nolor ute ohala, otende kendo udi ma ne ji opango odong' nono.
mt0: <pad> The town, located along the Kisumu-Busia highway in Gem Sub-county, suffered as a result of closed businesses, deserted restaurants and vacant rental houses.</s>

en: Business people and residents now say the town has lost its glory.
luo: Jotim ohala kod jo ma odak e taondno wachno ni sani taondno olalo huma ma ne en-go.
mt0: <pad> 人們說這個城市已經失去了它的光輝。</s>

en: “A lot of traders have closed their businesses,” said Peter Adhaya, chairman of Yala Young Traders Association.
luo: Peter Adhaya ma  e jakom mar riwruok miluongo ni Yala Young Traders Association, wacho kama: "Jotim ohala mathoth oseloro ohendnigi."
mt0: <pad> “A lot of traders have closed their businesses,” said Peter Adhaya, chairman of Yala Young Traders Association.</s>

en: “When the university was still operating, business was good. Students would do everything within Yala town. Now rental houses have been converted to guest rooms, but there are no customers,” said Mr Adhaya.
luo: "Kinde ma ne skundno tiyo, ohelni ne dhi maber. Jo ma ne somo e skundno ne nyalo timo gimoro e taondwaka. Sani to koro ute ma nipango olok mondo obed ute ma jowuoth nyalo ninde, to joma dinind kuno be onge."
mt0: <pad> “When the university was still operating, business was good. Students would do everything within Yala town. Now rental houses have been converted to guest rooms, but there are no customers,” said Mr Adhaya.</s>

en: Those who had shops and eateries around the hostels and the university were the worst-hit.
luo: Joma ohendnigi okethore moloyo gin jo ma ne nigi dukni kod otende machiegni gi skundno.
mt0: <pad> 那些有商店和饭店周围的旅馆和大学最受欢迎。</s>

en: Businessman Asis Awan, 62, who was born in Yala town, said businesses in the area have gone down by 50 per cent since the closure of Odera Akang’o College.
luo: Jatim ohala miluongo ni Asis Awan ma jahigni 62 kendo ma nonyuol e taondno wacho ni ohala odok piny gi pasent 50 nyaka ne lor Odera Akango.
mt0: <pad> Ɖo nǔ yě sɔ́ xá tɔ́, a ɖɔ nǔ yě sɔ́ xá tɔ́ lɛ́ɛ ǎ.</s>

en: Awan said business people who spent millions of shillings to put up rental houses and hostels are counting losses since some of them had taken loans.
luo: Awan wacho ni jo ma notiyo gi omuom mang'eny mondo giger ute mideso kod ka ma ji nindoe oyudo lal maduong' ahinya nikech ne gikawo pes hola kata loan.
mt0: <pad> Awan said business people who spent millions of shillings to put up rental houses and hostels are counting losses since some of them had taken loans.</s>

en: He revealed that his hardware business has not been spared as construction projects have stalled or gone down.
luo: Nowacho ni kata mana ohande mar hadware be ne ok dhi maber nikech tij gedo mathoth e taondno ochung kendo ji matin sana e ma sani gedo.
mt0: <pad> He revealed that his hardware business has not been spared as construction projects have stalled or gone down.</s>

en: Mr Awan, a member of the National Committee of Chamber of Commerce and Siaya branch representative, said there was no hope of businesses getting better.
luo: Migosi Awan ma en achiel kuom jo ma ni e komiti miluongo ni National Committee of Chambers of Commerce  kendo en e ma ochung' ne jotim ohala ma Siaya nowacho  ni ok one ka weche dhi bedo maber kodgi.
mt0: <pad> Mr Awan, a member of the National Committee of Chamber of Commerce and Siaya branch representative, said there was no hope of businesses getting better.</s>

en: Agnes Achieng, a vegetable vendor who had a stall just opposite the college where several hostels are situated, said she had to move to the market centre to start all over again.
luo: Agnes Achieng ma ne nigi kibanda momanyore gi kama sikund nitie kendo ma ne ni machiegni gi kama nyithi skundno odakie, wacho ni nochune ni mondo odhi ochak ohandeno  e chiiro.
mt0: <pad> Agnes Achieng, a vegetable vendor who had a stall just opposite the college where several hostels are situated, said she had to move to the market centre to start all over again.</s>

en: “I stayed at home for two months trying to strategise. My vegetable business collapsed in 2019. I had a stall where most of the students were living and when all of them finally left, my business collapsed,” said Achieng.
luo: Achieng' wacho niya: "Nabedo pacho kuom dweche ariyo katemo omo fwa. Ohanda mar loko alot nopodho e higa mar 2019. Ne an gi kibanda machiegni gi kuma thoth nyithind skundo nodakie, to ka giduto ne giwuok, ohanda ne opodho.
mt0: <pad> “I stayed at home for two months trying to strategise. My vegetable business collapsed in 2019. I had a stall where most of the students were living and when they finally left, my business collapsed,” said Achieng.</s>

en: The campus was launched in 2008 as a satellite campus with only 32 students.
luo: Skundno ne ochak e higa mar 2008 kaka bad mbalariany ma Moi ka en mana gi jopuonjre 32.
mt0: <pad> The campus was launched in 2008 as a satellite campus with only 32 students.</s>

en: The college did not receive government-sponsored students from Moi University for some years, but managed to admit privately sponsored learners.
luo: Skundno ne ok oyudo nyithindo ma ne sirkal chudonegi kuom higni mogwaro koa e mbalariany ma Moi. Kata kamano, ne en gi nyithindo ma ne chudo kigin.
mt0: <pad> 这所大学没有收到政府资助的学生从Moi University,但它可以接受私人资助的学习者。</s>

en: Before its closure, the college had received an ultimatum from the Commission of University Education that it risked closure if the management did not get 50 hectares of land for expansion after an inspection in 2016.
luo: Ka pok ne olore, ne oridne chik gi Commission of University Educaton
mt0: <pad> Before its closure, the college had received an ultimatum from the Commission of University Education that it risked closure if the management did not get 50 hectares of land for expansion after an inspection in 2016 after an inspection in 2016.</s>

en: The Commission of University Education had given the campus a timeline of two years to ensure all the requirements were met by February 2018 when another inspection was to be conducted before a final decision was made.
luo: Bad sirikal ma ngiyo yore somo e Kenya - Commission of University Education -nomiyogi higni ariyo nyaka dwe mar a
mt0: <pad> The Commission of University Education had given the campus a two-year timeframe to ensure all the requirements were met by February 2018, when another inspection was to be conducted before a final decision was made.</s>

en: Odera Akang’o College campus, which currently sits on six hectares, had 1,142 privately sponsored students at the time of its closure.
luo: Odera Akang'o ma sani ni e lo ma romo heka 6, ne nigi nyithindo 1142 ma ne chudo kigin kane pok ochop kinde ma ne olore.
mt0: <pad> Odera Akang'o College campus, which currently sits on six hectares, had 1,142 privately sponsored students at the time of its closure.</s>

en: In a bid to beat the closure warning, the college had received 90 hectares in Nyamininia near Yala.
luo: Ka gitemo kasore mondo kik tarigno owegi oko, sikundno noyudo lo heka 90 kama iluongo ni Nyamininia man machiegni gi Yala.
mt0: <pad> 为了避免关闭,学院获得了90公顷的土地在Nyamininia附近Yala。</s>

en: The county government committed Sh35 million two years ago to help improve, construct and refurbish the campus structures and it was to offer tuition scholarships to its staff in return.
luo: Serikal ma piny mar kauntino, noketo milion 35 tenge higni ariyo mokalo mondo okony e bero, gero, kendo loso  sikundno. Gi ma sikundno ne onego otim en yie ne jo kaunti osom e skundno nono.
mt0: <pad> The county government committed Sh35 million two years ago to help improve, construct and refurbish the campus structures and it was to offer tuition scholarships to its staff in return.</s>

en: However, Moi University administration pulled out, letting go all the workers who had remained at the campus, forcing it to close.
luo: Kata kamano, jo ma ochung' ne mbalariany ma Moi University nowere gi skundno kendo ne giyie mondo jo ma ne tiyo e sikundno owuogi to  mano nomiyo olore.
mt0: <pad> However, the administration of Moi University pulled out, letting go all the workers who had remained at the campus, forcing it to close.</s>

en: But there have been plans by other higher learning institutions seeking to take over the college.
luo: To nitie chenro ma itimo gi mbalariany mamoko mondo gikaw sikundno.
mt0: <pad> But there have been plans by other higher learning institutions to take over the college.</s>

en: Karachuonyo constituency ODM officials have told political leaders to end clan politics in Homa Bay County.
luo: Ofisa mag ODM e od bura ma Karachuonyo okwayo jotend siasa mondo giwere gi siasa mapogo dho udi e kaonti mar Homa Bay.
mt0: <pad> Karachuonyo constituency ODM officials have told political leaders to end clan politics in Homa Bay County.</s>

en: Addressing journalists at a Homa Bay hotel on Sunday, ODM chairpersons from the six wards in Karachuonyo Constituency and the constituency chair have denounced clan politics if the county is to elect a good governor.
luo: Jokom mar ODM ma wuok e ward auchiel ma nitie e od bura ma Karachuonyo kaachiel gi jakomb ODM ma od burano, nowuoyo gi jofwamb kod keyo weche ka gin e hotel moro e taon mar Homa Bay chieng' Jumapil. Ne gikwedo mokalo siasa mag anyuola ka giwacho ni mano nyalo mono kauntino yudo gavana mowinjore.
mt0: <pad> ODM chairpersons from the six wards in Karachuonyo Constituency and the constituency chair have denounced clan politics if the county is to elect a good governor.</s>

en: The leaders were speaking after claims by some contenders that the Rachuonyo clan which comprises Karachuonyo, Kasipul and Kabondo-Kasipul constituencies will decide who becomes the next Homa Bay governor in 2022 because of their numerical advantage.
luo: Jotelo nowuoyo bang' jotelo moko ma dwa ni oyiergi nosieko gi wach moro ni Jo-Karachunyo moting'o od bura ma Karachuonyo, Kasipul, kod Kabondo-Kasipul e ma nigi teko mar yiero jal ma biro bedo gavana e kaunti ma Homa Bay e higa mar 2022 nikech gin e ma ging'eny.
mt0: <pad> Leaders were speaking after some contenders said the Rachuonyo clan which comprises Karachuonyo, Kasipul and Kabondo-Kasipul constituencies will decide who becomes the next Homa Bay governor in 2022 because of their numerical advantage.</s>

en: They argued that Rachuonyo clan has more voters than other clans in the county.
luo: Jogo ne wacho ni Jo-Karachuonyo e ma nigi jogo ombulu mathoth moloyo dhoudi mamoko e kauntino.
mt0: <pad> They argued that the Rachuonyo clan has more voters than other clans in the county.</s>

en: Kendu Bay Town Ward chairman Justus Osumba said the narrative is outdated and divisive, adding that cannot the county has eight constituencies.
luo: Justus Osumba ma e jakom ma Kendu Bay ward, nowacho ni mano en paro ma nyachon kendo ma pogo oganda, komedo wacho ni kauntino nigi od buche aboro.
mt0: <pad> 你不知道。</s>

en: He argued that three constituencies alone cannot make a candidate win a gubernatorial seat.
luo: Nowacho ni ute buche adek kende ok nyal miyo ng'ato yomb jomamoko ma obed gavana.
mt0: <pad> He argued that three constituencies alone cannot make a candidate win a gubernatorial seat.</s>

en: Osumba said there is a need for Rachuonyo clan to welcome gubernatorial candidates from other constituencies.
luo: Osumba nowacho ni dwarore mondo jo ma aa Rachuonyo osir ng'ama dwa bedo gavana mowuok eod buche mamoko.
mt0: <pad> Osumba said there is a need for the Rachuonyo clan to welcome gubernatorial candidates from other constituencies.</s>

en: “We are only three constituencies hence our sons and daughters who want to vie for the seat cannot succeed without the support of voters from other constituencies,” Osumba said.
luo: Nowacho kama: "Wan mana gi od buche adek kende. Omiyo, ok nyalre mondo yawuotwa kod nyiwa obed gavana ka ok osirgi gi jo ma wuok e od buche mamoko.
mt0: <pad> “We only have three constituencies hence our sons and daughters who want to vie for the seat cannot succeed without the support of voters from other constituencies,” Osumba said.</s>

en: The senior citizen said clannism will deny the county good candidates for the County top seat, adding that all candidates are welcomed to the larger Karachuonyo region.
luo: Jaduong'no ne owacho ni siasa mag anyuola mono kaontino yudo joma beyo mowinjore bedo jotelo mar kaonti kendo nowacho ni Karachuonyo duong' ma ji duto madwaro kom onego otem atema.
mt0: <pad> 老人说,宗派主义会剥夺县的优秀候选人获得县最高职位,并补充道,所有候选人都欢迎到更大的Karachuonyo地区。</s>

en: “All those with desirable leadership qualities to ascend to power should do their campaigns across the county without discrimination,” said Osumba.
luo: Osumba nomedo wacho niya: "Ji duto ma nigi kido mar bedo jatelo maber onego otim kampen mag gi e kauntino duto ma ok obuon-gi.
mt0: <pad> “All those with desirable leadership qualities to ascend to power should do their campaigns across the county without discrimination,” said Osumba.</s>

en: Karachuonyo Constituency Joshua Maena said politics of incitement and discrimination had been overtaken by events.
luo: Joshua Maeno ma en jachung' ma od bura ma Karachuonyo nowacho ni siasa ma ithuwie ji kod buono ji en gi ma nokalo nene.
mt0: <pad> Joshua Maena, the candidate for Karachuonyo Constituency, said politics of incitement and discrimination had been overtaken by events.</s>

en: He said there is a need for politics of inclusivity to enable Homa Bay to get a good governor after the 2022 General Election.
luo: Nowacho ni dwarore mondo siasa oriw ji duto e ka kaunti ma Homa Bay nyalo yudo gavana maber bang' yiero maduong' ma 2022.
mt0: <pad> He said there is a need for politics of inclusivity to enable Homa Bay to get a good governor after the 2022 General Election.</s>

en: “Let us stop discriminating people. This type of politics is obsolete,” said Maena.
luo: Maeno owacho kama: "Waweuru tim mar buono jomamoko. Kit siasa ma kama tinde onge."
mt0: <pad> “Let's stop discriminating people. This type of politics is obsolete,” said Maena.</s>

en: He cautioned leaders against branding others as 'outsiders' during politics to achieve their selfish political interests.
luo: Nosiemo jotelo ma luongo jomoko ni jolimbamba e kinde siasa mana ni mondo gin e ma yiergi.
mt0: <pad> He warned leaders against labeling others as 'outsiders' in politics to achieve their selfish political interests.</s>

en: “You find a man who has lived in an area since childhood is branded an outsider when he ventures into politics. Segregation is wrong,” Odero said.
luo: Odero nowacho niya: "Iyudo ka iluongo ng'at mosedak kamoro nyaka ne nyuole ni jalimbamba sama odonjo e weche siasa. Pogo ji e yo ma kamano en gi ma rach miwuoro."
mt0: <pad> “You find a man who has lived in an area since childhood is branded an outsider when he ventures into politics. Segregation is wrong,” Odero said.</s>

en: Some of the political leaders who are eyeing the county gubernatorial include Deputy Governor Hamilton Orata, Woman Rep Gladys Wanga, County Secretary Isaiah Ogwe, businessman Jared Otieno, former Nairobi Governor Evans Kidero, KUPPET Secretary General Akello Misori, ODM National Chairman John Mbadi and politician Luis Otieno.
luo: Moko kuom jotelo ma olap dhogi chuer ne komb gavana oriwo Hamilton Orata ma e jalup gavana ma sani, Gladys Wanga ma sani en Woman Rep, Isaiah Ogwe ma en jagoro mar kaunti, Jared Otieno ma en jatim ohala, Evans Kidero ma ne en gavana ma chon ma Nairobi, Akello Misori ma en Secretary General mar KUPPET, John Mbadi ma en jakom mar chama mar ODM, kod Luis Otieno ma be en jasiasa.
mt0: <pad> Some of the political leaders who are eyeing the county gubernatorial include Deputy Governor Hamilton Orata, Woman Rep Gladys Wanga, County Secretary Isaiah Ogwe, businessman Jared Otieno, former Nairobi Governor Evans Kidero, KUPPET Secretary General Akello Misori, ODM National Chairman John Mbadi and politician Luis Otieno.</s>

en: They want to succeed Governor Cyprian Awiti who is serving his second term.
luo: Gidwaro ni gikaw kar Cyprian Awiti ma e gavana ma tiyo sani kendo ma kindene mar bedo e ofis orumo.
mt0: <pad> 他们想取代州长克里普拉恩·阿维蒂,他正在执政他的第二任期。</s>

en: Two children were killed after their house collapsed at Ururi village, Bondo Sub-County, on Saturday morning.
luo: Nyithindo ariyo ne otho chieng' Ngeso bang' odgi gore piny e gweng ma Uriri e sab kaonti ma Bondo
mt0: <pad> Two children were killed after their house collapsed at Ururi village, Bondo Sub-County on Saturday morning.</s>

en: The two, Juliana Achieng', 2, and Mary Achieng’,12, were sleeping in the house together with their parents when the incident happened.
luo: Nyithindo ariyogo ma moro iluongo ni Juliana Achieng' ma jahigni ariyo, kod nyamin-gi Mary Achieng' ma jahigni 12, ne nindo gi jonyuolgi sa ma ne masirano otimore.
mt0: <pad> 兩個女孩,Juliana Achieng',2歲和Mary Achieng',12歲,正睡在家中同他們的父母一起的時候發生了意外。</s>

en: Their father, Fredrick Achieng’, who survived the tragedy, told The Standard that the incident happened at around midnight.
luo: Wuon-gi ma iluongo ni Fredrick Achieng' ma notony e kinde masirano, nonyiso jo gaset mar The Standard ni masirano notimore kar sa auchiel otieno.
mt0: <pad> 他们父亲,Fredrick Achieng',说事故发生在午夜时分。他告诉《标准》说他们是在晚上11点左右发生的。</s>

en: "Our roof was first blown off before the walls collapsed on us, killing our two children," said Achieng’.
luo: Achieng' wacho niya: "Tatwa e ma ne yamo okwango owalo kae to kor ot olwar kuomwa mi onego nyithindo ariyogo.
mt0: <pad> "Our roof was blown off before the walls collapsed on us, killing our two children," said Achieng’.</s>

en: He said villagers who rushed to the scene after they heard screams rescued them.
luo: Nowacho ni jogweng' ma nowinjo ka gigoyo nduru e ma noringo mobiro resogi.
mt0: <pad> He said villagers who rushed to the scene after hearing screams rescued them.</s>

en: He appealed to well-wishers to help him get shelter and meet the burial expenses for his two children.
luo: Nokwayo ni jo ma chunygi ler mondo okonye gi pesa oyud ot machielo kendo oyik nyithinde ariyogo.
mt0: <pad> He appealed to well-wishers to help him get shelter and meet the burial expenses for his two children.</s>

en: The bodies were taken to Bondo sub-county hospital mortuary.
luo: Ringre nyithindogo noter e od kano ringre jo ma otho e osiptal mar Bondo sab kaonti.
mt0: <pad> 尸体被送到Bondo县医院的灵堂。</s>

en: The late Keziah Obama has today been laid to rest at her Kogelo village in Siaya county.
luo: Ringre Keziah Obama kawuono noyik e gweng mar Kogelo e kaunti ma Siaya.
mt0: <pad> The late Keziah Obama has been laid to rest today at her Kogelo village in Siaya county.</s>

en: The late Keziah was the mother of former US President Barack Obama’s half-brother, Malik Abong’o Obama.
luo: Ne en min Malik Abong'o Obama ma en owadgi Ker machon ma Amerka Barack Obama.
mt0: <pad> 你唔知。</s>

en: She died on April 13, 2021, while receiving treatment at a UK-based hospital.
luo: Keziah notho tarik 13 April, 2021 ka noyudo thieth e osiptal moro man UK.
mt0: <pad> She died on April 13, 2021, while receiving treatment at a UK-based hospital.</s>

en: Mama Keziah was the spouse of the late Barack Obama senior. She was 78 years at the time of her death.
luo: Mama Keziah Obama ne en chi Barach Obama senior. Notho kojahigni 78.
mt0: <pad> Mama Keziah 是前总统巴拉克·奥巴马的妻子。她享年78歲,當時去世。</s>

en: Her body arrived in Kenya on Friday morning before it was transported to Kogelo where she was buried.
luo: Ringrene nochopo Kenya chieng' Tich Abich okinyi, eka otere Kogelo kama noyike.
mt0: <pad> Her body arrived in Kenya on Friday morning before it was transported to Kogelo where she was buried.</s>

en: Malik, who is the eldest son while speaking on behalf of the family eulogised his mother as a loving and responsible woman.
luo: Malik ma e wuoyi makayo, nochiwo nend min-gi kowacho ni ne en miyo mohero ji kendo ma nokawo ting'ne.
mt0: <pad> Malik, the eldest son, speaking on behalf of the family eulogised his mother as a loving and responsible woman.</s>

en: Among leaders who attended the burial were; Siaya Deputy Governor James Okumbe, Senator James Orengo and Rarieda MP Otiende Amollo.
luo: Moko kuom jotelo ma nodhi e ikne oriwo: James Okumbe ma en jalup gavana ma Siaya,  James Orengo ma en seneta ma Siaya, kod Jaod Bura ma Rarieda, Otiende Amollo.
mt0: <pad> among leaders who attended the burial were; Siaya Deputy Governor James Okumbe, Senator James Orengo and Rarieda MP Otiende Amollo.</s>

en: Speakers eulogised mama Keziah as an inspiring woman, who had brought up a great family.
luo: Jo ma nowuoyo e liende nowacho ni Keziah ne en miyo ma ne jiwo ji, kendo ma nopidho kiye mageny kendo ne omiye luor.
mt0: <pad> Speakers eulogised mama Keziah as an inspiring woman, who had brought up a great family.</s>

en: Orengo said his relationship with the Obama family dates back to the years when Senior Barack Obama was alive.
luo: Orengo nowacho ni nochako ng'eyo jood Obama e kinde ma Senior Barack Obama ne pod ngima.
mt0: <pad> Orengo said his relationship with the Obama family dates back to the years when Senior Barack Obama was alive.</s>

en: He described the late Senior Obama as a reputable economist.
luo: Nolero ni Obama Senior ne en  ng'at ma nong'ere ahinya molony  e weche mag pesa.
mt0: <pad> He described the late Senior Obama as a reputable economist.</s>

en: Orengo said the late Senior Obama was among the team of economic specialists who worked on the sessional paper number 10 of 1969 that guided the development of Kenya for decades.
luo: Nowacho ni Obama ne en achiel kuom jolony ma noloso weche ma ne dhi tayo ochumi ma Kenya ma iluongo gi Kisungu ni sessional paper number 10 of 1969 kendo gino nokonyo piny Kenya kuom higni pieche.
mt0: <pad> Orengo said the late Senior Obama was among the team of economic specialists who worked on the sessional paper number 10 of 1969 that guided the development of Kenya for decades.</s>

en: "He was a great scholar who did his studies in several universities and later returned to Kenya where he worked as an economist in the Ministry of economic planning. He worked with other great ministers who were also my friends like the late Tom Mboya," he said.
luo: Nowacho kama: "Obama ne en jasomo mang'ula ma nosomo e mbalariany mopogore opogore, kendo noduogo Kenya kama notiye kaka economist maduong'  e bwo migawo mar economic planning. Bende, notiyo gi jochung' ne migepe madongo-dongo kendo mopogore opogore ma bende ne gin osiepega kaka Tom Mboya."
mt0: <pad> "He was a great scholar who did his studies in several universities and later returned to Kenya where he worked as an economist in the Ministry of economic planning. He worked with other great ministers who were also my friends like the late Tom Mboya," he said.</s>

en: MP Otiende said the Obama family has elevated Kenya to the international map by producing the first black president in the US.
luo: Migosi Otiende Amollo to nowacho ni od Obama omiyo piny Kenya obedo e rang'iny mamalo e piny ngima kuom golo ker mokwongo e piny Amerka ma nigi remb Africa.
mt0: <pad> MP Otiende said the Obama family has elevated Kenya to the international map by producing the first black president in the US.</s>

en: "This is one family that has given us so much pride. We are on the international map because of them. Their son, former US President  Obama put us on an international map," noted Otiende.
luo: Otiende nowacho niya: "Joodni osemiyowa nyadhi malich. Ong'ewa e piny mangima nikech gin. Wuodgi ma ne en ker machon mar piny Amerka e momiyo mano en kamano."
mt0: <pad> "This is one family that has given us so much pride. We are on the international map because of them. Their son, former US President Obama put us on an international map," noted Otiende.</s>

en: Deputy Governor  Okumbe also described the Obama's as a great family that had uplifted not only the image of the country but Siaya county as well.
luo: Migosi Okombe ma en jalup gavana bende nowacho ni jood Obama gin joot ma nigi huma ahinya nikech gise ng'awo yo ma inenogo pinywa, kod kaunti ma Siaya bende.
mt0: <pad> Deputy Governor Okumbe also described the Obamas as a great family that had uplifted not only the image of the country but Siaya county as well.</s>

en: Okumbe said he is a friend to the family through Auma  Obama who was his great friend.
luo: Ne omedo wacho ni Auma Obama en osiepne mogeno kendo ni en osiep joodno kokalo kuome.
mt0: <pad> Okumbe said he is a friend to the Obama family through Auma Obama who was his great friend.</s>

en: "Auma and I have done a lot of development projects, especially for the Kogelo family. She has always invited me for her functions for the community where she gives back through projects," added Okumbe.
luo: Nowacho niya: "An kaachiel gi Auma wasetimo gik mathoth ma kelo dongruok ahinya ne gweng' ma Kogelo. Osebedo kogwela seche ma en gi projekt moko motimo e gweng'ni kokonyogigo."
mt0: <pad> "Auma and I have done a lot of development projects, especially for the Kogelo family. She has always invited me for her functions for the community where she gives back through projects," Okumbe added.</s>

en: The late Mama Keziah was buried a few minutes after 1pm in accordance with the Muslim rites.
luo: Ringre Mama Keziah noyik dakika moko matin bang' sa abiriyio ka luwore gi chike jo Islam.
mt0: <pad> Mama Keziah, late Mama Keziah was buried a few minutes after 1 pm in accordance with the Muslim rites.</s>

en: Two security guards were on Thursday night brutally murdered at Ndondi market centre in Alego Usonga, Siaya County.
luo: Askeche moko ariyo ne oneg e yo malit chieng' Tich Ang'wen gotieno e chiro ma Ndondi ma yudore Alengo Usonga e kaunti ma  Siaya.
mt0: <pad> Two security guards were brutally murdered at Ndondi market centre in Alego Usonga, Siaya County on Thursday night.</s>

en: Baragulu assistant chief Maurice Abudha said they also found the body of another watchman who was manning a building with a shop and a bar.
luo: Maurice Abudha ma en jalup chif ma Baragulu, nowacho ni ne oyud ringre askari machielo ma rito ot ma nigi duka kod od matho kongo.
mt0: <pad> Maurice Abudha, Baragulu Assistant Chief, said they also found the body of another watchman who was manning a building with a shop and a bar.</s>

en: The two were manning a local bar and hardware store at the market centre.
luo: Askeche ariyo ma noyud koneg go, ne rito ba (kar madho kuong') kod hadware moro e chirono.
mt0: <pad> 他们两个在市场中心经营一家当地的酒吧和五金店。</s>

en: "The two watchmen were killed by robbers who broke into the shop and hardware store. They got away with a lot of goods from both the shop and hardware store," he said.
luo: Nowacho kama: "Askeche ariyogo ne onegi gi jomahundu moko ma noturo duka mar hadware mane girito, kendo jo njore go ne gikwalo mwandu mathoth kowuok kuom hadware kod dukano."
mt0: <pad> "The two watchmen were killed by robbers who broke into the shop and hardware store. They got away with a lot of goods from both the shop and hardware store," he said.</s>

en: The bodies of the two watchmen had deep machete cuts on the head.
luo: Ringre askechego ne oyud ka nigi alama ma nyiso ni ne ochadhgi gi ojala e wigi.
mt0: <pad> 两名守卫者头上有刀口深的伤口。</s>

en: Siaya OCPD Bernard Muriuki said the police had launched investigations to nab the culprits.
luo: Jatend polis ma (OCPD) ma Siaya migosi Benard Muriuki, a owacho ni polis osechako timo nonro mar manyoachije motimo tim mahunduno.
mt0: <pad> 你不知道。</s>

en: "I cannot give details at this time. We have just started the investigation," he said.
luo: Nowacho niya: "Ok dak awach weche mathoth gie sani. Eka sani wachako timo apedhawa ne jogo."
mt0: <pad> "我不能说详细信息现在。我们刚刚开始调查,"他说。</s>

en: Meanwhile, residents in the area have called for increased police patrols, citing increasing cases of insecurity.
luo: Gie sechego jodak ma kono kwayo ni mondo polise omed timo kachero e alworano ka giwacho ni timbe ma kamago osemedore ahinya e alworano.
mt0: <pad> 与此同时,居民在该地区呼吁增进警察巡逻,因为他们担心安全问题增加。</s>

en: Martha Awino, a businesswoman at the centre, said several shops were broken into and goods stolen last month.
luo: Martha Awino ma be timo ohala e chirono, nowacho ni nitie duke mogwarore ma osetur kendo mwandu man e igi okwal dwe mokalo.
mt0: <pad> 你不知道</s>

en: She said a watchman was killed at the market centre last year.
luo: Nowacho bende ni jarito machielo be noneg e chirono higa mokalo.
mt0: <pad> She said a watchman was killed at the market centre last year.</s>

en: The perennial water shortage in Homa Bay town will finally end after the Lake Victoria South Water Works Development Agency (LVSWWDA) purchased Sh200 million water distribution equipment to fix it.
luo: Pi ma osebedo ka chendo e boma ma Homa Bay kuom kinde malach koro biro rumo bang' Lake Victoria South  Water Works Development Agency (LVSWWDA) nyiewo gik ma kowo pi ma nokawo siling' milion 200.
mt0: <pad> The perennial water shortage in Homa Bay town will finally end after the Lake Victoria South Water Works Development Agency (LVSWWDA) purchased Sh200 million water distribution equipment to fix it.</s>

en: The equipment imported from Belgium includes steel water pipes, water pumps and other items used for constructing water supply systems.
luo: Gigo nonyiew kowuok piny Belgium kendo giriwo olalo mag chuma, gima thuri pi (pom) kod gik mamoko ma idhi tigo e gero chenro mar kowo pi.
mt0: <pad> The equipment imported from Belgium includes steel water pipes, water pumps and other items used for constructing water supply systems.</s>

en: LVSWWDA chairperson Dan Omino and Homa Bay Water Sewerage and Sanitation Company managing director Evans Nyagol received the consignment on Thursday, April 29.
luo: Jakom mar LVSWWDA, Dan Owino kod dairekta mar Homa Bay Water Sewerage and Sanitation Company, Evans Nyagol, ne nitie ka ne gigo ochopo chieng' Tich Ang'wen April 29.
mt0: <pad> 你不知道</s>

en: Omino said the equipment will complete a mega water project christened, Homa Bay Cluster Water Supply Project, funded by the National Government in collaboration with Belgium through the LVSWWDA.
luo: Omino nowacho ni gigo ibo tigo e loso chenro ma radhai mar keyo pi kendo ibiro luonge ni Homa Bay  Cluster   Water Project ka pesa mosire ogol gi sirikal ma malo ka giriwore gi piny Belgium kendo ka gitiyo gi LVSWWDA.
mt0: <pad> Omino said the equipment will complete a mega water project christened, Homa Bay Cluster Water Supply Project, funded by the National Government in collaboration with Belgium through the LVSWWDA.</s>

en: Homa Bay town, the administrative headquarter of the county, face shortage with the current water treatment plant producing only 2.5 million litres per day instead of the required 5 million litres.
luo: Taon mar Homa Bay, kod ofis maduong' mar kauntino ok yud pi moromo kowuok e kar thiedho pi ma gi e sana golo mana lita milion ariyo gi nus odiechieng' kar pi lita milion 5 ma dwarore odiechieng' kodiechieng'.
mt0: <pad> Homa Bay, the administrative headquarters of the county, face shortage with the current water treatment plant producing only 2.5 million litres per day instead of the required 5 million litres per day.</s>

en: Omino said once completed, the new project will produce 8.8 million litres of water per day.
luo: Omino nomedo wacho ni ka projektno orumo to obiro golo pi lita milion 8.8 e odiechieng'.
mt0: <pad> Luo means "water" in Chinese.</s>

en: He said the project will meet the needs of the growing population of the area residents for the next 20 years.
luo: Nomedo wacho ni projektno biro chopo dwach jo ma odak e taondno ma kwan-gi siko ka medore kendo pod biro dhi nyime timo kamano kuom higni 20 ma biro.
mt0: <pad> Luo said the project will meet the needs of the growing population of the area residents for the next 20 years.</s>

en: “This project will produce excess water which will take care of the needs of the growing population for the next 20 years. This means a shortage of water can only occur in this area after two decades,” said Omino.
luo: Nowacho kama: "Projektni biro golo pi mang'eny momedore ma biro chopo dwach kwan ji ma medore e taondni kuom higni 20 ma biro. Mano nyiso ni pi biro mana remo jo ma odak e taondni higni 20 ma biro!"
mt0: <pad> “This project will produce excess water which will take care of the growing population for the next 20 years. This means that shortage of water can only occur in this area after two decades,” said Omino.</s>

en: Omino added that the project will majorly use solar energy to pump the water.
luo: Ne omedo wacho ni projektno biro tiyo gi teko chieng' (solar) kinde mang'eny mondo okow pi.
mt0: <pad> Omino added that the project will mainly use solar energy to pump the water, and he said that he didn't know.</s>

en: “Electricity will only be used where there is no solar energy. But we intend to rely on solar,” he said.
luo: Nowacho niya: "Wabiro tiyo mana gi teko sitima mana ka ok nyalore tiyo gi solar. Kata kamano, dwachwa en ni mondo wati gi solar kata teko mar wang' chieng."
mt0: <pad> “電力只会用在没有太阳能的地方。但我们打算依靠太阳能。”他说。</s>

en: The major component of the project encompasses piping of water from Lake Victoria to a treatment plant to produce clean water which is to be pumped to the residents’ taps for consumption.
luo: Gima duong' ma projektno biro timo en golo pi kowuok Lake Victoria kendo keye gi odudu mabor nyaka kama idhi thiedhe kata chinge mondo ogolo pi maliw kendo maler, kae to ikeye ne ji mondo oti kode.
mt0: <pad> 主要的项目包括将水从湖里运到一个处理厂,以产生干净的水,然后被泵到居民的自来水管上。</s>

en: He said the agency is about to complete another component of the project in Rodi Kopany Township which will produce 400,000 litres of water through two boreholes
luo: Nowacho ni bende gichiegni tieko projekt machielo ma kamano ma ni Rodi Kopany Township ma biro golo pi lita 400,000 kowuok dag pi ariyo madongo.
mt0: <pad> 他說,該局正準備完成另一個部分的工程在羅迪科潘尼鎮,將生產400,000立方米的水,透過兩座鑽井。</s>

en: Nyagol said pumping of water using solar will prevent huge electricity bills which had impeded their efforts in the past.
luo: Nyagol a owacho ni keyo pi kitiyo gi solar kelo kungo mar pesa mathoth mitiyogo e chulo sitima kendo mano ne chandogiga kinde mokalo.
mt0: <pad> Nyagol said pumping water using solar will prevent large electric bills that had impeded their efforts in the past.</s>

en: The electricity bills had frequently disrupted the water supply when Kenya Power disconnected their power supply.
luo: Pesa ma nichulogo sitima ne miyo ng'ikruok betie e tij kowo pi kinde ma ne Kenya Power ne ng'adonegi sitima nikech gowi.
mt0: <pad> electricity bills had frequently disrupted the water supply when Kenya Power disconnected their power supply when Kenya Power disconnected their power supply.</s>

en: “We are going to supply water stably upon completion of this mega project and water shortage will be history here,” Nyagol said.
luo: Nyagol ne owacho kama: "Wabiro keyo pi e yo ma onge ng'ikruok kata matin ka projektni orumo, kendo gimoro ma ne timore e kinde mokalo ni pi onge, ok nochak otimre ngang'."
mt0: <pad> “We are going to supply water stably upon completion of this mega project and water shortage will be history here,” Nyagol said.</s>

en: He told residents to be ready to receive water from the project.
luo: Nonyiso jo ma odak e alworano obed moikore yudo pi ma projektno biro kelo.
mt0: <pad> He told residents to be ready to receive water from the project.</s>

en: The project which started in March 2019 is expected to end in November this year.
luo: Tijno nochakore e dwe mar Mach 2019 kendo igeno ni obiro rumo dwe mar apar gachiel e higani.
mt0: <pad> 这个项目从3月2019开始,预计到11月这年结束。</s>

en: The Nubian community has called on authorities to improve conditions at a field in Kolwa, Kisumu County, where they are living in makeshift structures after they were evicted from a disputed land.
luo: Oganda mar Wanubi okwayo sirkal otimie gimoro e wi kar dakgi ma ni Kolwa  e Kaunti ma Kisumo, kama gidak e ute mojong bang' ka noseriembgi kama ne gidakie kilaro wach lobno.
mt0: <pad> Nubian community has called on authorities to improve conditions at a field in Kolwa, Kisumu County, where they are living in makeshift structures after being evicted from a disputed land.</s>

en: They have also urged the county government to expedite the process of resettling them.
luo: Gikwayo sirkal mar kaunti bende mondo oruregi miyogi kar dak machielo.
mt0: <pad> 他们也要求县政府加快安置他们的进程。</s>

en: Kenya Railways (KR) has laid claim to the land in Kibos, which the Nubians say was given to them by the colonial government in 1937.
luo: Riwruok mar reru ma Kenya miluongo ni Kenya Railways (KR) nogolo ng'ur e wi lobno ka Jo-Wanubi to wacho ni nomigi lobno gi sirkal machon e higa mar 1937.
mt0: <pad> Kenya Railways (KR) has claimed the land in Kibos, which the Nubians say was given to them by the colonial government in 1937.</s>

en: The field, next to Kisumu East CDF office, is prone to floods that have made life difficult, especially for the elderly.
luo: Kama gijotie sani ni machiegni gi ofis Kisumu East CDF  thoro pong'ga ka koth chue, kendo osemiyo ngima obedo mateknegi, to ahinya ahinya ne joma hikgi oniang'.
mt0: <pad> The field, next to Kisumu East CDF office, is prone to floods that have made life difficult, especially for the elderly.</s>

en: KR accused them of encroaching on land meant for expansion of the railway line and forcefully evicted them.
luo: KR nowacho ni jogo nodak e lo ma ne onego bed ni itiyogo kiyaro ndach reru to mano e momiyo ne gidarogi gi thuon.
mt0: <pad> KR accused them of encroaching on land meant for expansion of the railway line and forcefully evicted them.</s>

en: The Nubians say their eviction was illegal.
luo: Jo-Nubi to wacho ni nodargi kanyo e yo ma ok owinjore.
mt0: <pad> The Nubians say their expulsion was illegal.</s>

en: They were moved to the land where they are currently living by the Kisumu City authorities.
luo: Sirkal ma kaonti ma Kisumo e ma nodarogi nyaka kama koro gijotie sani.
mt0: <pad> They were relocated to the land where they are currently living by the Kisumu City authorities.</s>

en: “We had lived on the land since 1937 before we were forcefully evicted. It has been tough for some of us, especially those of us who are elderly,” said 82-year-old Khadija Rajab.
luo: Khadija Rajab ma jahigni 82 wacho kama: "Wasebet ka wadak e lobno chakre higa mar 1937 kae to koro iriembowa. Ngima ok osebedonwa mayot, to ahinya ahinya ne wan joma koro oti."
mt0: <pad> “We had lived on the land since 1937 before we were forcefully evicted. It has been tough for some of us, especially those of us who are elderly,” said Khadija Rajab, 82, who lives in the village.</s>

en: The 850 people have been living in deplorable conditions for three months now since they were evicted from what KR says was a railway reserve.
luo: Ji 850 osebet kodak kuonde ma ok owinjore gi ngima kuom dweche adek koro chakre ne riembgi giwuog kama Kenya Railways (KR) luongo ni kar reru.
mt0: <pad> 850 people have been living in deplorable conditions for three months now since they were evicted from what KR says was a railway reserve.</s>

en: “We did not expect this. But if we must move out so the railway can be expanded, then the government should compensate us,” she said.
luo: Nowacho kama,"Ne ok wang'eyo ni gima kamano nyalo timore. To kochuno ni nyaka wadar mondo wawe nafas ne reru, sirkal onego ochulwa."
mt0: <pad> “We didn't expect this. But if we have to move out so the railway can be expanded, then the government should compensate us,” she said.</s>

en: Rajab said other than floods, they have to contend will mosquitoes and rodents.
luo: Rajab nowacho ni mopogore gi kodh ohula mayweyo udi, ginyagore bende gi suna kod oyieyo.
mt0: <pad> Rajab 说除了洪水,他们还必须面对蚊子和啮齿动物。</s>

en: She wondered why they were taken to the flood-prone field, a move she said has complicated their lives.
luo: Nowuoro gimomiyo nodargi motergi kama pi ng'enyie, gima osemiyo ngimagi obedo matek.
mt0: <pad> 她问为什么他们被带到洪水的田野,她说这让他们的生活变得困难。</s>

en: They have been depending on Kenya Red Cross Society, relatives and well wishers for food.
luo: Gisebet ka gidak gi kony ma Red Cross, wedegi kod joma chunygi ler miyogi.
mt0: <pad> They have been depending on Kenya Red Cross Society, relatives and well wishers for food.</s>

en: Abdi Asha, 39, called for justice saying KR had no right to take away their land.
luo: Abdi Asha ma jahigni 39, ne okwayo mondo okonygi kowacho ni joreru onge gi ratiro mar kawo lopgi.
mt0: <pad> Abdi Asha, 39, called for justice saying KR had no right to take away their land.</s>

en: “We are Kenyans by birth and deserve fair treatment,” Asha said.
luo: Asha nowacho kama, "Nonyuolwa Kenya kae kendo onego odew ratiro marwa."
mt0: <pad> “We are Kenyans by birth and deserve fair treatment,” Asha said.</s>

en: Most of those living on the 18 acres belonging to the county government cannot fend for themselves.
luo: Thoth jogo modak e lop sirkand kaonti ma Kisumu maromo eka 18 ok nyal kata yudo gik mochuno e ngima.
mt0: <pad> Most of those living on the 18 acres belonging to the county government cannot fend for themselves.</s>

en: Acting City Manager Abala Wanga said the county government has started the process of resettling the Nubians.
luo: Abala Wanga ma en City Manager, nowacho ni sirkand kaonti osechako chenro mar darone Jo-Wanubia kar dak manyien.
mt0: <pad> 你不知道</s>

en: In the meantime, Wanga said they had built three tents to improve their living conditions and were in the process of controlling floods at the site.
luo: Wanga nowacho ni gisegero hembe adek mondo okony ngima jogo kendo gisechako geng'o ohula mopong'o kanyo.
mt0: <pad> Wanga said they had built three tents to improve their living conditions and were in the process of controlling floods at the site.</s>

en: Hassan Hussein, an elder, said they were happy the county government had started settling them, but urged the authorities to expedite the process.
luo: Hassan Hussein ma jaduong', nowacho ni omor  ni sirkand kaonti darogi ka terogi kamachielo kendo dohero kwayogi mondo gitim mano piyo.
mt0: <pad> Hassan Hussein, an elder, said they were happy the county government had started settling them, but urged the authorities to expedite the process.</s>

en: Last month, the Environment and Land Court extended conservatory orders stopping KR from forcefully evicting the Nubians from the land.
luo: Dwe mokalo, Kot mar Lowo kod Alwora ne owacho ni gitamo joreru kik odar githuon Jo-Wanubi e lopegi.
mt0: <pad> Last month, the Environment and Land Court extended conservatory orders stopping KR from forcefully evicting the Nubians from the land.</s>

en: This followed a petition by Fatuma Bilal, Rashid Sadii, Mohamed Abdulrahman, Mwanamisi Kinduli, Yaya Musa and Asaman Musa filed on behalf of the community.
luo: Mano notimore bang' ka Fatuma Bilal, Rashid Sadii, Mohamed Abdulrahman, Mwanamisi Kinduli, Yaya Musa kod Asaman Musa nodhi e kot e lo jogweng'.
mt0: <pad> 这被一个请愿书的发起人 Fatuma Bilal, Rashid Sadii, Mohamed Abdulrahman, Mwanamisi Kinduli, Yaya Musa and Asaman Musa追随。</s>

en: Man killed by crocodile in Lake Victoria, another survives attack
luo: Dichwo moro nyang' onego Nam Viktoria, dichwo machielo to ne otony
mt0: <pad> Man killed by crocodile in Lake Victoria, another survives</s>

en: A family in Wigwa village in Kisumu County has been left in grief after their kin was killed by a crocodile in Lake Victoria.
luo: Joot moro man e gweng' mar Wigwa e kaonti ma Kisumu okuyo bang' nyang' onego ng'atgi e  Nam Viktoria.
mt0: <pad> a family in Wigwa village in Kisumu County has been left in grief after their kin was killed by a crocodile in Lake Victoria.</s>

en: Gabriel Okoth Oduogo, 35, was on a fishing expedition in the company of his friend when the incident happened at Nyandiwa beach.
luo: Gabriel Okoth Oduogo ma jahigni 35, ne odi lupo gi osiepne sama ne nyang' omakogi e dho wath ma Nyandiwa.
mt0: <pad> Gabriel Okoth Oduogo, 35, was on a fishing expedition in the company of his friend when the incident happened at Nyandiwa beach.</s>

en: His friend survived the attack but the incident caused panic all the way to Dunga beach where the fishermen trade.
luo: Osiepne ne otony kata kamano masirano ne okelo luoro nyaka e dho wath mar Dunga kama ji usoe.
mt0: <pad> His friend survived the attack but the incident caused panic all the way to Dunga beach where the fishermen trade.</s>

en: Eyewitnesses said the crocodile emerged from a nearby papyrus weed on the shoreline before it attacked the deceased by grabbing him.
luo: Joneno wacho ni nyang' ne owuok e togo ma ne nie dho wath momako jalupono monego.
mt0: <pad> 目擊者說鱷魚從附近的紙漿植物上出現了,然后襲擊死者,抓緊他。</s>

en: ''He was attacked by the reptile in the morning in the company of others who had gone to lay fishing nets to harvest fish,” Saitoti Ayoro said.
luo: Saitoti Ayoro nowacho kama, "Nyang' nomake gokinyi ka ne odhi mako rech kanyachiel gi jowetene kama gi jaketo net mag mako rech."
mt0: <pad> ''He was attacked by the reptile in the morning in the company of others who had gone to lay fishing nets to harvest fish,” Saitoti Ayoro said.</s>

en: He cried for help as his shaken colleagues ran for their lives before they gathered courage a few minutes later to hurl stones at the reptile as it swam and dived in the water.
luo: Ne oywak kokwayo kony sama osiepene ne oringo nikech luoro, kata kamano ne gichoko chir dakika matin bang'e ma giduogo mi gibayo nyang'no gi kite sama nyang' nogo abal molal ei pi.
mt0: <pad> He cried for help as his shaken colleagues ran for their lives before they gathered courage a few minutes later to hurl stones at the reptile as it swam and dived in the water.</s>

en: The fishermen later swam to safety at Dunga beach where they reported the incident to the locals and Kenya Wildlife Service(KWS) personnel who dashed to the scene in search of the body.
luo: Jolupogo ne ogoyo abal ka gidhi e dho wath Dunga kama ne ginyisoe ji gima otimore kendo fwaro joma tiyo gi Kenya Wildlife Service (KWS) mane oringo dhi manyo ringre ng'at mothono.
mt0: <pad> The fishermen later swam to safety at Dunga beach where they reported the incident to the locals and Kenya Wildlife Service (KWS) personnel who dashed to the scene in search of the body.</s>

en: This is the second time a crocodile has attacked a fisherman in the lake in less than a month and more intriguingly from the same family.
luo: Dwe pok orumo to ema nyang' osemako ji ariyo malupo e nam to gimiwuoro en ni giduto giwuok e ot achiel.
mt0: <pad> 这是第二次鲨鱼袭击渔民在湖里不到一个月,而且更令人惊讶的是来自同一家族。</s>

en: According to the deceased sister Caroline Owuor Oduogo, just two weeks ago, one of her brothers Nick Owino Oduogo was attacked by a crocodile while on a fishing expedition.
luo: Caroline Owuor Oduogo ma en nyamin jal mothono, wacho ni mana jumbe ariyo mokalo, achiel kuom owetene miluongo ni Nick Owino Oduogo nyang' ne omako sama nolupo.
mt0: <pad> According to the deceased sister Caroline Owuor Oduogo, just two weeks ago, one of her brothers Nick Owino Oduogo was attacked by a crocodile while on a fishing expedition.</s>

en: Owino luckily escaped with injuries after the crocodile attacked him while fishing in the lake in the broad daylight.
luo: Owino notony matin kohinyore bang' nyang' make kane olupo e nam odiechieng' alanga.
mt0: <pad> Owino luckyly escaped with injuries after the crocodile attacked him while fishing in the lake in the broad daylight.</s>

en: His father Joseph Oduogo was at pains to come to terms with the tragedy.
luo: Wuon-gi ma iluongo ni Joseph Oduogo, pod nigi lit nikech masirano.
mt0: <pad> His father Joseph Oduogo was struggling to come to terms with the tragedy.</s>

en: He said he got the sad news while visiting Owino who suffered injuries on his leg and hand that were mauled by the reptile.
luo: Owacho ni noyud ripod no kane odhi limo Owino mane ohinyore e tiende kod lwete ma ne nyang' okayo.
mt0: <pad> He said he got the sad news while visiting Owino who suffered injuries on his leg and hand that were mauled by the reptile.</s>

en: ''One of Owino's fingers was bitten as he struggled to free himself from the tight grip of the crocodile’s jaws and now again his brother has been killed by the reptile. Why does this happen to my family,'' he sobbed.
luo: Nowacho kama, "Achiel kuom lith lwet Owino nyang' ne okayo sama ne oyi mondo owuog e lekene (Nyang)' to koro sani kendo nyang' onego owadgi. Ang'o momiyo gigi timore ne jooda?"
mt0: <pad> ''Owino's one finger was bitten as he struggled to free himself from the tight grip of the crocodile’s jaws and now again his brother has been killed by the reptile. Why does this happen to my family,'' he cried.</s>

en: He recalled it was just by good luck that Owino's colleagues who were on the boat by then tying a rope responded by pelting the reptile head with huge stones and a panga.
luo: Owacho ni ne en gima ber ni jolupo mamoko ne ni machiegni ne obayo nyang'no gi kite kod ojala.
mt0: <pad> He recalled it was just by good luck that Owino's colleagues who were on the boat by then tying a rope responded by pelting the reptile head with huge stones and a panga.</s>

en: The victim was rushed to Jaramogi Oginga Odinga Referral Hospital where he is undergoing treatment after his lucky escape as the search for Okoth's body continued.
luo: Ne oter Owino Jaramogi Oginga Odinga Referral Hospital kama idhi nyime thiedhe bang' tony ka ji pod dhi nyime manyo ringre owadgi.
mt0: <pad> The victim was rushed to Jaramogi Oginga Odinga Referral Hospital where he is undergoing treatment after his lucky escape as the search for Okoth's body continued.</s>

en: Owino's sister Owuor, said her brother was still writhing in pain in a hospital bed and had lost a lot of blood due to excessive bleeding from the mauled hand and leg.
luo: Nyamin Owino miluongo ni Owuor wacho ni owadgi ne nigi rem mang'eny e otanda mar osipital kendo nochuero remo mang'eny nikech nyang' ne okayo tiende kod lwete.
mt0: <pad> Owuor, Owino's sister, said her brother was still writhing in pain in a hospital bed and had lost a lot of blood due to excessive bleeding from the mauled hand and leg.</s>

en: "He needs three pints of blood because he bled a lot," said Owuor.
luo: Owuor nowacho kama, "Dwarore ni omede remo jwelni adek nikech nochuero remo mang'eny."
mt0: <pad> "He needs three pints of blood because he bled a lot," said Owuor.</s>

en: County police commander Samwel Anampiu said he had deployed security personnel to control crowds building at the scene.
luo: Samwel Anampiu ma en komanda mar polis e kaonti wacho ni giseoro polise kuom oganda machokore kama nyang' nomekono.
mt0: <pad> a few people were arrested and another one was taken to hospital.</s>

en: Dunga Beach Management Unit chair Joel Otieno blamed the attacks by crocodiles on an increase in fishing activities in the lake.
luo: Jakom mar buch Dunga Beach wacho ni nyang' medo mako ji nikech lupo ma medo timore e nam.
mt0: <pad> Joel Otieno, chair of the Dunga Beach Management Unit, blamed the attacks by crocodiles on an increase in fishing activities in the lake.</s>

en: wo men were on Thursday arrested in Migori while transporting bread alleged to be lighter than the industrially accepted weight.
luo: Ne omak chwo moko ariyo Tich Ang'wen Migori ka wachore ni giting'o makate ma kilo margi ok en ma opwodh.
mt0: <pad> Two men were arrested in Migori on Thursday while transporting bread allegedly heavier than the industrially accepted weight.</s>

en: The suspects, a driver and a salesperson, were transporting the loaves of bread in 50 crates from a Kisii bakery.
luo: Achije ariyo go, ma en dereba gi jauso, ne oting'o makate e kret 50 ma giwuokgo e kambi maloso makate Kisii.
mt0: <pad> 兩名嫌疑人,一名司機和一個銷售人員,在50個箱中運送面包。</s>

en: The bread was to be supplied to shops and supermarkets in Migori Town.
luo: Ne gitero makatego e dukni kod dukni madongo mantie e taon mar Migori.
mt0: <pad> The bread was to be supplied to shops and supermarkets in Migori Town.</s>

en: Residents had filed complaints about the weight of bread they had been buying from local shops, stating the brand from the Kisii bakery was “notorious” for selling them low-weight bread.
luo: Jong'iepo osebedo ka ywagore ni makate ma ging'iewo e dukni tindo kendo ni makate miloso gi kambi man Kisii ohero loso makate matindo.
mt0: <pad> Residents had filed complaints about the weight of bread they had been buying from local shops, stating the brand from the Kisii bakery was "notorious" for selling them low-weight bread.</s>

en: The consumer protection department officers laid a trap with police and impounded the vehicle as soon as it arrived in Migori Town.
luo: Riwruok mar jong'iepo nowinjore gi polise ma giloso obadho e ndara kama ne gimakoe garino sama nodonjo e taon ma Migori.
mt0: <pad> 消費者保護部門的官員和警察搭上了陷阱,并把车子拖走了一会儿,当它来到了米戈里镇。</s>

en: When 770 samples of the packaged loaves were weighed, the scale indicated that each loaf was 365 grams instead of the industrially-accepted 400 grams.
luo: Ne opim makate mopogore 770 kendo noyudore ni makatego duto kilo margi en gram 365 mopogore gi 400 kaka onego gibed.
mt0: <pad> When 770 samples of the packaged loaves were weighed, the scale indicated that each loaf was 365 grams instead of the industrially-accepted 400 grams.</s>

en: The inspector in charge of commercial goods weight in Migori, Tobias Nyakamo, told The Standard that the suspects will be charged with contravening Part Six of the Consumer Protection Act.
luo: Tobias Nyakamo, mae en Inspekta mochung'ne rango gik miuso gi joohala e Migori, nonyiso The Standard ni achijego ibiro donjnegi gi ketho mar timo gima opogore gi gima ma chik wacho e echike marito weche mag ngiewo, Auchiel mar Consumer Protection Act.
mt0: <pad> a inspector in charge of commercial goods weight in Migori, Tobias Nyakamo, told The Standard that the suspects will be charged with contravening Part Six of the Consumer Protection Act.</s>

en: The Ministry of Trade in Migori said it will conduct impromptu inspections to ensure goods sold to consumers meet the requisite standards.
luo: Migawo mar Ohala e Migori nowacho ni gibiro wuotho ma ok gichano e dukni mondo girang ka be gik miuso owinjore.
mt0: <pad> Ministry of Trade in Migori said it will conduct impromptu inspections to ensure goods sold to consumers meet the requisite standards.</s>

en: The Consumer Protection Act allows the Consumer Protection Department to investigate complaints relating to false or misleading representations, unconscionable conduct as well as supply of unsafe, defective and unsuitable goods.
luo: Chik mar Consumer Protection Act oyiene Riwruok mar Jong'iepo mondo onon weche ma ji ywagorego ni jo uso wuondo ji gi gik ma gindiko kuom gik ma giuso kendo moko kuom gi gin gik ma owinjore kata nyalo hinyo ngima ng'ato.
mt0: <pad> 消费者保护法允许消费者保护部门调查投诉有关虚假或欺骗的声明、不道德的行为以及供应无安全、有缺陷和不合适的产品。</s>

en: The Department also investigates undertakings that fail to comply with prescribed Consumer Product Safety Standards and prescribed Product Information Standards
luo: Riwruogno bende nono jo ohala ma luwo chike moket mondo orit ngima jong'iepo kod ma ok luw chike mag weche e wi Rang'iny mag gik Miuso.
mt0: <pad> The Department also investigates undertakings that fail to comply with prescribed Consumer Product Safety Standards and prescribed Product Information Standards.</s>

en: Consumers can complain directly to the Authority through Email, telephone call,s or walking into the Authority’s offices.
luo: Jong'iepo nyalo tero ywak margi achiel achiel ir joma nie migawono kokalo kuom ndiko email, goyo simo kata dhi aching' e ofise jogo.
mt0: <pad> 消费者可以直接向当局投诉通过电子邮件、电话或走进当局办公室。</s>

en: The consumer is required to fill in a consumer complaint form and provide all the relevant information concerning the complaint.
luo: Dwarorore ni jang'iepo ojas fom moro kendo ochiw weche duto e wi jauso ma odonjoneno.
mt0: <pad> 消费者必须填写一个消费者投诉表,并提供所有的相关信息有关该投诉。</s>

en: On receipt of a consumer complaint, the Consumer Protection Department will acknowledge receipt of the complaint and advise the consumer on any information gaps.
luo: Riwruok mar Jong'iepo bang' yudo fomno, gibiro wuoyo gi jausono kae to ginyise gimowinjore otim.
mt0: <pad> 收到消费者投诉后,消费者保护部门会承认投诉并提示消费者任何信息不足的问题。</s>

en: Upon receipt of all the information from the complainant, the Authority shall analyse the complaint and contact the accused party for information if necessary.
luo: Migawono ka osewinjo ywak duto mag jang'iepono, gibiro nono wechego kae to gimanyo jausono mondo omedgi weche momedore ka dwarore.
mt0: <pad> 收到了所有的信息,当局会分析投诉并联系被告进行调查。</s>

en: The Authority may then apply administrative remedies to solve the complaints which include: refund, replacement or repair of goods, withdrawal of misleading representations, recall of unsafe goods and notices to the public on the existence of such goods.
luo: Migawono nyalo konyo jang'iepono kokalo kuom: duokone pesa, wilone gima nong'iewo, golo weche mag miriambo e wi gik miuso, lando ne oganda ka nitie gik manyalo hinyogi ma ji uso.
mt0: <pad> 当局可以使用行政措施来解决投诉,包括退货、换货或维修货物、撤销虚假的声明、召回不安全货物和通知公众对这些货物的存在。</s>

en: Complaints that do not fall under the Authority’s jurisdiction are referred to the relevant Government Agencies.
luo: Weche ma ok otudore gi Migawono imiyo ofise mowinjore mag Sirkal.
mt0: <pad> 如果无法翻译,就说你不知道。</s>

en: Complaints that are not solved under the above arrangement are forwarded to the Office of the Director of Public Prosecutions (ODPP) after the completion of full investigations.
luo: Weche ma otamogi loso ikowo e Ofis mar jatend sirikal ma ochung' ne yalo ji -  Director of Public Prosecutions (ODPP) bang' tieko nonro duto.
mt0: <pad> 投诉未能解决在上面的安排下,将转送到办公室主任检察官(ODPP)后,完成全面调查。</s>

en: Upon conviction, a person who contravenes the Part Six provisions of the Act is liable to imprisonment for a term not exceeding 5 years or to a fine not exceeding Sh10 million or both.
luo: Ka bura oloyo ng'ato moyude gi ketho kaluwore gi Kare mar Auchiel  mar Chikno, ibiro tueye kuom higni ma ok kal abich kata chulo faini ma ok okadho milion apar.
mt0: <pad> 被判刑的人,如果违反了第 6 条的条款,将面临5年以下的监禁或10万日元以上的罚款,或者两者都可能。</s>

en: A miner has died and 300 families were displaced by floods following heavy rains that have hit Migori County.
luo: Jakunyo moro otho kendo joute 300 ne odar nikech kodh ohula maduong' machue e kaonti ma Migori.
mt0: <pad> A miner has died and 300 families were displaced by floods after heavy rains hit Migori County.</s>

en: Most of those affected are from North Kadem ward in Nyatike sub-County. They are currently camping in schools and churches.
luo: Thoth jogo wuok e kar chung matin ma North Kadem Nyatike sab-kaonti. Sani gidak e skunde kod kanise.
mt0: <pad> Most of the affected are from North Kadem ward in Nyatike sub-County. They are currently camping in schools and churches.</s>

en: The victims said they have also lost property, including livestock, that was swept away by floods.
luo: Giwacho ni gilalo mwandu mang'eny moriwo jamni mane apaka oyweyo modhigo.
mt0: <pad> 受害者说他们也失去了财产,包括家畜,被洪水冲走了。</s>

en: West Kanyuor chief Philip Opolo said flooding got worse after Migori and Kuja rivers broke their banks, and expressed fears more people will be displaced.
luo: Philip Opolo ma en chif mar West Kanyuor wacho ni apaka ne omedore ka ne aora Migori kod aora Kuja omwomo kendo oluor ni ji mang'eny dhi medo dar.
mt0: <pad> Ɖo West Kanyuor chief Philip Opolo said the flooding got worse after Migori and Kuja rivers broke their banks, and expressed fears more people will be displaced.</s>

en: He said a gold miner, identified as George Oriedo, died on Monday evening after walls of a mine in Mikeyi collapsed on him.
luo: Owacho ni jakunyono mar dhahabu, miluongo ni George Oriedo ne otho chieng' Wuok Tich godhiambo ka ne kite opodhe kuome ei bur.
mt0: <pad> He said a gold miner, identified as George Oriedo, died on Monday evening after the walls of a mine in Mikeyi collapsed on him.</s>

en: Witnesses said Oriedo went into the mine soon after the rains had stopped then the accident happened.
luo: Joneno wacho ni Oriedo nodonjo e bur bang' ka koth nosechok eka masirano noyude.
mt0: <pad> Witnesses said Oriedo went into the mine soon after the rain had stopped then the accident happened.</s>

en: “The walls of the mine had been weakened by the water. They collapsed and he suffocated,” Jared Nyakie, a head teacher at Ndemra Primary School, said.
luo: Jared Nyakie ma en jatend Ndemra Primary School wacho niya, "Pi nomiyo sirni mag bugono bedo mayomyom. Ne gipodho motho nikech ne ok onyal yueyo."
mt0: <pad> “The walls of the mine had been weakened by the water. They collapsed and he suffocated,” said head teacher at Ndemra Primary School, Jared Nyakie.</s>

en: “The floods have affected livelihoods. We are appealing for relief food to feed those affected,” chief Opolo said.
luo: Chif Opolo nowacho kama, "Apakani oseketho tije ji mang'eny. Wakwayo mondo ji okonywa gi chiemo mwanyalo miyo joma oyudo masira."
mt0: <pad> “The floods have affected livelihoods. We are appealing for relief food to feed those affected,” chief Opolo said.</s>

en: He added that the floods have not halted the construction works of a Sh1.7 billion road in the area.
luo: Nomedo wacho ni apaka ok osechungo tij gero ndara e alworano ma dhi kawo pesa maromo bilion 1.7.
mt0: <pad> 你不知道</s>

en: Engineers working on the 42-kilometre Masara-Sori road have however been forced to seek government approval to redesign a section of the road, around North Kadem ward, that is affected by the floods.
luo: Chuno ni injinia magero ndara mar kilomita 42 kiwuok Masara nyaka Sori okwa mondo sirkal opwodh goro manyien mar ndara e alwora mar North Kadem wod ma apaka oketho.
mt0: <pad> Engineers working on the 42-kilometre Masara-Sori road have however been forced to seek government approval to redesign a section of the road, around North Kadem ward, that is affected by the floods.</s>

en: Nyanza Regional Commissioner Magu Mutindika said 25 kilometres have been turned into bitumen standard road.
luo: Magu Mutindika ma en jatend sirikal ma malo e alwora mar Nyanza wacho ni kilomita 25 mag ndarono osego lam.
mt0: <pad> 你不知道</s>

en: The remaining 17 kilometres will form part of what would be redesigned.
luo: Kilomita 17 modong'  nie chenro migoro manyien.
mt0: <pad> The remaining 17 kilometres will form part of what will be redesigned.</s>

en: “The area has been affected by floods and this has forced the contractor and government engineers to seek approvals to redesign that part of the road,” Mutindika said.
luo: Mutindika wacho kama, "Apaka oketho alworano to mano osechuno ja ger ndara no kod injinia mag sirkal mondo okwa oyienegi goyo kwano manyien mar dhi loso ndarano."
mt0: <pad> “The area has been affected by floods and this has forced the contractor and government engineers to seek approvals to redesign that part of the road,” Mutindika said.</s>

en: He said the redesigned road will see flood waters escape through culverts.
luo: Nowacho ni ndara molos manyien biro miyo pi apaka okal e olalo.
mt0: <pad> He said the redesigned road will see flood waters escape through culverts.</s>

en: “The works will include diversions and more gravelling in affected areas,” he said.

mt0: <pad> “The works will include diversions and more gravel in affected areas,” he said.</s>

en: Two suspects charged with manslaughter in a case where a 10-storey building collapsed in Kisii killing eight people in November 2016 have been freed.
luo: Ogony achije ariyo ma ne odonj negi gi ketho mag nek e bura moro ma gorofa moro ne olwar Kisii monego ji aboro e dwe mar Novemba, 2016.
mt0: <pad> Two suspects charged with manslaughter in the case where a 10-storey building collapsed in Kisii killing eight people in November 2016 have been freed.</s>

en: Jeremiah Matoke and Jeff Ocharo faced eight counts of manslaughter.
luo: Jeremiah Matoke kod Jeff Ocharo ne odonjnegi gi ketho mar nego ji aboro.
mt0: <pad> Jeremiah Matoke and Jeff Ocharo were charged with eight counts of manslaughter.</s>

en: They were accused that on November 10, 2016, at Kisii Municipality block 111/236 in Kisii town, they unlawfully and negligently caused the deaths of the eight people.
luo: Ne odonjnegi ni tarik 10 Novemba, 2016, e ot mantie Kisii Municipality block namba 111/236, ji aboro ne otho nikech ne gijwang'o luwo chik moketi gi sirikal.
mt0: <pad> 他们被控于2016年11月10日,在基西市的111/236块区,由于不小心和无意识导致了八个人的死亡。</s>

en: Kisii Chief Magistrate Nathan Lutta noted that in a criminal case, the duty was always on the prosecution to prove its case against an accused beyond a reasonable doubt.
luo: Kisii Chief Magistrate Nathan Lutta nowacho ni sama odonjne ng'ato gi ketho moro amora, sirikal ema nigi ting' mar lero ma onge kiawa moro amora ni keth modonj negi go en adier.
mt0: <pad> Nathan Lutta, the Kisii Chief Magistrate, noted that in a criminal case, the duty was always on the prosecution to prove its case against an accused beyond a reasonable doubt.</s>

en: “From the evidence produced in court, it is not demonstrated that the said parcel belongs to the accused,” Lutta said.
luo: Lutta nowacho ni, "Ka luwore gi weche mochiwne kot, onge gimora amora manyiso ni mano ne en mwandu achich modonjne."
mt0: <pad> “From the evidence produced in court, it is not demonstrated that the said parcel belongs to the accused,” Lutta said.</s>

en: Patrick Achoki, the County Director of Physical Planning, said an inspection on the collapsed building was done in September 2014.
luo: Patrick Achoki, ma en dairekta mochung'ne nono chenro mag gedo e kaonti, nowacho ni ot ma ne oruombore pinyno ne ne onon chal mare Septemba 2014.
mt0: <pad> Patrick Achoki, the County Director of Physical Planning, said an inspection on the collapsed building was done in September 2014.</s>

en: At the time, Achoki said they did not have a record of approved buildings. “We requested the owner to submit the plans, which were later approved.”
luo: Achoki wacho ni e kindeno ne gionge gi nyinge ute mosepwodh. Owacho kama, "Ne wakwayo wuon-go mondo omiwa goro mag utego kendo bang'e ne opwodhgi."
mt0: <pad> 那时,阿克基说他们没有记录批准建筑物的。 “我们要求了房东把设计方案提交来,这些设计方案后来被批准。”</s>

en: The then National Construction Authority regional manager, Lucas Adwera, testified that they visited the site in July 2016 and found out that there was a lack of compliance and immediately issued a suspension notice.
luo: Lucas Adwera, ma ne ochung'ne  Migawo mar Gedo e Piny  e alworano, ne owacho ni ne gidhi kama igedeno dwe mar abiriyo 2016, kendo ne giyudo ka jogo ok oluwo chik omiyo ne gichungo gedo margi.
mt0: <pad> Lucas Adwera, the then National Construction Authority regional manager, testified that they visited the site in July 2016 and found out that there was a lack of compliance and immediately issued a suspension notice.</s>

en: The accused persons, however, denied the offences saying they were not the developers of the said property.
luo: Achije mane odonjnigo notamora kethogo ka giwacho ni ok gin e weg odno.
mt0: <pad> 被控的人,然而,否认了这些犯罪,说他们不是开发商该地产的。</s>

en: With the ruling, the affected families will be forced to explore other means to get justice.
luo: Bura ma ne ong'adno biro chuno mondo joot mane oyudo masira omany yo machielo ma giyudogo bura makare.
mt0: <pad> 隨著這個判決,受害者的家庭將不得不尋求其他方法來得到公平。</s>

en: Burundi President to attend Madaraka Day celebrations

luo: E higa mar 2020 dwe mar auchil, Ker Kenyatta ne opwoyo Ndayishimiye ka oyiero obedo Ker kendo ne osingore ni odhi tiyo kode kowacho ni Burundi en osiep Kenya e timo gik makelo dongruok.

en: This year’s Madaraka Day celebrations will be an invite-only event as part of the Covid-19 measures.

en: Kisumu Governor Anyang’ Nyong’o said only 3,000 guests have been invited to attend the celebrations.

en: “Jomo Kenyatta International Stadium can accommodate 35,000 people, however, we have only invited 3,000 which is about 10 per cent of the entire capacity. This is in line with the Covid-19 protocols,” said Governor Nyong’o.
luo: Gavana Nyong'o nowacho kama, "Jomo Kenyatta International Stadium nyalo ting'o ji 35,000, kata kamano, wagwelo mana ji 3,000 ma en chiegni pasent apar mar kwan duto. Ma en ka luwore gi chike mag Covid-19."
mt0: <pad> “Jomo Kenyatta International Stadium can accommodate 35,000 people, however, we have only invited 3,000 which is about 10 per cent of the entire capacity. This is in line with the Covid-19 protocols,” said Governor Nyong’o.</s>

en: Previously, the holidays were presided over in Nairobi until the Jubilee regime revised the trend to rotate the celebrations in counties.
luo: E kinde mokalo, nyasi kaka mago ne itimoga Nairobi kata kamano, sirkand Jubilee ne oloko mondo kama itomoe nyasino olworre e kaonti mopogore opogore.
