en: Madaraka Day is celebrated every year on June 1 to commemorate the day Kenya attained internal self-rule in 1963 after colonisation from Britain.
luo: Nyasi mar Madaraka itimoga higa ka higa tarik 1 dwe mar auchiel ka iparogo odiechieng' ma Kenya nochako bedo gi loch margi giwegi e higa mar 1963 bang' bedo e bwo loch jo Britain.
mt0: <pad> Madaraka Day is celebrated every year on June 1 to commemorate the day Kenya attained internal self-rule in 1963 after colonisation from Britain.</s>

en: Rescue efforts on following collapse of county building in Nyamira
luo: Kinda mar reso joma ot oruombore kuomgi Nyamira
mt0: <pad> Rescue efforts on after the collapse of a county building in Nyamira</s>

en: Rescuers were last evening working against time to find survivors after the collapse of a Nyamira County Assembly building that was under construction.
luo: Nyoro godhiambo ne ji pod manyo joma otony bang' ka ot ma ne pod igero ruombore piny, ot ma dhi bedo Od Bura mar Kaonti ma Nyamira.
mt0: <pad> Rescuers were working against time to find survivors after the collapse of a Nyamira County Assembly building that was under construction last night.</s>

en: By 6.30pm, 25 workers out of 35 that were working at the site before it came tumbling down had been rescued.
luo: Ka ne ochopo sa apar gariyo gi nus odhiambo, ne oseres jotich 25 kuom 35 mane tiyo kanyo kane odno pok oruombore piny.
mt0: <pad> 6.30pm, 25 out of 35 workers who were working at the site before it came tumbling down had been rescued.</s>

en: The building at the county assembly collapsed minutes past 5pm.
luo: Odno mantie kama od bura mar kaonti nitie ne oruombore piny dakika matin tok sa apar gachiel.
mt0: <pad> 公堂在县议会倒塌了。</s>

en: Nyamira County Commissioner Gikaro Mariba told The Standard on phone that authorities were doing all they could to rescue those trapped.
luo: Jatend sirikal ma malo ma Nyamira (County Commissioner) Gikaro Mariba ne onyiso The Standard e simo ni gitemo kar nyalogi mondo gires ji duto momoko.
mt0: <pad> Nyamira County Commissioner Gikaro Mariba told The Standard on phone that authorities were doing all they could to rescue those trapped.</s>

en: "The rescue mission is ongoing. Locals and a combined team of government rescuers are on site to help those trapped," Mariba said.
luo: Mariba nowacho niya, "Chenro mar reso ji dhi nyime. Raia kod jo sirkal ni kama ot nopodhoe mondo gikony joma pod omoko."
mt0: <pad> "The rescue mission is ongoing. Locals and a combined team of government rescuers are on site to help those trapped," Mariba said.</s>

en: The staircase to the four-storey building collapsed as the workers prepared to leave the site after the day's work.
luo: Ngas ma ihidho go odno ne olwar sama jotich ne ikore mar wuok bang' tieko tijgi ma odiechieng'no.
mt0: <pad> 楼梯到四层的建筑物坍塌了,工人正准备离开现场。</s>

en: The main road in Kitutu Masaba constituency has for a long time been used as a political carrot to woo locals into voting for politicians who pledge to tarmac it.
luo: Ndara maduong mantie Kitutu Masaba osetigo nyading'eny gi josiasa ka gitemo sero ji ogonegi ombulu mondo gigo ndarano lam.
mt0: <pad> The main road in Kitutu Masaba constituency has been used as a political carrot for a long time to woo locals into voting for politicians who pledge to tarmac it.</s>

en: For over three decades, the Amabuko-Rigoma-Magombo-Kemera road has made and unmade politicians, as many have used it as a campaign tool.
luo: Kuom higni mang'eny, ndara mar Amabuko-Rigoma-Magomba-Kemera osemiyo josiasa oyudo loch to moko opodho nikech gitiyo kode e timo kampen.
mt0: <pad> Ɖo nǔ gěgě tɔ́n, Amabuko-Rigoma-Magombo-Kemera road has made and unmade politicians, as many have used it as a campaign tool.</s>

en: Nearly all the MPs who have been elected from Kitutu Masaba have pledged to have the road tarmacked from Kemera town, where it connects with the Kisii-Nyamira-Chemosit road to Amabuko shopping centre where it joins the Kisii-Keroka-Sotik-Nairobi highway.
luo: Chiegni ni Jood Bura duto moseyier Kitutu Masaba osega singore ni gidhi goyo ndarano lam kowuok taon mar Kemera kama oromoe gi ndara mar Kisii-Nyamira-Chemosit modhi nyaka chiro mar Amabuko ma orade gi ndara maduong' mar Kisii-Keroka-Sotik-Nairobi.
mt0: <pad> Nĩ ũndũ wa gĩtũma kĩa MPs o Kitutu Masaba nĩ ũrĩa ũkĩhĩtĩte nĩ ũndũ wa gĩtũma kĩu gĩa gĩtuthĩre gĩa gĩcigo gĩa Kemera, gĩkĩhĩtĩra gĩa Kisii-Nyamira-Chemosit road to Amabuko shopping centre gĩkĩhĩtĩra gĩa Kisii-Keroka-Sotik-Nairobi highway.</s>

en: It is not only MPs who have used the road as a political tool to win votes from residents; other leaders who have been eyeing other political seats have also used it.
luo: To ok en Jood Bura kende ema osekampen ka gitiyo gi ndarano mondo ji ogonegi ombulu, nitie jotelo mamoko ma be osetiyo kode.
mt0: <pad> 唔係 MPs yě 用咗路嚟做政治工具, 贏得居民嘅選票;其他領導人也用咗嚟,睇著其他政治位置。</s>

en: The late President Daniel Moi, retired President Mwai Kibaki and President Uhuru Kenyatta all used it as a campaign tool.
luo: Ker mane osetho Daniel Moi, Ker machon Mwai Kibaki kod Ker Uhuru Kenyatta notiyo gi wach loso ndarano e kampen ma ne gitimo.
mt0: <pad> 你不知道</s>

en: During Moi’s era, the road was marked for upgrading to bitumen standard but this did not happen because of the political winds of the time. Former area MP, the late George Anyona, became a fierce critic of Moi.
luo: E ndalo Moi, ne osechan ni idhi go ndarano lam, kata kamano, mano ne ok otimore ka luwore gi weche siasa ma ne nitie e ndalono. Jaod Bura machon mosenindo George Anyano ne kwedo mager loch Moi.
mt0: <pad> 在莫伊的时代,这条路被标记为升级到柏油标准,但由于政治风暴,这项工作没有进行。前议员乔治·安侬拉成为一个强烈的批评者莫伊。</s>

en: At one time, Anyona had promised to repair the road but because of lack of political goodwill from the government, that did not happen.
luo: Nitie kinde moro ma Anyona ne owacho ni odhi loso ndarano, kata kamano, nikech ok owinjre gi sirkal ne ok omiye pesa.
mt0: <pad> 以前,Anyona曾承诺修复这条路,但由于缺乏政治友善,那件事没有发生。</s>

en: President Kibaki also pledged to have it finished around 2010, but the road was never upgraded.
luo: Ker Kibaki be nowacho ni ne odhi tieko loso ndarano e higa mar 2010, to mano ne ok otimore.
mt0: <pad> President Kibaki also promised to have it finished around 2010, but the road was never upgraded.</s>

en: Having the road tarmacked remained a pipe dream until 2013 when the work began.
luo: Goyo ndarano lam ne obed lek nyaka e higa mar 2013 ka ne tij lose ochakore.
mt0: <pad> 把道路铺上柏油路一直是梦想到2013年,那时开始了工作。</s>

en: Uhuru and his Deputy William Ruto, while campaigning in 2013 ahead of the General Election, also earmarked the project for construction.
luo: Uhuru kod Jalupne William Ruto ka ne gitimo kampen 2013 ka yiero pok ochopo, ne giwacho ni gidhi loso ndarano.
mt0: <pad> Uhuru and his deputy William Ruto, while campaigning in 2013 before the General Election, also earmarked the project for construction.</s>

en: And in 2017, construction works on the road stalled at Gekano Tea Buying Centre after the contractor terminated the works.
luo: E higa mar 2017, tij gero ndarano ne ochung' gi alwora mar Gekano Tea Buying Centre bang' ka ngama ne omi orak mar lose weyo tich.
mt0: <pad> And in 2017, construction works on the road stalled at Gekano Tea Buying Centre after the contractor terminated the works.</s>

en: The other section near River Gucha bridge and a 15-kilometre stretch remain incomplete.
luo: Kuonde ma ne odong' ma ok otiek los e ndarano gin alwora man machiegni gi olalo mar Aora Gucha kod kama romo kilomita 15.
mt0: <pad> The other section near the bridge of the River Gucha and a 15-kilometre stretch remain incomplete.</s>

en: Area MP Shadrack Mose has been fighting to have the road completed before his term expires. His plan seems to succeed as a contractor is already the site to do the job.
luo: Jaod Bura makanyo Shadrack Mose osebedo kakedo matek mondo otiek loso ndarano ka pok owuok e loch. Chenroneno dhi ka tiyo nikech nitie jagedo ma osechako tij loso ndarano.
mt0: <pad> 路段的议员沙德拉克莫薩,一直试图把道路完成在他的任期结束前。他计划似乎成功了因为一个建筑师已经到现场做这项工作。</s>

en: Currently, survey works are being carried out by a Chinese company, which was given the contract.
luo: Tij survey e ndarano ne omi kambi moro mar Jo-China.
mt0: <pad> Currently, survey works are being carried out by a Chinese company, which was given the contract.</s>

en: “This is a very important road, which no one can ignore. Tea farmers in the area have faced difficulties in transporting their produce to the factories because of the poor state of the road. Such challenges will soon be a thing of the past,” Mose said.
luo: Mose nowacho kama, "Ma ndara maduong' ma ok onego ojwang'. Jopur ma odak e alworani chandore gi kaka ginyalo kowegi gik ma gikayo e kembe nikech ndara rach. Machiegnini, chandruogego biro rumo."
mt0: <pad> “This is a very important road, which no one can ignore. Tea farmers in the area have faced difficulties in transporting their produce to the factories because of the poor state of the road. Such challenges will soon be a thing of the past,” Mose said.</s>

en: Residents say completion of the road will give the area MP an upper hand in the 2022 polls.
luo: Jodak wacho ni ka otiek loso ndarano to mano biro konyo Jaod Burano e yiero mar 2022.
mt0: <pad> Residents say completion of the road will give the area MP an upper hand in the 2022 polls.</s>

en: “Mose will have higher chances of re-election if he pushes the government to finish the project before next year,” said Peter Mokua, a resident of Gekano.
luo: Peter Mokua modak Gekano, wacho kama, "Ka Mose okaso sirkal motieko loso ndarani ka higa manyien pok ochopo, mano nyalo miyo oyiere kendo."
mt0: <pad> “Mose will have higher chances of re-election if he pushes the government to finish the project before next year,” said Peter Mokua, a resident of Gekano.</s>

en: Oscars pushed back to April 2021 as film industry scrambles to adapt amid coronavirus

mt0: <pad> Oscars 推迟到四月 2021,电影业在疫情中急忙调整。</s>

en: Film's most prestigious award has had to be postponed after the industry took a major blow amid coronavirus.
luo: Ne ochuno mondo ochor Mich mag Oscar bang' ka josinembe noromo gi chandruoge mang'eny nikech corona.
mt0: <pad> 電影的最高榮譽獎項被推遲,因為電影產業受到了一個重大的打擊來自新型冠狀病毒。</s>

en: The Oscars ceremony for 2021 has been shifted back by nearly two months after the majority of films since March this year had to be put on hold.
luo: Nyasi mag chiwo mich Oscar e higa mar 2021 ne olok tarige gi dweche ariyo bang' ka thoth sinembe ma chakore Mach higani ne ochung.
mt0: <pad> Oscars 2021 已经推迟了近两个月,因为大部分电影从今年三月开始的都被放到停机。</s>

en: It has been moved from a February 28th to an April 25th date.This move should accommodate early 2021 releases, delayed because of the pandemic.
luo: Tarik owil kowuok e 28 dwe mar ariyo modhi tarik 25 dwe mar agwen. Mano dhi konyo sinembe mane ogol chak higani nikech tuo mar corona.
mt0: <pad> 它从2月28日转移到4月25日。这是为了容纳早年2021的发行,因为疫情推迟了。</s>

en: President of the Academy, David Rubin, and CEO Dawn Hudson, said of their decision: “For over a century, movies have played an important role in comforting, inspiring and entertaining us during the darkest of times.
luo: Ker mar Akedemino, David Rubin kod CEO Dawn Hudson, nowacho kama, "Kuom higni mokalo mia achiel, sinembe osekonyo ahinya e hoyo, jiwo kendo moro chuny ji sama weche tek.
mt0: <pad> 你不知道</s>

en: "Our hope, in extending the eligibility period and our awards date, is to provide the flexibility filmmakers need to finish and release their films without being penalized for something beyond anyone's control."
luo: Dwarowa maduong' sama wachoro nyime tarik mar chiwo mich, en ni mondo okony jolos sinema obed gi thuolo moromo mar tieko loso sinembegi ma ok gogi fain ne gima onge kaka ne ginyalo timo."
mt0: <pad> 我们希望,通过延长我们的资格期和颁奖日期,是提供电影导演们所需的灵活性来完成并发布他们的电影,没有被罚款因为什么超出任何人的控制。</s>

en: The new date’s means nominations will be announced on March 15th 2021, with the submission deadline for general entry categories (which includes Best Picture) on January 15th.
luo: Tarik manyien mochiwno nyiso ni ibiro yier jopiem tarik 15 Mach, 2021, to tarik mogik ma gibiro kawoe nyinge joma piem ne mich (moriwo mich Picha Maber) biro bedo Januar 15.
mt0: <pad> 新的日期意味着提名将宣布于3月15日 2021年,而提交截止日期为所有类别(包括最佳电影)是1月15日。</s>

en: It is yet another blow to music fans as Kenya mourns popular Benga artiste Erick Omondi who died of cancer in Bondo, Siaya County on Tuesday morning.

luo: Chiege, Goretty Awino kod Olima Gondi mawuoyo e lo-gi ema nowacho ripod thone.
mt0: <pad> His wife Goretty Awino and family spokesperson Olima Gondi confirmed the death.</s>

en: Long Lilo thrilled his fans with his husky voice and engaging lyrics during his prime days when he sang alongside Osito Kalle, another legendary Luo Benga icon who trained him.
luo: Long' Lilo ne moro chuny joherane gi dwonde mamit kod kaka nower ndalo mane ower kanyachiel gi Osito Kalile, ma be Ja-Benga mong'ere kendo ma ne otiege.
mt0: <pad> Luo</s>

en: Some of his hit songs include Goretti Awino, Were wuod Ogalo, Okoth Mang’ang’a, Kong’o shida, Anita Nyausonga , Thomas Mwaya and any more. In his song Japuonj, Omondi praises Osito Kalle for his ability to nurture other singers like himself, Odhiambo Tusker, Aluoch Pamba, Atommy Sifa, Ogina Koko (currently Ramogi FM presenter) and many others.
luo: Moko kuom wendege mong'ere gin Goretti Awino, Were wuod Ogalo, Okoth Mang'ang'a, Kong'o shida, Anita Nyausonga, Thomas Mwaya kod mamoko mang'eny. E wer miluongo ni Japuonj, Omondi pako Osito Kalile nikech nokonye kod jower mamoko kaka Odhiambo Tusker, Aluoch Pamba, Atommy Sifa, Ogina Koko (ma sani en jalendo e redio) kod jomamoko mang'eny.
mt0: <pad> Some of his hit songs include Goretti Awino, Were wuod Ogalo, Okoth Mang’ang’a, Kong’o shida, Anita Nyausonga, Thomas Mwaya and any more. In his song Japuonj, Omondi praises Osito Kalle for his ability to nurture other singers like himself, Odhiambo Tusker, Aluoch Pamba, Atommy Sifa, Ogina Koko (currently Ramogi FM presenter) and many others.</s>

en: Odhiambo Tusker after graduating from the hands of Osito composed a hit song Jopuonj, a piece which praised the efforts of teachers in the society and received widespread acclamation among the Luo fan base.
luo: Odhiambo Tusker bang' tieko tiegruok e lwet Osito, ne owero wer mong'ere ni Jopuonj, wendno ne opwoyo kinda ma jopuonje timo kendo ji mang'eny nohero werno e joherana ma Joluo.
mt0: <pad> Odhiambo Tusker after graduating from the hands of Osito composed a hit song Jopuonj, a piece which praised the efforts of teachers in the society and received widespread acclamation among the Luo fan base.</s>

en: Osito who mentored them also starred with other songs such as Lesna buoyo ma wiye, Asembo piny maber, Jaber jaula and much more.
luo: Osito ma ne opuonjo gino en be nowero wende kaka Lesna Bwoyo ma Wiye, Asembo Piny Maber, Jaber Jaula kod mamoko.
mt0: <pad> Osito who mentored them also starred with other songs such as Lesna buoyo ma wiye, Asembo piny maber, Jaber jaula and much more.</s>

en: Long’Lilo was reportedly ill with cancer for a long time and at some point was appealing for medical help.
luo: Kansa ne osebedo ka tuoyo Long' Lilo kuom kinde malach ma kata nitie ndalo moro ma ne okwayo mondo ji okonye.
mt0: <pad> Long'Lilo was reportedly ill with cancer for a long time and at some point was appealing for medical help.</s>

en: His death comes barely a week after Luo Ohangal fans were shocked with the sudden death of Abenny Jachiga who died in Kisumu abruptly and was buried with less than 48 yours against the wishes of his fans.
luo: Tho mare otimore ka kata juma achiel ema pok orumo are Joluo mohero Ohangla winj ni Abenny Jachiga otho apoya nono Kisumu kendo noyike mapiyo gi seche 48 mopogore gi dwach joherane.
mt0: <pad> His death comes barely a week after Luo Ohangal fans were shocked with the sudden death of Abenny Jachiga who died in Kisumu abruptly and was buried with less than 48 yours against the wishes of his fans.</s>

en: Nothing shakes the conscience of mankind than an unexplained death of a celebrity.
luo: Onge gima chandoga chuny oganda moloyo tho apoya mar ng'at ma nigi huma.
mt0: <pad> Nothing shakes the conscience of mankind more than an unexplained death of a celebrity.</s>

en: Ken Walibora was not your ordinary celebrity pushed to fame by benevolent spirits.
luo: Ken Walibora ne en ng'at ma nigi huma nikech weche mopogore.
mt0: <pad> Ken Walibora 不是你普通的名人,而是被善良的灵魂推到名人。</s>

en: At the time of his death, he was one of the most celebrated Swahili writers in Kenya and one of the universally acclaimed authors.
luo: Ne otho ka en achiel kuom jondiko mong'ere mag buge Kiswahili to bende nomiye luor kaka jandiko e piny ngima.
mt0: <pad> At the time of his death, he was one of the most celebrated Swahili writers in Kenya and one of the universally acclaimed authors.</s>

en: Lovers of literature are pained not just by his death but the brutal manner in which it came.
luo: Jogo mohero somo buge winjo marach ahinya nikech tho mare kod kaka notho malit.
mt0: <pad> 爱好文学的人伤心不只是他的死,而是他被残酷的方式所杀害。</s>

en: Such death is reserved for troublesome characters in literary works.
luo: Thoye ma kamago yudorega mana e buge kiwuoyo kuom joma ne ok beyo.
mt0: <pad> 这种死亡是为麻烦人物在文学作品中留的。</s>

en: In such extra ordinary circumstances, the people of Khabondi would seek solace in the emotive Luhya dirge “Olumbe luno toto lwakhabere lurungungwa, mana lukhaya khwira, ndakhaluwere ing’ombe!” translated to mean “If death could be paid to spare someone, I would have given death a cow”.
luo: Sama weche kaka mano otimore, Jo-Luhya nigi wer moro ma wacho kama, “Olumbe luno toto lwakhabere lurungungwa, mana lukhaya khwira, ndakhaluwere ing’ombe!” ma tiende kolok en "Ka dine inyalo chul tho mondo owe ng'ato, dine amiyo tho dhiang'."
mt0: <pad> If death could be paid to spare someone, I would have given death a cow!</s>

en: Admittedly, I have never physically met Walibora.
luo: An ne pok aromo gi Walibora wang' gi wang'.
mt0: <pad> 我承认,我从没见过Walibora。</s>

en: I first knew him in Standard Seven in primary school when my Kiswahili teacher Peter Busolo insisted that I read Siku Njema and explain the synopsis to him in seven days.
luo: Nakwongo winjo nyinge ka an e klas abiriyo e kinde mane japuonjna mar Kiswahili nochika ni asom bug 'Siku Njema' kae to alerne gima bugno wuoye bang' odiechienge abiriyo.
mt0: <pad> I first knew him in Standard Seven in primary school when my Kiswahili teacher Peter Busolo insisted that I read Siku Njema and explain the synopsis to him in seven days.</s>

en: By that time, Siku Njema was a compulsory Kiswahili set book in secondary school, but here was a village-bred juvenile being asked to interpret it.
luo: Ndalono, bug Siku Njema ne isomo e sekondari kata kamano, an to ne pod an nyathi primary to ema inyisa ni asom bugno.
mt0: <pad> By that time, Siku Njema was a compulsory Kiswahili set book in secondary school, but here was a village-bred juvenile being asked to interpret it.</s>

en: Mr Busolo understood the kind of books that would inspire students’ passion.
luo: Mr Busolo ne ong'eyo buge mane nyalo miyo nyithindo oher somo.
mt0: <pad> Mr Busolo understood the kind of books that would inspire students’ passion.</s>

en: That was the last time he asked me to read any of Walibora’s books.
luo: Mano e kinde mogik ma ne okwaya mondo asom buge Walibora.
mt0: <pad> That was the last time he asked me to read any of Walibora's books.</s>

en: I took it upon myself to monitor the author’s publications and read them.
luo: Bang'e, nachako manyo buge mamoko mag Walibora mondo asom.
mt0: <pad> 我自己控制了作者的出版物,并阅读它们。</s>

en: Walibora was a gifted story teller who understood an African village with magic.
luo: Walibora ne ong'eyo gano sigana mamit kendo nong'eyo timbe Jo Afrika.
mt0: <pad> Walibora a gifted storyteller who understood an African village with magic.</s>

en: Our continuous interaction has been through his works.
luo: Wang'eye mana kokalo kuom buge mondiko.
mt0: <pad> Our continuous interaction has been through his works.</s>

en: His characters lived among us.
luo: Ne chalo mana ka gima wadak gi joma wuoyo e bugene.
mt0: <pad> His characters lived among us.</s>

en: Walibora wrote about things that we could see in our daily lives as students. Most of his characters were an inspiration.
luo: Joma Walibora ne ondiko e bugene ne gin joma waneno e ngimawa mapile kaka jopuonjre. Thoth jogo ne jiwowaga.
mt0: <pad> Walibora 写了关于我们每天的生活中的事物。许多他的人物都是一个灵感。</s>

en: I drew quite a number of lessons from Walibora’s works that have guided me to date.
luo: Nitie puonj mang'eny ma ne ayudo e buge Walibora mosetayo ngimana nyaka sani.
mt0: <pad> 我从Walibora的著作中吸取了许多教训,这些教训一直为我导航到现在。</s>

en: In his master piece Siku Njema, Walibora demystifies the long held African concept of illegitimate children with a single phrase “Mwanaharamu hamna, kitendo ndicho cha haramu” to mean “there is no illegitimate child, it is the act that is illegitimate”.
luo: E buk mane ondiko mong'ere ni Siku Njema, Walibora nokwedo paro monya ma ji nigo e wi nyithindo ma minasi kowacho kama, “Mwanaharamu hamna, kitendo ndicho cha haramu” ma tiende en, "Onge nyathi ma ok owinjore onyuol, tim miyudego ema ok owinjore."
mt0: <pad> 'Mwanaharamu hamna, kitendo ndicho cha haramu'</s>

en: Walibora’s main character in Siku Njema, Msanifu Kombo happens to be such a child. Through him, we are exposed to traumatising experiences that single mothers and their children go through.
luo: Jal miwuoyo kuome ahinya e Siku Njema iluongo ni Msanifu Kombo kende en be ne nyathi ma ne onyuol kamano. Kokalo kuom sigande, ileronwa chandruoge ma mine modak kendgi kaloe kod nyithindgi.
mt0: <pad> Walibora's main character in Siku Njema, Msanifu Kombo happens to be such a child. Through him, we are exposed to the traumatising experiences that single mothers and their children go through.</s>

en: The contempt with which society treats such children, and above all, their determination to succeed amid such challenges.
luo: Ileronwa bende kaka joma odak e alwora kwedoga nyithindo ma kamago kod kaka nyithindogo nyagore.
mt0: <pad> 社會對這種孩子們的輕視,以及最重要的是他們決心成功在這樣的挑戰中。</s>

en: Perhaps it is because of his humble upbringing or the strict Christian upbringing under Jehova’s Witness denomination.
luo: Nyalo bedo ni gima konyo Walibora ndiko buge mabeyo kamano en nikech nopon e od joma oluoro Nyasaye e din mar Jehovah's Witness kata Joneno mag Jehova.
mt0: <pad> 也許是因為他的低調的長大或嚴格的基督教教育在Jehovah's Witnesses信仰中,他會這麼做。</s>

en: In my teaching of Children Law, I have found myself citing Walibora more than any other literary scholar.
luo: Asefwenyo ni ahero wacho weche ma ne Walibora owacho moloyo jondiko mamoko sama apuonjo Chik mar Nyithindo.
mt0: <pad> 在我的教学儿童法中,我发现自己引用瓦里博拉比其他文学学者的著作更多。</s>

en: His contribution to jurisprudence cannot be gainsaid.
luo: Walibora nokonyo ahinya e weche Chik.
mt0: <pad> His contribution to jurisprudence cannot be overstated.</s>

en: As a lawyer, I draw inspiration from Walibora’s book Kufa Kuzikana, translated by Prof Egara Kabaji et al as “Friends for Life”.
luo: An okil, kendo ahero ahinya somo buk mane Walibora ondiko miluongo ni "Kufa Kuzikana" ma Profesa Egara Kabaji oloko ni "Osiepe ma Ngita gi Del."
mt0: <pad> As a lawyer, I draw inspiration from Walibora's book Kufa Kuzikana, translated by Prof Egara Kabaji et al as "Friends for Life".</s>

en: In this text, a litigant who has made several trips to a lawyer’s office to claim money paid to the lawyer by an insurance company after an accident eventually commits suicide when the lawyer becomes uncooperative.
luo: E bugno, iwuoyo kuom ng'at moro ma ne odere nikech ne odhi e ofis okil mondo omiye pesa mar insurance bang' yudo hinyruok to okil notamore.
mt0: <pad> 这篇文章中,一个律师的客户已经去过几次律师办公室来要求保险公司支付给律师的钱,但却没有得到任何帮助,最后自杀了。</s>

en: The mastery of African idioms runs through his works.
luo: Bugene mang'eny opong' gi ngeche mag Jo-Afrika.
mt0: <pad> The mastery of African idioms runs through his works.</s>

en: Such lawyers within the legal circles are known as ambulance chasers. They exist in every corner of this country; taking advantage of victims of accidents to mint millions of shillings.
luo: Okinde kaka mago iluongo ni joma lawo geche mating'o jotuo. Giyudore kamora amora e pinyni, kendo gihero tiyo gi thuolo moneno sama aksident otimore mondo giyudo pesa mang'eny.
mt0: <pad> 这样的律师在法律界被称为“救护车追踪者”。他们存在于这个国家每一个角落,利用事故的受害者来赚取数千万的shillings。</s>

en: My prayer is that the fate of Walibora’s characters will not befall him in death.
luo: Lamona en ni tho Walibora kik ochal gi mag joma ondiko e bugene.
mt0: <pad> 我希望Walibora的角色不會被他的死襲到。</s>

en: In such a society as ours, it calls for the courage and sobriety of men like Walibora to expose the social evils bedeviling mankind.
luo: E kindewagi, dwaro ni ng'ato ni obed gi chir kaka Walibora mondo onyeny e lela gik maricho matimore.
mt0: <pad> 在这样的社会中,我们需要勇气和清醒的男人像瓦利博拉来揭露社会的坏处。</s>

en: The social pretense, political expediency and economic marginalisation are some of the things that informed Walibora’s works.
luo: Moko kuom gik miwuoyoe e buge Walibora oriwo wuodruok ma ji nigo, wuondruok mag josiasa kod mibadhi e weche pesa.
mt0: <pad> Social pretense, political expediency and economic marginalisation are some of the things that informed Walibora's works.</s>

en: The simplicity with which he told complex stories reveals the character of a man who was attached to society.
luo: Nohera ahinya ji to mano nenore gi kaka nolero mayot sigendni mogajore.
mt0: <pad> The simplicity with which he told complex stories reveals the character of a man who was attached to society.</s>

en: The soils will consume the finest brains of our land.
luo: Jomariek tho rumo.
mt0: <pad> The soils will consume the finest brains of our land.</s>

en: Literature can be very predictive. Many things that Walibora wrote about have come to pass.
luo: Seche moko buge nyalo koro gik madhi timore. Thoth gik ma Walibora nondiko osetimore.
mt0: <pad> Literature can be very predictive. Many things that Walibora wrote about have come to pass.</s>

en: His death and burial resemble that of the characters he wrote about.
luo: Thone kod kaka noyike chalo gi mag joma ne ondiko e bugene.
mt0: <pad> His death and burial resemble that of the characters he wrote about.</s>

en: In William Shakespeare’s words, my heart is in that grave where Walibora’s remains are being preserved.
luo: Katiyo weche ma William Shakespear nowacho, chunya nie bur kama okanie ringre Walibora.
mt0: <pad> 我心在墓中,那里是瓦利博拉的遗体被保存。</s>

en: Blessed are the soils of that quiet village in Cherangany, where Walibora was laid to rest.
luo: Lowo mane oyikie Walibora en gweng' mar Cherengany en kama oguedhi.
mt0: <pad> Blessed are the soils of that quiet village in Cherangany, where Walibora was laid to rest.</s>

en: To your fans, we shall remain friends wa Kufa Kuzikana as we wait for that Siku Njema that we shall join you wherever you are!
luo: Ne johera mag Ken Walibora, wabiro siko ka wan osiepe ma Kufa Kuzikana ka warito Siku Njema ma wabiro romoe gi Walibora kendo.
mt0: <pad> Fans, we will remain friends wa Kufa Kuzikana as we wait for that Good Day that we will join you wherever you are!</s>

en: May his soul rest in peace.
luo: Mad chunye obed kama okuwe.
mt0: <pad> May his soul rest in peace.</s>

en: Hyrax Hills National Museum, one of Kenya’s critical archaeological sites and a national monument is marking 100 years of existence this month.
luo: Hyrax Hills National Museum, ma oting'o gige machon mag Kenya, timo e dweni nyasi mar paro betie margi kuom higni 100.
mt0: <pad> 你不知道</s>

en: The famous archaeological site which has since placed Kenya as home of Early Man opened its doors in 1920, to host rich history and has since inspired history and geography lessons in schools.
luo: Kama ong'ereno moting'o gik machon miyo ikwano Kenya kaka kama dhano mokwongo ne okwongo dakie, ne oyaw e higa mar 1920 kendo osekonyo e puonjo histori kod jografi e skunde.
mt0: <pad> The famous archaeological site that has since placed Kenya as home of the Early Man opened its doors in 1920, to host rich history and has since inspired history and geography lessons in schools.</s>

en: The museum was declared a national monument in 1945, but opened its doors to the public in 1965.
luo: Museumno ne oland kaka mwandu sirkal e higa mar 1945, kata kamano ne oyiene ji chako donjoe e higa mar 1965.
mt0: <pad> The museum was declared a national monument in 1945, but it opened its doors to the public in 1965.</s>

en: “This month marks 100 years of existence of this archaeological site that is just another classroom for thousands of learners across the country who visit,” Lilian Amwada, the museum’s curator said.
luo: Lilian Amwanda, mochung' ne museumno, wacho kama, "E dweni kae biro rwako higni 100 kendo osebedo kaka klas ne jopuonjre alufe e piny mabiroga limbe."
mt0: <pad> “This month marks 100 years of existence of this archaeological site that is just another classroom for thousands of learners across the country who visit,” Lilian Amwada, the museum’s curator said.</s>

en: And while the museum has been a source of knowledge on early humans, the number of visitors touring the site has been low, a move which has also seen a raft of initiatives in place to boost the numbers.
luo: Kata obedo ni museumno osebedo ka konyo ji ng'eyo weche e wi joma chon, jok ma biro limbe kanyo kwan margi osebedo ka dok chien to mano osemiyo olos chenro moko mondo otem ywayo ji momedore obi olim kanyo.
mt0: <pad> 虽然博物馆是人类的起源,但游客数量一直低。</s>

en: “We have carried out renovations and also initiated talent programmes for children in a bid to make the young learners visit the museum more for key lessons,” Ms Amwada said.
luo: Amwanda nowacho kama, "Waloso kuonde mokethore kendo wachako timo piem mag talent ne nyithindo mondo mano oywagi gibi gipuonjre weche momedore."
mt0: <pad> “We have carried out renovations and also initiated talent programmes for children in an attempt to make the young learners visit the museum more for key lessons,” Ms Amwada said.</s>

en: Hyrax, is part of the part of the critical, geologically rich areas in Rift Valley that provides tales of  historical footprints left behind by Early Man.
luo: Hyrax en achiel kuom kuonde mayudore Rift Valley machiwo puonj e wi ngima dhano makwongo e histori.
mt0: <pad> Hyrax,是一部分的地質豐富的河谷裂谷中的一个重要部分,提供故事的历史痕迹留给原始人。</s>

en: It also boasts of a rich history of volcanic activities and information on the formation of the Rift Valley.
luo: Oting'o bende histori ma nyalilanda e wi gik mane otimore e gode man kuno kod kaka Rift Valley ne olosore.
mt0: <pad> 它也拥有丰富的历史关于火山活动和信息关于裂谷的形成。</s>

en: The site, is also part of patches of archaeological sites that makes Kenya and especially the Rift Valley a hotbed of archaeological discoveries alongside Kariandusi Archeological site in Gilgil.
luo: Hyrax en achiel kuom kuonde mang'eny moting'o gige machon mamiyo Kenya to ahinya ahinya Rift Valley kod Kariandusi, Gilgil bedo kuonde moting'o weche mathoth e ngima machon.
mt0: <pad> Site, is also part of patches of archaeological sites that make Kenya and especially the Rift Valley a hotbed of archaeological discoveries alongside Kariandusi Archeological site in Gilgil.</s>

en: Particularly, Hyrax hills museum is named after hyraxes that lived in the rocks within and is famous for keeping the history of Sirikwa people who are believed to have been assimilated with the Maasai community.
luo: Museum mantie Hyrax hills ne omi nyingno bang' gik miluongo ni hyrax ma ne odak e kite madongo kendo kanyo ong'ere nikech oting'o histori mar Jo-Sirikwa ma wachore ni ne olokore mobedo Maasai.
mt0: <pad> Ītɔ́n, Hyrax Hills Museum yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ gěgě a yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ gěgě a yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ gěgě a yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ gěgě a yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ gěgě a yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ gěgě a yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ gěgě a yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ gěgě a yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ gěgě a yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ gěgě a yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ gěgě a yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ gěgě a yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ gěgě a yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ gěgě a yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ gěgě a yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ gěgě a yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ gěgě a yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ gěgě a yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ gěgě a yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ gěgě a yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ gěg

en: The museum, has since been an archaeological research area and reference point for pre-historical investigations.
luo: Jogo ma dwaro timo nonro e wi gik mane otimore chon ahinya e ngima dhano dhiga e museumno.
mt0: <pad> The museum, has since been an archaeological research area and reference point for pre-historical investigations.</s>

en: It is also believed to be the first Acheulian site to be discovered in the region.
luo: Wachore bende ni kanyo ema nokwong yudie gik ma dhano mokwongo ne tiyogo e loso gik moko.
mt0: <pad> 它也被认为是第一个阿克琉斯人遗址在该地区发现的。</s>

en: Records from the museum however reveal low visitation despite the critical role in education sector with the bulk of visitors being learners.
luo: Rekod mag museumno nyiso ni kwan mag welo ma limo kanyo tin kata obedo ni migawo mar somo temo matek mondo ong'ere kendo joma dhiga kanyo thothgi gin jopuonjre.
mt0: <pad> 记录从博物馆显示低访客,尽管该馆在教育行业发挥着重要作用,而大部分的游客都是学生。</s>

en: In 2016, Hyrax Hills National Museum recorded 21,781 visitors of whom 17,667 were learners from primary, secondary and institutions of higher learning.
luo: E higa mar 2016,  Hyrax Hills National Museum nowacho ni ne giyudo welo maromo 21,781 to ji 17,667 kuomgi ne gin jopuonjre mag skund primary, sekondar kod kuonde somo mamalo.
mt0: <pad> 你不知道</s>

en: In 2018, the museum generated Sh1.6 million while in 2019, total revenues amounted Sh1.7 million.
luo: E higa mar 2018, museumno ne oyudo pesa maromo siling milion 1.6 to e higa mar 2019, ne pesa duto ma gin go ne en siling milion 1.7.
mt0: <pad> In 2018, the museum generated Sh1.6 million, and in 2019, total revenues amounted to Sh1.7 million.</s>

en: The same year, the museum generated Sh1.8 million and the following year, the revenues dropped slightly to Sh1.6 million with over 23,000 visitors making to the museum.
luo: E higa achielno, museum noyudo milion 1.8 to e higa ma ne oluwo, pesa manochok nodok chien nyaka milion 1.6 ka welo ma ne olimo museum kwan margi ne okalo 23,000.
mt0: <pad> Same year, the museum generated 1.8 million and the following year, the revenues dropped slightly to 1.6 million with over 23,000 visitors making to the museum.</s>

en: Primary and secondary school learners mostly visit the museum with records showing that 12,169 learners from primary and secondary school visited the museum.
luo: Jo primary kod jopuonjre sekondary ema thothne limo museum rekod nyiso ni kwan mar jopuonjrego ne ochopo 12,169.
mt0: <pad> Primary and secondary school learners mostly visit the museum with records showing that 12,169 learners from primary and secondary school visited the museum.</s>

en: 5,498 students from colleges and universities visited the museum the same year.

mt0: <pad> 5,498 students from colleges and universities visited the museum the same year.</s>

en: Locals visiting the museum are mostly couples visiting for nature trails.
luo: Jo-Kenya mamoko ma limo museumno thothgi gin jomokendore ma obiro bayo.
mt0: <pad> 本地人到博物馆都是情侣来观赏自然风景。</s>

en: With charges as low as Sh100 for an adult local citizen and Sh50 for a child charged in these sites, locals still miss out with visitors barely making to 30,000 in a year.
luo: Pesa midonjogo tin nikech jomadongo chulo siling 100 to nyithindo chulo 50, to ema pod Jo-Kenya mang'eny ok bi ka kwan-gi tekga mondo ochop ji 30,000 e higa.
mt0: <pad> 以100元为大人,50元为儿童的费用在这些景点上,当地人仍然没有获得旅游收入,因为游客数量不到30,000一年。</s>

en: The Hyrax hills was proclaimed a national monument in 1945 and opened to public in 1965 but despite the significance it has, it has lost two and a half acres of its over 50 acres of land to squatters.
luo: Hyrax hills ne oland kaka mwandu sirkal e higa mar 1945, kata kamano ne oyiene ji chako donjoe e higa mar 1965, to kata obedo ni en kaka lich kamano, oselalo lowo maromo eka ariyo gi nus ne jodak kuom eka 50 ma en go.
mt0: <pad> The Hyrax hills was proclaimed a national monument in 1945 and opened to public in 1965 but despite its significance, it has lost two and a half acres of its over 50 acres of land to squatters.</s>

en: According to the National Lands Commission Nakuru County coordinator Frank Kimbelekenya, part of the land has been grabbed.
luo: Ka luwore gi Frank Kimbelekenya ma en jachan bura mar National Lands Commission e kaonti mar Nakuru, ne owacho ni jodak okawo gi thuon lop museum.
mt0: <pad> According to the National Lands Commission Nakuru County coordinator Frank Kimbelekenya, part of the land has been grabbed.</s>

en: Covid-19 has given a new lease of life to an old song about social distancing.
luo: Covid-19 ochiero wer moro machon ma ne wuoyo e bedo mabor gi wadu.
mt0: <pad> Covid-19 给了一个新的生命,一个老歌关于社交距离。</s>

en: Micah Maritim (pictured) the singer who composed the song 18 years ago, is also basking in new-found glory.
luo: Micah Maritim (monyis e picha) e jawer mane ondiko werno higni 18 mokalo kendo sani humbe landore.
mt0: <pad> Micah Maritim (pictured) the singer who composed the song 18 years ago, is also basking in new-found glory.</s>

en: In the 10-minute song, Maritim warns about a certain incurable disease, urging his listeners to literally run to the hills for safety.
luo: E wer makawo dakika aparno, Maritim chiwo siem e wi tuo moro ma onge yadhe, kendo ojiwo jowinjo mondo oring odhi e gode giyud resruok.
mt0: <pad> 在10分钟的歌曲中,Maritim警告人们一个不可治愈的疾病,并鼓励他们奔向山上以保护自己。</s>

en: “Don’t let anyone touch you/ even when you are in bed sleeping/ Don’t brush shoulders with anyone even when you are walking around/ Don’t shake hands with anyone; and why should you? do you know that the person has come from or touched....?” Goes part of the chorus.
luo: Bath koras mar wendno wacho kama, "Kik iwe nga'to omuli/ kata sama inindo e otanda; Kik ituomri gi ng'ato ang'ata sama iwuotho; Kik imos lwet ng'ato; ang'o momiyo idwa mose? Be ing'eyo kama ng'atno oaye kota omulo…?"
mt0: <pad> 不要让任何人碰你/即使是在睡觉的时候/不要与任何人擦肩,即使是在走路的时候/不要握手,为什么?你知道这个人从哪里来过或触摸过你吗?</s>

en: The 62-year-old singer from Bomet County is known for his social commentary.
luo: Jawerno ma sani jahigni 62 kendo owuok e kaonti mar Bomet bende ong'ere gi weche mojawachoga.
mt0: <pad> 62-year-old singer from Bomet County is known for his social commentary.</s>

en: He said he composed the uncharacteristically lengthy song in 2002.
luo: Owacho ni ondiko wer ma rarieyano e higa mar 2002.
mt0: <pad> He said he composed the uncharacteristically lengthy song in 2002.</s>

en: “At the time, I was in Eldoret and television channels were awash with reports of Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS) which had broken out in China and was spreading to other countries,” Maritim said.
luo: Maritim wacho kama, "E kindeno, nadak Eldoret kendo nilando e tv ripode mag tuo miluongo ni Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS) mane omouch China kendo landore e pinje mamoko."
mt0: <pad> 我当时在埃尔多伦,电视报道报导了严重呼吸道症(SARS)的爆发,从中国开始扩散到其他国家。</s>

en: “From the scary news clip I saw medics in protective gear attending to patients, and outside, police officers were chasing people off the streets. It was then that I decided to compose a song about this phenomenon.”
luo: Odhi nyime wacho kama, "Pichni ma ne anenogo ne nyalo bwogo ng'ato kendo naneno laktech kobawore gi lewni moumo dendgi duto sama githietho jotuo, to polise ne riembo ji odog e utegi. Mano e ma nomiyo andiko wendno."
mt0: <pad> “From the scary news clip I saw medics in protective gear attending to patients, and outside, police officers were chasing people off the streets. It was then that I decided to compose a song about this phenomenon.”</s>

en: He says that he did not even sit down to write lyrics to the song titled “SARS”.
luo: Owacho ni ne ok obet piny mondo ondik weche wer miluongo ni "SARS".
mt0: <pad> He says that he did not even sit down to write lyrics to the song titled "SARS".</s>

en: Maritim started singing in 1981 and has a repertoire of over 100.
luo: Maritim ne ochako wer e higa mar 1981 kendo osewero wende mokalo 100.
mt0: <pad> Maritim 开始唱歌在1981年,他有100首歌曲的乐队。</s>

en: He says he just entered the studio and “went with the flow”.
luo: Owacho ni nodojo e studio to ochako mana wero "gima obiro e pache."
mt0: <pad> He says he just entered the studio and "went with the flow".</s>

en: “What scared me was China’s directive outlawing spitting. I dreaded what would happen in Kenya if SARS got here, considering that members of the Kalenjin community have a habit of spitting all over the place,” Maritim said.
luo: Maritim medo wacho kama, "Gima nomiya luoro en chik mane China ogolo makwero ng'udho olap. Naluor ahinya kane aparo gima biro timore ka SARS ochopo Kenya, nikech thoth Jo-Kalenjin nigi tim mar ng'udho olaw kamoro amora."
mt0: <pad> “What scared me was China's directive outlawing spitting. I dreaded what would happen in Kenya if SARS got here, considering that members of the Kalenjin community have a habit of spitting all over the place,” Maritim said.</s>

en: Though the song got considerable airtime, Maritim says he is surprised by the renewed interest in the song in the face of Covid-19.
luo: Kata obedo ni e kinde ma ne ogol werno thoth ji ne owinje e redio, Maritim wacho ni owuoro ahinya ni ji odok e winjo werno nikech Covid-19.
mt0: <pad> 虽然这首歌获得了大量播出时间,但Maritim说他感到惊讶于新冠病毒疫情期间的关注。</s>

en: The singer blasted Kenyans for disregarding the government directives on containment of Covid-19.
luo: Jawerno ne noseyo Jo-Kenya ma tamore luwo chike ma sirkal chiwo mondo ogeng' landruok mar Covid-19.
mt0: <pad> The singer blasted Kenyans for disregarding the government directives on containment of Covid-19.</s>

en: “The world managed to beat SARS and Ebola by adhering to prescribed safety measures. Here, we are just dancing with death,” he said.
luo: Nowacho kama, "SARS kod Ebola ne orumo nikech ji noluwo chike ma ne oketnegi. Wan watugo gi tho."
mt0: <pad> “世界能够战胜SARS和埃博拉,因为遵循规定的安全措施。这里我们只是在跳舞与死亡。”他说道。</s>

en: When asked whether he was living up to his own message of staying safe as per his message in the song, he said: “My brother, have you spotted me in the streets lately? I have confined myself to my house as a matter of fact.”
luo: Ka ne openje ka be oluwo paro ma ne ochiwo e wer mane owero, nowacho kama, "Osiepa, be iseroma koda kawuotho oko machiegnini? Alorora e oda."
mt0: <pad> When asked if he was living up to his own message of staying safe as per his message in the song, he said: "My brother, have you spotted me in the streets lately? I have confined myself to my house as a matter of fact."</s>

en: Maritim argued that according to him there is no difference between SARS and Covid-19.
luo: Maritim wacho ni en oneno ni onge pogruok e kind SARS kod Covid-19.
mt0: <pad> Maritim argued that according to him there is no difference between SARS and Covid-19.</s>

en: “It is the same disease, just diffident names. You just look at the symptoms and the origins and it’s the same thing.
luo: Owacho niya, "En tuo achiel, nying ema opogore. Tem ane rango ranyisi mag tuogo kod kaka ne gichakore, ibiro yudo ni gin gimoro achiel.
mt0: <pad> “这是同样的病,只是不同的名词。你只要看症状和起源,就一样。”</s>

en: “During SARS people were advised to practice social distancing and those infected were quarantined.
luo: E kinde tuo mar SARS, ne onyis ji mondo kik gibed machiegni gi jowetegi to jotuo ne iketo tenge.
mt0: <pad> “在SARS期间,人们被建议进行社交距离,而感染者则被隔離。”</s>

en: “We were also told to wash our hands and cover our mouths while coughing. Aren’t we now being told the same things?” he said.
luo: Ne onyiswa bende mondo walog lwetewa kendo waum dhowa sama wafwolo. Donge mago e gik mwatimo sani?
mt0: <pad> “We were also told to wash our hands and cover our mouths when coughing. Aren't we now being told the same things?” he said.</s>

en: The only difference he said is that people are now being asked to wear gloves for protection.
luo: Pogruok mantie en ni sani ji umo nyaka lwetegi."
mt0: <pad> The only difference he said is that people are now being asked to wear gloves for protection.</s>

en: Maritim said since Covid-19 knocked the dust off his song, someone who was listening to it for the first time accused him of “bringing” the disease to Kenya.
luo: Maritim nowacho nikech Covid-19 ne omiye wende ong'ere kendo, ng'at moro ma yande kowinjo wendno mokwongo ne owacho ni en ema "okelo" tuono Kenya.
mt0: <pad> Maritim said since Covid-19 knocked the dust off his song, someone who was listening to it for the first time accused him of "bringing" the disease to Kenya.</s>

en: “I did not ‘call’ the disease. I have never travelled to China. I just did a song to educate them to practice social distancing whenever the world is ravaged by a disease whose cure is not known,” he said, and called on Kenyans to heed the government’s directive on social distancing.
luo: Nojiwo ji mondo oluw chike mar sirkal oketo kendo nowacho niya, "Ne ok akelo tuono. Pok adhiga kata China. Nawero wendno mondo ojiw ji obed mabor gi jowetegi sama tuo moro omuoch e piny ma yadhe ok ong'ere."
mt0: <pad> “我没有“传染”病了。我从没去过中国。我只是做了一首歌,教育他们做社交距离的时候世界被一个未知的疾病所毁。”他说,并呼吁肯尼亚人遵守政府的指示关于社交距离。</s>

en: “If the government directs that there should be no handshaking, why should we defy such a simple order? Can’t we just salute like military officers and everyone goes his or her way. Why do we want to kill each other with foolishness?” he posed.
luo: Nopenjo kama: "Ka sirkal owacho ni ji kik mosre, ang'o momiyo watamore luwo gima yot kamano? Donge wanyalo mana goyo salut kaka askeche timoga kae to wadhi kama wadhiye? Ang'o momiyo wadwaro nego jowetewa nikech fupwa?"
mt0: <pad> “如果政府命令我们不要握手,为什么我们要违反这么简单的命令?我们不能像军人一样向对方问好,每个人就行了。为什么我们要想以愚蠢的方式杀死彼此?”他假装。</s>

en: The mark of a great book is often its ability to provoke robust debates and force readers to confront uncomfortable content.
luo: Buk maber ing'eyo gi kaka ji wuoyo e weche manie bugno kendo chuno jasomo mondo osome kata ka ok odwar.
mt0: <pad> 一个好的书的标志常常是它能够引起激烈的辩论,并迫使读者面对不舒服的内容。</s>

en: Kenyan, Christian, Queer by the academic Adriaan Van Klinken provides a way to imagine a future continent where members of the lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender and intersex (LGBTI) community can exercise their rights to dignity, voice, agency, space and health without fear of stigma, harassment and worse.
luo: Buk milungo ni Kenyan, Christian, Queer mondik gi Adriaan Van Klinken wuoyo e wi ndalo ma piny biro pong' gi mon makendo jowetegi, kod chwo makendore gi chwo wetegi  to ji yanygi kata kwedogi kendo gin gi ratiro mar chiwo pachgi, timo ohala kod yudo thieth ma ok obuon-gi.
mt0: <pad> Kenyan, Christian, Queer by the academic Adriaan Van Klinken provides a way to imagine a future continent where members of the lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender and intersex (LGBTI) community can exercise their rights to dignity, voice, agency, space and health without fear of stigma, harassment and worse.</s>

en: The author is a leading voice in LGBTI studies, with a special focus on the role of religion, in particular African Christianity.
luo: Jandikono ong'ere ahinya e kedo ne ratiro kod somo mag LGBTI, ka onono ahinya ahinya migawo ma din omako e wechego, to ahinya din mar Jokristo ma Afrika.
mt0: <pad> 作者是一位主要的 LGBTI研究人员,他特别关注宗教的作用,尤其是非洲基督教。</s>

en: In Kenyan, Christian, Queer he presents an ethnographic study of the Kenyan queer community, one that is creating space for its own church and queer theology in a homophobic social, religious and political environment.
luo: E buk mar Kenyan, Christian, Queer owuoyo e wi kwan mag chwo ma kendore gi chwo, kod mon makendore gi mon e piny Kenya kod kaka gin gi kanisa margi kod puonjgi e alwora ma ji obuonogie e yore duto moriwo din kod siasa.
mt0: <pad> In Kenyan, Christian, Queer he presents an ethnographic study of the Kenyan queer community, one that is creating space for its own church and queer theology in a homophobic social, religious and political environment.</s>

en: Van Klinken wades into a controversial subject to document an array of queer creative practices. In doing so, he advances LGBTI studies.
luo: Van Klinken wuoyo e wich ma ji nigi paro mopogore ahinya kendo odwaro ndiko wechego. Kuom timo kamano, omedo nonro e somo mag LGBTI.
mt0: <pad> Van Klinken goes into a controversial subject to document an array of queer creative practices. In doing so, he advances LGBTI studies.</s>

en: This eloquently written book bravely pushes boundaries.
luo: Bugno nyiso maonge luoro moro amora kaka ji onego we buono jogo.
mt0: <pad> 这本书写得非常精彩,勇敢地推翻了界限。</s>

en: It is remarkable in style and clarity but also brings out the author’s own vulnerabilities, strengths and compassion as an HIV positive gay scholar and activist.
luo: Ondik bugno e yo mawinjore maler ahinya kata kamano, olero bende nyawo moko ma jandikono nigo kod gik moberie nikech jandiko nigi tuo mar ayaki kendo okedo ne ratiro mar chwo ma kendore gi chwo wetegi.
mt0: <pad> 它非常有风格和清晰,但也展示了作者的自身脆弱性、力量和同情心,作为HIV感染者、研究员和活动人士。</s>

en: I have known and worked with him for a long time, and this book marks a shift from abstract and academic writing to a creative documentary about the very personal lives of real people. It straddles the gap between academia and LGBTI activism.
luo: Ang'eyo jandikono kendo asetiyo kode kuom ndalo malach, to bugni opogore gi buge mamoko ma oting'oga mana rieko mag skul kar mano en to owuyo e wi ngima joma nitie adier. Onyiso pogruok mantie wi somo mapile kod somo mar LGBTI.
mt0: <pad> I have known and worked with him for a long time, and this book marks a shift from abstract and academic writing to a creative documentary about the very personal lives of real people. It straddles the gap between academia and LGBTI activism.</s>

en: The book is also a departure from despair and crippling homophobia.
luo: Bugno bende golo luoro ma ji nigago e wi LGBTI.
mt0: <pad> 这本书也是一个脱离自私和严重的同性恋歧视。</s>

en: It records the experiences of people who refuse to be hopeless victims: people with hope and urgency, who navigate between resistance and human flourishing, creating more space for community and affirmation.
luo: Bugno oting'o sigand joma ok dwar dak e mudho, ma gin joma nigi geno kendo kata obedo ni ikwedogi, ging'eyo ni ginyalo dak maber to mano kelo dongruok.
mt0: <pad> 它记录了人们拒绝成为无望的受害者:人们有希望和紧急性,他们在抗争和人类繁荣之间划线,创造更多的空间来社区和肯定。</s>

en: It allows its subjects to tell their own stories.
luo: Bugno chiwo thuolo mondo ji owach sigandgi giwegi.
mt0: <pad> 它允许它的对象说他们自己的故事。</s>

en: The book examines four cases: activism through art, such as the works of the late Binyavanga Wainaina; music by the gay gospel artiste George Barasa; the Stories of Our Lives anthology of short films; and the Cosmopolitan Affirming Church in Nairobi.
luo: Bugno wuoyo e gik moko ang'wen: kedo ne ratiro kokalo kuom wende, buge kod gik migoro, kaka mondik gi Binyavanga Wainaina; wende mondik gi George Barasa; sinembe machieko chieko miluongo ni Stories of Our Lives; Kanisa moro mantie Nairobi.
mt0: <pad> 这本书研究了四个案例:通过艺术进行活动,例如由Binyavanga Wainaina的作品;音乐由Gay Gospel Artist George Barasa;故事我们的生活短片集;以及Nairobi的Cosmopolitan Affirming Church。</s>

en: In each of these, the author shows how LGBTI actors have reclaimed visibility and engaged Christian beliefs, texts and symbols.
luo: E moro kamoro kuom wechego, jandiko nyiso kaka jo LGBTI osemedo ng'ere kendo gimakore gi puonj Jokristo kod buge.
mt0: <pad> 每個這些,作者都顯示了如何 LGBTI演員們重新獲得了視覺性,並且參與了基督教信仰、文本和象徵。</s>

en: The use of case studies allows for rich and in-depth examinations of the ways in which the LGBTI community in Nairobi is reclaiming social, political, cultural, spiritual and artistic spaces.
luo: Tiyo gi ranyisi mosetimore e ngima ji konyo mondo ji one kaka jokanyo mag LGBTI mantie Nairobi omako kamaduong' e ngima ji, siasa kod din.
mt0: <pad> 使用案例研究可以深入地研究如何 LGBTI社区在尼罗毕是重新夺回社会、政治、文化、精神和艺术空间。</s>

en: Wainaina took on Christian clergy and homophobes, calling them out for their hypocrisy, in particular Pentecostal Christianity.
luo: Wainaina nowuoyo kuom wuondruok ma jotend kanisa nigo kod kaka gibuono ji, ahinya ahinya jo Pentecostal Christianity.
mt0: <pad> Wainaina took on Christian clergy and homophobes, calling them out for their hypocrisy, particularly Pentecostal Christianity.</s>

en: He made this a personal struggle in which he came out as gay and used his body as a site for resistance, vulnerability, acceptance and rejection.
luo: Nowuoyo kuom ngimane owuon kane owacho ni ohero chwo wetene kende ne oyie mondo ji obwone kendo okwede.
mt0: <pad> He made this a personal struggle in which he came out as gay and used his body as a site for resistance, vulnerability, acceptance and rejection.</s>

en: His activism gave impetus to the LGBTI community in Kenya and further afield and his death continued to provoke debates about LGBTI issues.
luo: Ranyisi mare nojiwo joma nie riwruok mara LGBTI Kenya kendo tho mare ne omiyo ji odhi nyime wuoyo e wi LGBTI.
mt0: <pad> His activism gave impetus to the LGBTI community in Kenya and further afield and his death continued to provoke debates about LGBTI issues.</s>

en: The video of the song Same Love (Remix) by Art Attack caused huge excitement in the Kenyan artistic and social scene.
luo: Vidio mar wer miluongo ni Same Love (Remix) mower gi Art Attack nomiyo Jo-Kenya manyeny ma jower owuoyo.
mt0: <pad> The video of the song Same Love (Remix) by Art Attack caused huge excitement in the Kenyan artistic and social scene.</s>

en: The song is about LGBTI struggles, gender equality and civil liberties.
luo: Wendno wuoyo e wi chandruoge ma LGBTI romogo kendo owuoyo e chiwo ratiro marom ne ji te.
mt0: <pad> 这首歌关于LGBTI的斗争,性别平等和公民权利。</s>

en: Yet the song serves as a space for political and theological activism.
luo: To ema pod jodin kod josiasa kwedo werno.
mt0: <pad> 然而,这首歌也被用来做政治和宗教的活动。</s>

en: It serves as a beautiful cultural expression of African queer politics – and was promptly banned by Kenya’s Film Control Board.
luo: Wendno nyiso paro ma Jo-Afrika nigo e wi mon mohero mon kod chwo mohero chwo kendo nogo wendo marfuk gi Kenya Film Control Board.
mt0: <pad> It serves as a beautiful cultural expression of African queer politics – and was promptly banned by Kenya’s Film Control Board.</s>

en: The song crossed social, theological and cultural boundaries and focused attention on the theology of radical and non-normative love.
luo: Wendno nokalo kiewo mag chike oganda kod puonj kanisa kendo wendno ne jiwo hera ma ok ber.
mt0: <pad> The song crossed social, theological and cultural boundaries and focused attention on the theology of radical and non-normative love.</s>

en: Rap music has long been used as a space for protest and activism.
luo: Wende miluongo ni rap ema kinde mang'eny itiyogo kikwedo kata ng'anjo ne gimoro.
mt0: <pad> Rap music 一直被用来作为一个空间来抗议和活动。</s>

en: Stories of Our Lives by the Nest, a Nairobi-based arts collective, is a collection of personal stories based on interviews with ordinary gay people.
luo: Sinema miluongo ni 'Stories of Our Lives' molos gi Nest ma en grup moro mantie Nairobi, oting'o sigand ji mopogore opogore ma gin joma diher kendore gi chwo wetegi.
mt0: <pad> Stories of Our Lives by the Nest, a Nairobi-based arts collective, is a collection of personal stories based on interviews with ordinary gay people.</s>

en: Like Same Love, it was promptly banned by the film board, a body that has frequently frustrated Kenya’s creativity in the guise of protecting the nation’s moral fabric.
luo: Mana kaka wer mar 'Same Love', en be ne ogoye marfuk gi film board,ma en bura ma osegawang'o I Jokenya nyading'eny gi timgi mar wuondruok ni girito timbe maler e piny.
mt0: <pad> Like Same Love, it was promptly banned by the film board, a body that has frequently frustrated Kenya’s creativity in the guise of protecting the nation’s moral fabric.</s>

en: The more the film is banned, the more it is downloaded.
luo: Kaka imedo go vidiono marfuk e kaka ji mang'eny medo manye.
mt0: <pad> 越是被禁的電影越是被下载。</s>

en: It addresses themes such as identity, love, sex, faith and spirituality, stories that capture the diversity of contemporary Kenyan queer lives and their day-to-day experiences.
luo: Vidiono wuoyo e wi weche kaka fwenyruok, hera, nindruok, yie kod din ma gin weche momako Jo-Kenya manie LGBTI.
mt0: <pad> It addresses themes such as identity, love, sex, faith and spirituality, stories that captures the diversity of contemporary Kenyan queer lives and their day-to-day experiences.</s>

en: Personal stories are not just authentic, they are also empowering and affirming. They give voice and impetus to communities in struggle.
luo: Sama ng'ato lero gima otimore e ngimane owuon, mano jiwo jomoko kendo ji nyalo bedo gadier gi wechego. Gikonyo e lando pek ma ji romogo.
mt0: <pad> Personal stories are not just authentic, they are also empowering and affirming. They give voice and impetus to communities in struggle.</s>

en: The last case study is that of the Cosmopolitan Affirming Church, a social and spiritual space where members of the LGBTI community can practise their faith in community with each other.
luo: Wach mogik minono en kanisa miluongo ni Cosmopolitan Affirming Church, ma orkwo ji duto kendo kanyo ero jo LGBTI nyalo bedo thuolo gi jowetegi.
mt0: <pad> 最后一个案例是Cosmopolitan Affirming Church,一个社会和精神空间,在那里成员们可以与其他人一起进行信仰。</s>

en: It is a safe space to create gay and radical theologies; a space for acceptance and love.
luo: En kama inyalo riwo joma nindore gi chwo kata mon wetegi kod puonj din, kama orwakie ji duto kendo hera nitie.
mt0: <pad> 这是个安全的地方来创造性别主义和极端主义的理论;一个空间来接受和爱。</s>

en: It is a space where faith and radical love and sexuality meet.
luo: Mano en kama yie kod hera ma ok pile kod joma kit nindrukgi opogore romoe.
mt0: <pad> 这是个空间,宗教和极端的爱和性别相遇。</s>

en: Van Klinken identifies with the struggles of his research subjects but was able to maintain some distance when writing about them.
luo: Kata obedo ni weche ma Van Klinken ondiko chalre gi matimore e ngimane, ne owuye kuome owuon.
mt0: <pad> Van Klinken identifies with the struggles of his research subjects but was able to maintain some distance when writing about them.</s>

en: This is the kind of book I will read again and again as a straight, Christian, female academic and commentator.
luo: Ma en buk mabiro somo nyanding'eny kata obedo ni an to an nyako ma jakristo mohero yawuoyi kendo ohero ndiko.
mt0: <pad> 这是本书我还会再读的类型,作为一个正统、基督徒、女性学者和评论员。</s>

en: I will happily share it not just with my students and library but also with those who would like to better understand these contested lives and spaces.
luo: Abiro nyiso jopuonjrena bugni kendo kete e laibrari mara, bende daher nyiso jogo madwaro ng'eyo joma ngimagi opogore gi mekwa.
mt0: <pad> 我會很開心把它分享給我的學生和圖書館,但也和那些想更深入地了解這些爭議的生命和空間。</s>

en: Many spiritual leaders need to read it to understand that LGBTI communities are creating their own spaces of worship where they find love and acceptance of their humanity as children of God.
luo: Jotend din onego osom bugni mondo ging'e ni LGBTI loso giwegi kama ginyalo leme ma ji biro rwakogi kendo herogi kaka nyithi Nyasaye.
mt0: <pad> 许多精神领袖需要阅读这本书来理解 LGBTI群体在创造他们的自己的场所崇拜,在那里他们找到爱和接受他们为孩子上帝的人类。</s>

en: This book evokes many feelings but also forces one to confront one’s own uninformed biases.
luo: Bugni chiero paro mang'eny kuom ng'ato moriwo nyaka chuny mar buono ma ng'ato ne ok par ni en-go
mt0: <pad> 这本书引起了许多情绪,但也迫使人们面对自己的不了解的偏见。</s>

en: It’s a good read for those who often shout the loudest, without sufficient understanding of LGBTI lives.
luo: Joma paroga ni ong'eyo LGBTI onego osom bugni mondo kik giwach gik ma ok ging'eyo.
mt0: <pad> 这是一本好书,对那些经常大喊大叫的人来说,没有足够的理解LGBTI生活的生活。</s>

en: Mike Rua (pictured), the self-proclaimed king of Mugithi, says he lives for the vulgar.
luo: Mike Rua (Monyis e picha), ma luongore ni ruodh Mugithi, wacho ni ohero weche mochido.
mt0: <pad> Mike Rua (pictured), the self-proclaimed king of Mugithi, says he lives for the vulgar.</s>

en: Rua, who has built his popularity in the music industry by spitting lyrics that raise more than eyebrows on stage, says he cannot change his style of music.
luo: Rua mong'ere nikech oweroga wende mochido wacho ni ok onyalo loko yo mowergo.
mt0: <pad> Rua, who has built his popularity in the music industry by spitting lyrics that raise more than eyebrows on stage, says he cannot change his style of music.</s>

en: He says his attempt to tone down has seen him clash with his fans.
luo: Owacho ni joherane ok dwar ni otim lokruok e thumbe.
mt0: <pad> 他說他的努力使他和粉絲對峙,並且讓他與粉絲吵架。</s>

en: He now says he will take it a notch higher and his new composition will be even more lewd.
luo: Owacho ni odwa goyo okang' momedore kendo wende moloso manyien oting'o weche maricho ahinya.
mt0: <pad> He now says he will take it a notch higher and his new composition will be even more lewd.</s>

en: He recalls how in 2012, during a music tour in Dubai, police were called on him on allegations that he was impersonating Mike Rua.
luo: Oparo kaka e higa mar 2012, ka ne odhi wer Dubai, noluongne polise nikech ne wachore ni owuondore ni en Mike Rua.
mt0: <pad> He recalls how in 2012, during a music tour in Dubai, police were called on him on allegations that he was impersonating Mike Rua.</s>

en: After a two-hour performance at an event attended by hundreds of Kenyans in the diaspora, Rua was accosted by the police.
luo: Bang' wer kuom seche ariyo e nyasi moro ma ne oting'o Jo-Kenya modak loka, polis ne omako Rua.
mt0: <pad> After a two-hour performance at an event attended by hundreds of Kenyans in the diaspora, Rua was accosted by the police.</s>

en: A fan had complained that the man who performed was not Rua.
luo: Nitie ng'ama nochiwo ripot ni ng'ar maweno ok en Rua.
mt0: <pad> A fan had complained that the man who performed was not Rua.</s>

en: Police told him that the Rua the fans knew and the Rua who had performed that night were two different people.
luo: Polis nonyise ni Rua ma ji ong'eyo gi Rua ma ne ower otienono ne gin ji ariyo mopogore.
mt0: <pad> Police told him that the Rua fans knew and the Rua who had performed that night were two different people.</s>

en: They felt they had not received a good dose of his music after he decided to tone down his wordings.
luo: Ne giwacho ni ne ok ower mamit nikech ne ok otiyo gi weche mochido.
mt0: <pad> 他们觉得他们没有收到足够的音乐剂,因为他决定降低词语。</s>

en: The same message has been told by his fans in Nairobi who have asked him to go back to the original Rua – the man who spits venom on stage.
luo: Mano be e gima joherane man Nairobi osenyise ni olokre obed Rua machon ma ne wacho weche makech ka sum sama ower.
mt0: <pad> The same message has been told by his fans in Nairobi who have asked him to go back to the original Rua – the man who spits venom on stage.</s>

en: The Kikuyu benga artiste is, however, bidding good bye to performing songs composed by other musicians.
luo: Jathum ma benga ma Ja-Kikuyuno wacho ni odwa weyo wero wende mondik jothum mamoko.
mt0: <pad> The Kikuyu benga artiste is, however, saying goodbye to performing songs composed by other musicians.</s>

en: “This is what my fans want. I have to give them what they demand for otherwise I will be out of business,” he says.
luo: Owacho kama, "Ma e gima joma ohero wendega dwaro. Nyaka atim kaka gidwaro nono to ohanda biro podho."
mt0: <pad> “这是我的粉丝们想要的。我必须给他们他们需要的东西,不然我会出门。”他说。</s>

en: He says he has in the past found himself brushing shoulders with the police over copyright infringement.
luo: Owacho ni e kinde mokalo, polise osemake nyading'eny ni okwalo wende jomoko.
mt0: <pad> He says he has in the past found himself brushing shoulders with the police over copyright infringement.</s>

en: Rua has risen to fame by remixing compositions by other musicians, which he twists to make almost a new composition.
luo: Rua nobedo gi huma nikech ondikoga manyien wende jothum moko kae to ogwenyogi giwuog ka wer manyien.
mt0: <pad> Rua 已经成名了,他通过remix其他歌手的歌曲来创造出新的音乐。</s>

en: He says remixing will now be a thing of the past.
luo: Owacho ni koro oweyo tiyo gi wende jomoko.
mt0: <pad> 他說remixing將是過去的東西。</s>

en: He has hit the studio to record new songs, including one titled Kiarie, which is already out.
luo: Owacho ni ne osedhi e studio mowero wende manyien ma achiel kuomgi iluongo ni Kiarie ma sani yudore.
mt0: <pad> He has hit the studio to record new songs, including one titled Kiarie, which is already out.</s>

en: And true to his spirit and motto, he has spiced up the new album with a tinge of vulgarities.
luo: To mana kaka nosingore ni obiro timo, wer manyienno opong' gi weche mochido.
mt0: <pad> 你不知道。</s>

en: In an interview with the Saturday Standard at his Syokimau home, Rua says media houses had at first almost shunned the composition on the basis that it was lewd.
luo: Rua nonyiso oboke mar Saturday Standard, ka en dalane Syokimau, nowacho ni ute fwambo notamore kawo wer mare nikech oting'o weche molil.
mt0: <pad> Rua says media houses initially shunned the composition on the basis that it was lewd.</s>

en: But things changed when the album, which is complete with a video, became a hit on social media and is now popularly played in many vernacular FM radio stations.
luo: Kata kamano, weche nolokore kane otieko loso albam ma nigi vidio kendo ji mang'eny nohere e social media kendo oket wendego e stesen mag redio mang'eny.
mt0: <pad> 但事情改变了当这张专辑,附有一张视频,成为一个热门的社交媒体和现在经常播放在许多地方 FM电台。</s>

en: Rua says ‘Kiarie’, which in Kikuyu means wide, is based on his real life experience.
luo: Rua wacho ni 'Kiarie', ma e dho Kikuyu mano tiende gima lach, wuoyo kuom gik mosekaloe e ngimane.
mt0: <pad> Rua says ‘Kiarie’, which in Kikuyu means wide, is based on his real life experience.</s>

en: It is the story of a young man, struggling to make it in life and ends up cohabiting with a sugar mummy.
luo: En sigand dichwo moro ma pod tin, ma nyagore gi ngima to gikone odak gi miyo moro ma ochot.
mt0: <pad> 这是个故事,一个年轻人在生活中努力奋斗,最后他和一个糖妈妈一起生活。</s>

en: And the sugar mummy at times confuses him (Rua) with Kiarie.
luo: Miyo ma ochotno seche moko paro ni Rua en Kiarie.
mt0: <pad> And the sugar mummy at times confuses him (Rua) with Kiarie.</s>

en: But this is not all about the song as is expected of Rua.
luo: To mano ok e wach kende ma wer losoe mana kaka Rua.
mt0: <pad> But this is not all about the song as is expected of Rua.</s>

en: He tantalises the composition with a hidden message of his love life to the sugar mummy and there in fits the hidden message of ‘Kiarie’.
luo: Owacho ni nitie gimopondo mitemo ler ei wendno ma en hera moherogo miyono mano ema omiyo iluonge ni 'Kiarie'.
mt0: <pad> He tantalises the composition with a hidden message of his love life to the sugar mummy and there in fits the hidden message of ‘Kiarie’.</s>

en: The composition leaves it to the listener to decode which ‘Kiarie’ he is referring to.
luo: Yo mondikgo werno mondo jawinjo ema yiero ni en 'Kiarie' mane ma iwuoyo kuome.
mt0: <pad> The composition leaves it to the listener to decode which ‘Kiarie’ he is referring to.</s>

en: Apart from Rua, other upcoming Kikuyu musicians such as Samuel Ndirangu, alias Samido, are giving the veterans a run for their money.
luo: Mopogore gi Rua, jothum moko mag Kikuyu ma nyocha eka ochako wer gin Samuel Ndirangu, mong'ere kaka Samido piem matek gi jower machon.
mt0: <pad> Beyond Rua, other upcoming Kikuyu musicians such as Samuel Ndirangu, alias Samido, are giving the veterans a run for their money.</s>

en: Samido is famed for his songs Wendo wi Cama (love is sweet) and Murata wa Ngai (Friend of God), which have been topping the FM airwaves.
luo: Samido ong'ere nikech wendege kaka Wendo wi Cama (hera mit) kod Murata wa Ngai (Osiep Nyasaye) ma ojagaket e redio.
mt0: <pad> Samido yě sɔrɔ nǔ gěgě ɖò tɔn lɛ a, Wendo wi Cama (love is sweet) and Murata wa Ngai (Friend of God), yě yě yǐ xá yě yǐ yǎ.</s>

en: He did Wendo wi Cama together with Joys wa Mama.
luo: Ne owero Wendo wi Cama kaachiel gi Joys wa Mama.
mt0: <pad> He did Wendo wi Cama together with Joys wa Mama.</s>

en: Jose Gatutura is another sensation.
luo: Jose Gaturura be en jawer machielo ma ji ohero.
mt0: <pad> Jose Gatutura another sensation.</s>

en: The musical star of the Machete hit maker has been rising with every new release.
luo: Ne owero wer ma ji mang'eny ong'eyo miluongo ni Machete kendo humbe medo landore gi wer ka wer mogolo manyien.
mt0: <pad> 你不知道</s>

en: Among his prominent songs are Tuirio twega (good food), Mwari wa Muthamaki (Daughter of a king) and Haha ni Gute (this is vanity).
luo: Moko kuom wendege mong'ere ahinya gin Tuirio twega (chiemo maber), Mwari wa Muthamaki (Nyar ruoth) kod Haha ni Gute (ma gima kayiem).
mt0: <pad> Among his prominent songs are Tuirio twega (good food), Mwari wa Muthamaki (Daughter of a king) and Haha ni Gute (this is vanity).</s>

en: USIU-Africa and Kenya Film Commission (KFC) have signed a five-year agreement to boost film studies.
luo: USIU-Africa kod Kenya Film Commission (KFC) odonjo e winjruok machielo mar higni abich mondo gisir somo mag loso sinema.
mt0: <pad> USIU-Africa and Kenya Film Commission (KFC) have signed a five-year agreement to boost film studies.</s>

en: The Memorandum of Understanding is aimed at making Kenya a first-class provider of screen entertainment for local, regional and international markets.
luo: Gima iluongo ni Memorandum of Understanding dhi konyo e miyo Kenya obed namba achiel e loso vidio mamoro Jo-Kenya, pinje molworowa kod pinje maoko.
mt0: <pad> The Memorandum of Understanding is aimed at making Kenya a first-class provider of screen entertainment for local, regional and international markets.</s>

en: To this end the university commits to provide quality and relevant training.
luo: Nikech mano, yunivasiti ong'ado ni gibiro chiwo tiegruok mong'ith kendo mowinjore.
mt0: <pad> 为了这个目的,大学致力于提供高质量和相关培训。</s>

en: In the agreement, the two institutions will work together to build capacity through organising film classes, workshops, seminars, film boot camps, short courses, projects and programmes.
luo: E winjruok ma ne otimno, kuonde tiegruok ariyogo biro tiyo kanyachiel e loso gima ber kokalo kuom bedo gi klas mipuonjoe ji loso sinema, romo ma tiegruok, semina, loso kembe mag puonj, klese machieko chieko, chiwo tije kod programbe.
mt0: <pad> 在该协议中,两所学校将合作建立能力通过组织电影课程、研讨会、培训营、短班电影、项目和课程。</s>

en: The two institutions will also market the Kalasha International Film and TV Festivals to increase market penetration and visibility for Kenyan content at international film markets.
luo: Kuonde tiegruok ariyogo biro lando ote mar Kalasha International Film and TV Festivals mondo ji mang'eny ong'e kendo sinembe mag Kenya one e pinje maoko.
mt0: <pad> The two institutions will also market Kalasha International Film and TV Festivals to increase market penetration and visibility for Kenyan content at international film markets.</s>

en: USIU-Africa Vice Chancellor Paul Zeleza said the partnership will position both institutions as resource centres for local broadcasters, media, film and communication researchers and scholars as USIU-Africa will be able to offer mentorship programmes for students interested in film.
luo: Vice chancellor mar USIU-Africa, Paul Zeleza, nowacho ni winjruok ma gitimono biro miyo kuonde tiegruokgo obed kama inyalo kawie joma itiyogo e ute fwambo gi keyo kaachiel kod joma timo nonro nikech USIU-Africa biro konyo jopuonjre madwaro ng'eyo kaka iloso sinema.
mt0: <pad> 你不知道</s>

en: “We will conduct film industry research and collect data, which will enable us to develop short courses tailor-made for industry practitioners for certification,” said Prof Zeleza.
luo: Profesa Zeleza nowacho kama, "Wadhi timo nonro e wi sinembe kendo choko weche mabiro konyowa loso klese moko machieko ne joma puonjore loso sinema kae to wamiyogi satifiket."
mt0: <pad> “我们会进行电影行业研究和收集数据,这将有助于我们开发短期课程为电影从业人员认证,” Prof Zeleza said.</s>

en: Kenya Film Commission Chief Executive Officer Timothy Owase said the State corporation will continue to source and negotiate for tax relief incentives on film and animation equipment to boost the industry growth.
luo: Timothy Owase ma en CEO mar Kenya Film Commission, nowacho ni gibiro dhi nyime kwayo mondo odwoknegi osuru michulo e nyiewo masinde mitiyogo e loso sinema to mano biro konyogi timo dongruok.
mt0: <pad> Kenya Film Commission Chief Executive Officer Timothy Owase said the State corporation will continue to source and negotiate for tax relief incentives on film and animation equipment to boost the industry growth.</s>

en: “We will offer guidance on standards of excellence and advocate for the use of best practice in film production while working closely with relevant government agencies to create robust and streamlined mid-level film education that will lead to more exportation of locally-made films,” sais Owase.
luo: Owase nowacho kama, "Wabiro chiwo weche matayo rang'iny monego bedie kendo wabiro ji mondo otem giti tich maber e loso sinema ka watiyo machiegni gi ofise mowinjore mag sirkal  e chiwo puonj makare mabiro miyo sinembe miloso onyis nyaka e pinje maoko."
mt0: <pad> “We will offer guidance on standards of excellence and advocate for the use of best practice in film production while working closely with relevant government agencies to create robust and streamlined mid-level film education that will lead to more exportation of locally-made films,” said Owase.</s>

en: Today, many people, especially Africans find it hard to identify with their cultural values and way of life as a result of embrace to modernisation and civilisation.
luo: E kindewagi, ji mang'eny ahinya ahinya Jo Afrika, yudo ka teknegi makore gi kit ngima mar ogandagi kendo gihero timo kendo luwa kit ngima ma nyasani.
mt0: <pad> 今天,许多人,尤其是非洲人很难认同他们自己的文化价值和生活方式,因为他们接受了现代主义和文明。</s>

en: One man in Elgeyo Marakwet has taken it upon himself to preserve the fading culture of the Keiyo community, which is part of the Kalenjin subtribes.
luo: Dichwo moro man Elgeyo Marakwet okawo okang' mar neno ni kit ngima Jo-Keiyo ok olal, ma en achiel kuom dhoudi mag Kalenjin.
mt0: <pad> Man a Elgeyo Marakwet has taken it upon himself to preserve the fading culture of the Keiyo community, which is part of the Kalenjin subtribes.</s>

en: Joseph Kwambai, 70, said modernisation has changed the African society from a traditional socio-economic setup to where locals have now adapted to new norms and way of life.
luo: Joseph Kwambai ma jahigni 70, wacho ni kit ngima ma nya sani oseloko pach Jo-Afrika ma giweyo dak kaka chon kendo sani giluwo kit ngima ma ndaloni.
mt0: <pad> Joseph Kwambai, 70, said modernisation has changed the African society from a traditional socio-economic setup to where locals have now adapted to new norms and way of life.</s>

en: “Driven by the need to ensure future generations get a feeling of how Africans behaved and conducted themselves in the past, I have been collecting Keiyo relics and preserving them in a museum in Chekobei village in Keiyo south sub county for the past 20 years,” said Mr Kwambai.
luo: Kwambai nowacho kama, "Daher ni tieng' mabiro ong'e kaka kit ngima Jo-Afrika ne chalo kod kaka ne gitimo gik moko, omiyo asebedo ka achoko gik machon mag Jo-Keiyo kendo kanogi e museum mantie Chekobei ei Keiyo South Sub-county kuom higni 20."
mt0: <pad> “Driven by the need to ensure future generations get a feeling of how Africans behaved and conducted themselves in the past, I have been collecting Keiyo relics and preserving them in a museum in Chekobei village in Keiyo south sub county for the past 20 years,” said Mr Kwambai.</s>

en: Situated next to Chekobei Primary, along the Iten-Kabarnet road, the cultural centre is decked with a collection of books showing how the cultural heritages of African communities used to live and socialize in the past.
luo: Museumno yudore machiegni gi Chekobei Primary e ndara mar Iten-Kabarnet, kendo opong' gi buge mawuoyo e wi kaka ogendni mopogore opogore mag Afrika nodak e kinde machon.
mt0: <pad> Situated next to Chekobei Primary, along the Iten-Kabarnet road, the cultural centre is decked with a collection of books showing how the cultural heritages of African communities used to live and socialize in the past.</s>

en: It even holds currencies in different denominations and states.
luo: Bende, en nyaka gi pesa ma ne itiyogo e ndalo machon e ogendni mopogore opogore.
mt0: <pad> 它甚至可以储存货币的不同种类和国家。</s>

en: “I have several Biographies including the one of the late second President Daniel Arap Moi “the making of an African Statesman” by Andrew Morton and many others.
luo: Nowacho kama, "An gi buge malero ngima ji kaka Ker Daniel Arap Moi miluongo ni "Kaka Ker ma Ja Afrika Nokelo Betie" mondik gi Andrew Morton kod buge mamoko.
mt0: <pad> 我有很多人物传记,包括一个去世的第二任总统Daniel Arap Moi“The Making of an African Statesman” by Andrew Morton and many others.</s>

en: Books written by colonialists are also available,” he said.
luo: An bende gi buge mogo gi wasungu ma ne omonjo Afrika."
mt0: <pad> 书写殖民者也可供选择,他说道。</s>

en: Apart from the books at the Museum, other items showcased include those used in war, ceremonies, rituals, kitchen-ware and farming among others.
luo: Mopogore gi buge, gik mamoko ma be inyiso e Museum kanyo gin gik machon ma ne otigo e lweny, nyasi, lamo, gik jokon, gige pur kod mamoko.
mt0: <pad> 除了书,其他展示品包括战争、仪式、厨房用品和农业等。</s>

en: Even the Bible and Quran are in the center.
luo: Gin nyaka gi Muma kod Koran e dier Museumno.
mt0: <pad> Even the Bible and Quran are in the center.</s>

en: There is also a Keiyo homestead erected to illustrate how a family shared the rooms.
luo: Nitie ot molos mar Jo Keiyo manyiso kaka joot machon ne odak.
mt0: <pad> Also, a Keiyo homestead has been erected to illustrate how a family shared the rooms.</s>

en: The old man was forced to travel wide and far in search of the traditional item.
luo: Jaduong'no osewuotho kuonde maboyo komanyo gik machon-go.
mt0: <pad> The old man was forced to travel wide and far in search of the traditional item.</s>

en: “I am still collecting the items and part of history that I come across about different cultures more so the Keiyo community. Other communities should take up the initiative and ensure they preserve their cultures as a way of ensuring the coming generations will not be enslaved by the coming up of modernisation,” he opined.
luo: Owacho kama, "Pod adhi nyime choko gik machon kod gige histori malero kit ngima dhoudi mopogore opogore to ahinya ma Jo Keiyo. Dhoudi mamoko be onego ochak timo gima atimoni mondo yoregi kod kit ngimagi kik lal to kar mano gisik ne tienge mabiro mi kik gibed wasumbni mag ngima ma nyasani."
mt0: <pad> “我仍然收集这些东西和一些历史,尤其是关于不同文化,特别是Keiyo。其他社区应该采取行动并确保他们保护他们的文化以保证未来的世代不会被现代主义奴役。”</s>

en: The centre was then commissioned in 2006 but officially opened four years later to the public.
luo: Ne olos museumno e higa mar 2006, kata kamano, ne oyawe e higni ang'wen bang'e.
mt0: <pad> The center was commissioned in 2006 but officially opened to the public four years later.</s>

en: George Otieno’s passion for art started way back in 1988, on his first day in a primary school in Busia County, while staying with his maternal grandmother.
luo: George Otieno nochako hero goro e higa mar 1988 e odiechienge mokwongo e skund primari e kaonti mar Busia, ndalo ma ne odak gi dagi.
mt0: <pad> George Otieno's passion for art started way back in 1988, on his first day in primary school in Busia County, while staying with his maternal grandmother.</s>

en: “The first assignment in Standard One for us was to draw a vehicle. I drew a pickup, which the teacher liked and gave me a red tick. Since then, I knew any good thing should have a red tick. That is when I knew drawing is good,” said Otieno.
