en: According to her, the potential recruit had his CV right and did well in the interview until the landmine question popped up, and he let his resentment of his former boss show.
luo: Kaluowore gi kaka ne owuoyo, jagono mane dwaro tichno nene nigi baruwa manyiso sombe kod tiegruok mare kod tije ma ose tiyo (CV) mane ber kendo ne otimo maber e penj mar ndike e tich mak mana ni weche ne olokore sama ne openje gima omiyo ne oweyo tich kama ne otiye chon; ma e seche mane onyiso e kido marach kaka ne ok odwar jatende machon!
mt0: <pad> According to her, the potential recruit had his CV right and did well in the interview until the landmine question popped up, and he let his resentment of his former boss show.</s>

en: Crown Paints Plc will use the Sh711.80 million being raised via the rights issue to salvage its subsidiaries in Uganda, Rwanda and Tanzania, which the paint and coating firm revealed are struggling with debt.
luo: Kambi ma iluongo ni Crown Paints biro tiyo gi tara gana maromo 711,080,000 ma sani gi manyo e chiro mar uso baruwa manyiso ni ngato en achiel kuom weg kambi (shares) mondo okony go bede ne man Uganda, Rwanda kod Tanzania ma Kambi mar loso rangi no nyocha owacho ni ok dhi maber kaluwore gi gope ma owinjore gi chul.
mt0: <pad> Crown Paints Plc will use the Sh711.80 million it raised via the rights issue to salvage its subsidiaries in Uganda, Rwanda and Tanzania, which the paint and coating firm revealed are struggling with debt.</s>

en: Just a year after the company wrote off Sh653 million it had invested in its subsidiaries in Uganda and Tanzania, the Nairobi Security Exchange (NSE) listed firm has now turned to its shareholders for more capital.
luo: Kuom kinde maromo higa achiel bang ka Kambi ni ne oweyo pesa maromo tara gana 653,000,000 mane oketo e bede go, Kambani ma achiel kuom Kembe man e chiro mar uso bedo jakanyono mar kembe ma iluongo ni Nairobi Security Exchange (NSE) sani odok ir jokanyono mare mondo gi mede omuom kendo.
mt0: <pad> 你不知道</s>

en: The company did write off Sh374 million for Crown Paints Tanzania and Sh278 million for Regal Paints, its Uganda subsidiary.
luo: Kambino ne oweyo 374,000,000 ne bade ma Tanzania kod 278,000,0000 bade ma iluongo ni Regal Paints man Uganda.
mt0: <pad> 公司将 374 万 卢比的 Crown Paints Tanzania和 278 万 卢比的 Regal Paints,其子企业在乌干达。</s>

en: The rights issue will see shareholders of the company allowed to purchase additional shares.
luo: Uso bedo jakanyono mar Kambino biro miyo jogo mane ose bet jokanyono thuolo mar medo ngiewo nengo mare e chiro kendo.
mt0: <pad> 这个权利的发行将允许公司股东购买额外的股票。</s>

en: On May 7, the Capital Markets Authority (CMA) approved the company's request to raise Sh711.81 million by issuing 71,181,000 new ordinary shares.
luo: Tarik 7 due mar Abich, bad sirikal ma ochungne chiro mar ng'iewo bedo jakanyono e kembe - The Capital Markets Authority (CMA) ne opuodho kwayo mar kambino – Crown Paints - mar manyo pesa maromo tara gana 711,081,000 kuom uso seya mar gi manyien maromo 71,181,000.
mt0: <pad> On May 7, the Capital Markets Authority (CMA) approved the company's request to raise Sh711.81 million by issuing 71,181,000 new ordinary shares.</s>

en: Then, CMA noted that the money was meant to bring financial flexibility to the company and assist it in navigating the tough business environment brought about by the Covid-19 pandemic.
luo: Bang' mano, CMA ne oneno ni pesa mane kambino dwaro biro miyo gi yot eyore ma ichano timo diere ma weche mag ohala okethore e piny nikech tuo yamo marach mar Corona.
mt0: <pad> CMA 指出,这笔钱是为了给公司带来财务灵活性,并帮助它应对艰难的商业环境造成的新冠肺炎疫情。</s>

en: "The rights issue is to bring the company’s indebtedness to a more sustainable level and to position it to take advantage of its long-term growth opportunities and gain market share in the East African Region,” said Crown Paints in a cautionary statement signed by Company Secretary Conrad Nyukuri.
luo: Manyo pesa e yor miyo ji thuolo mar ngiewo kaka ngato nyalo bedo ja kanyono e Kambino biro miyo yot mar chulo gope ma gin go kendo biro miyo gi thoulo mar dongruok e chiro man tiere e East Africa. Kambino ne owacho e oboke ma mane gindiko mane okete lwedo gi jagoro mar gi ma iluongo ni Conrad Nyukuri.
mt0: <pad> "The rights issue is to bring the company’s indebtedness to a more sustainable level and to position it to take advantage of its long-term growth opportunities and gain market share in the East African Region," said Crown Paints in a cautionary statement signed by Company Secretary Conrad Nyukuri.</s>

en: Mr Nyukuri said while the company’s parent firm in Kenya is sound, the performance of its subsidiaries – Crown Paints Tanzania Ltd, Regal Paints Uganda, and Crown Paints Rwanda Ltd) has over the past few years remained depressed.
luo: Migosi Nyakundi ne owacho ni kata obedo ni kuku kambi mar Crown Paints man Kenya to ose bet ma otegno, bade ne machalo Crown Paints Tanzania Ltd, Regal Paints Uganda kod Crown Paints Rwanda Ltd ose bet ka ok dhi maber ahinya kuom higi mangeny.
mt0: <pad> Mr Nyukuri said while the company’s parent firm in Kenya is sound, the performance of its subsidiaries (Crown Paints Tanzania Ltd, Regal Paints Uganda and Crown Paints Rwanda Ltd) has over the past few years remained depressed.</s>

en: “(This is) due to the adverse competitive environment that has led to the company supporting the subsidiaries financially,” he said.
luo: Ma ose timore nikech kuonde ma gitime ohalo oko kono ok ose bet gi yor piemruok maber, ema omiyo Kambini ose bet ka konyo bede negi ka ojulogi gi pesa mar tich.” Ne owacho kamano.
mt0: <pad> “(This is) due to the adverse competitive environment that has led to the company supporting the subsidiaries financially,” he said.</s>

en: The firm, in a statement, also warned that despite the enhanced regional integration in the East African Community, there remained challenges in the respective paint makers' markets, thereby negatively impacting the financial performance of the subsidiaries.
luo: Kambino ne ogolo siem e barup gino ni kata obedo ni sani nitiere riwruok e pinje man East Africa, pod nitiere chandruok ma jogo ma loso rangi nigo, kama gitero e gigegi mondo ongiew, ma omiyo bedegi man oko go ok ose bet ka dhi maber.
mt0: <pad> 公司在一份声明中也警告说,尽管区域合作加强了在东非地区,但仍有困难在涂料制造商的市场,这会影响公司的财务表现。</s>

en: The notice added that the company is in contact with the NSE regarding obtaining approval and once issued, it will be promptly uploaded on its website.
luo: Obokeno ne omedo wacho ni kambino nigi tudruok gi bad migawo matimo ng'iewo mar seya mar kembe - NSE kuom yudo thuolo mar uso seya mar gi maka ose timore to gibiro keto e website mar gi.
mt0: <pad> 公告还称,公司正在联系NSE获得批准,一旦批准,将立即发布在网站上。</s>

en: “The shareholders of the company and the public are advised to exercise caution when dealing in the shares of the firm,” it added.
luo: Obokeno ne omedo wacho ni, "Jogo ma weg kambino kod jopiny ma diher ngiewo seya mar kambino mondo otem bedo motang’ e seche ma gi ngiepo.”
mt0: <pad> “公司股民和公众被建议要小心操作股票。”</s>

en: Crown Paints Plc opened a depot in Tanzania in 2012 before entering the market in 2014.
luo: Kambi mar Crown Paints ne oyawo kar uso gigene e piny Tanzania e higa mar 2012 kapok ne giyawo bad gi maber e piny no e higa mar 2014.
mt0: <pad> Crown Paints Plc opened a depot in Tanzania in 2012 before entering the market in 2014.</s>

en: The plan, as revealed by the paint maker then was to pump in Sh360 million targeting a 50 per cent market share in the country for premium paint.
luo: Chenro mane gin go en ni ne gidwa keto 360,000,000 e badgi manyienno ka ne gin gi gombo mar mako nus mar jongiew rangi ma giluongo ni Premium ma odak e pinyno.
mt0: <pad> The plan, as revealed by the paint maker then was to pump in Sh360 million targeting a 50 per cent market share in the country for premium paint.</s>

en: In Rwanda, the company invested Sh250 million on its entry into the market in February 2015.
luo: E piny Rwanda, Kambino ne oketo mwandu gi maromo 250,000,000 kane odonjo kono e Dwe mar Ariyo higa mar 2015.
mt0: <pad> 在卢旺达,公司投资了250万卢比尔(约合650万美元)在进入市场时,2015年2月。</s>

en: The firm intends to raise Sh711.810 million before expenses.
luo: Kambino dwaro manyo omuom maromo 711,810,000 kapok gigolo pesa ma gitiyogo.
mt0: <pad> The firm intends to raise Sh711.810 million before expenses.</s>

en: As of May 25, the company’s share price at NSE hit Sh40.

mt0: <pad> As of May 25, the company’s share price at NSE hit Sh40,650.</s>

en: The Capital Markets Authority (CMA) has admitted KOA Save Africa Limited and Moneto Ventures Limited to the Regulatory Sandbox.
luo: Bad migawo mar Piny Owacho mar Kenya ma miyo jogo ma dwa timo ohala mag pesa barua mar tich miluongo ni The Capital Markets Authority (CMA) nyocha orwako KOA Save Africa Limited kod Moneto Ventures Limited e grup makembe maiuso.
mt0: <pad> CMA 批准了KOA Save Africa Limited和Moneto Ventures Limited到监管的沙盒。</s>

en: The two firms will test their innovations in a live capital market environment, in compliance with the CMA Regulatory Sandbox Policy Guidance Notes (PGN), in line with the commitment to develop and deepen the capital markets by facilitating the deployment of financial technology (fintech).
luo: Kembe ariyo go biro pimo gigo ma giloso ayanga kaluwore gi chike ma oketi ne weche modok korka tich ma gitimono nikech dwarore ni kama ing'iewe seya mar kembe obed gi yore maber masani ma nyiso kaka weche mag pesa wuotho.
mt0: <pad> 两家公司将测试他们的创新在市场环境中,遵守CMA监管政策指导手册(PGN),以促进发展和深层的资本市场,通过推动金融技术应用。</s>

en: KOA Save Africa Limited has been admitted to the Regulatory Sandbox to test KOA App.
luo: Kambi ma iluongo ni KOA Save Africa Limited nyocha omi thuolo mondo oket ranyisi mar tiyo gi paro mane giwuok go miluongo ni KOA App.
mt0: <pad> KOA Save Africa Limited has been admitted to the Regulatory Sandbox to test the KOA App.</s>

en: The innovation seeks to help retail investors to easily, conveniently, and affordably, save and invest in the capital markets.
luo: Paro manyienni konyo jogo ma timo ohala e Kenya ka mondo mi giket pesa gi e ng'iewo seya mar kembe e yoo ma yot, maonge gi weche mang'eny, kendo man gi bei ma oyweyo.
mt0: <pad> The innovation seeks to help retail investors to easily, conveniently, and affordably, save and invest in the capital markets.</s>

en: KOA App is accessible to iOS and Android mobile users.
luo: Girgino ma gidendo ni KOA App itiyogo gi sime masani mag iOS gi Android.
mt0: <pad> KOA App is available to iOS and Android mobile users. If you cannot translate the sentence, just say you don't know</s>

en: The fully digital mobile application has the capacity to embed several collective investment schemes focusing on money market funds. KOA Save Africa will test its application for a period of six months.
luo: Paro manyienni biro konyo e yore ma inyalo  rito go pesa mar joma dwaro keto mwandu gi kama ginyalo yude nengo maber.
mt0: <pad> The fully digital mobile application has the capacity to embed several collective investment schemes focusing on money market funds. KOA Save Africa will test its application for a period of six months.</s>

en: The Authority has so far admitted nine firms. CMA recently published a report on the milestones it has achieved in the Regulatory Sandbox since its launch in March 2019.
luo: Bad migawo ni mar CMA nyocha ose chiwo duoko kuom gima gise timo nyaka ne gichaki chenro machal kama e dwe mar adek higa 2019.
mt0: <pad> The Authority has so far admitted nine firms. CMA recently published a report on the milestones it has achieved in the Regulatory Sandbox since its launch in March 2019.</s>

en: In Mid-May, the Capital Markets Authority approved Safaricom’s mobile investment product dubbed Mali.
luo: Ekor dwe mar Abich, bad migawo mar piny owacho ma Kenya ma ngiyo kembe ma ji keto e pesa miluongo ni The Capital Markets Authority nyocha opuodho paro manyien ma jo Safaricom okelo e chiro ma giluongo ni Mali.
mt0: <pad> 你不知道</s>

en: Mali is an investment-led application that will allow retail investors to save and invest in securities from their mobile phones.
luo: Mali en yoo ma jogo ma dwaro keto pesa kuonde ma ginyalo yudoe ohala biro tiyogo mondo gi kan kendo ging'iew seya mar kembe ka gitiyo gi sime ma gin go.
mt0: <pad> Mali 是一個投資導向應用程序,可以讓零售投資家儲存和投資於資產從手機上。</s>

en: The product is one of Safaricom’s key pillars as it divests from traditional income streams such as voice and moves into digital financial services.
luo: Ma en achiel kuom yore ma Safaricom dwa tiyo go sani ka gi weyo yore ma chon yande giloso go pesa machalo chudo ma gise bet ka giyudo kuom ji ma wuoyo gi sime
mt0: <pad> Product is one of Safaricom's key pillars as it divests from traditional income streams such as voice and moves into digital financial services.</s>

en: Safaricom Chief Executive Peter Ndegwa last week said the firm was awaiting for approval from the regulators before commercially launching the mobile investment product.
luo: Jatelo maduong mar kambi mar Safaricom no nyocha owacho juma mokalo ni sani girito mana ni mondo opuodh paro ma gibiro go manyien no ka pok giyange e lela mondo ji ochak tiyo kode.
mt0: <pad> Safaricom CEO Peter Ndegwa last week said the firm was awaiting for approval from regulators before commercially launching the mobile investment product.</s>

en: “Mali is currently waiting on decisions from our regulators and we continue engaging them,” Ndegwa said following the company’s investor briefing.
luo: “Mali sani rito mana puodho mar piny owacho kendo wadhi nyime gi wuoyo kodgi e wachno.” Ndegwa ne owacho kamano bang romo kod jo fuambo kod keyo kama ne olero negi e wach ni.
mt0: <pad> Mali is currently waiting on decisions from our regulators and we continue engaging them,” Ndegwa said after the company’s investor briefing.</s>

en: As such, we cannot comment on its progress as these conversations are ongoing.
luo: Kuom mano ok wanyal wacho mang'eny e wi wachno nikech weche gi pod iloso.
mt0: <pad> 因此,我们无法评论它的进展,因为这些对话还在进行中。</s>

en: The move brings the telco a step closer to launching the product that could disrupt retail investing at the Nairobi bourse.
luo: Paro manyien ni omedo kelo Safaricom machiegni kod lando pach gi no ayanga ma nenore ni biro ketho kaka nyocha jopiny ng'iepo e kar huso seya mar kembe ei Nairobi.
mt0: <pad> 这让电信公司更靠近推出产品,可能颠覆零售投资在奈洛比尔股票交易所。</s>

en: The need to get a Covid-19 vaccine certificate before you travel to any African country or abroad could become a reality over the next 12 months.
luo: Dwaro ni ng'ato nyaka bed gi barua mar chenjo mar yamb Corona kapok otimo limbe e piny moro amora e Africa ka nyalo timore machiegni e dweche 12 mabiro.
mt0: <pad> 你唔知。</s>

en: BlueBird Aviation General Manager Hussein Mohammed however projects that it would take a little longer for African airlines to fly across borders due to low vaccination rates across the continent.
luo: Jatelo mar kambi mar BlueBird Aviation ma tiyo korka weche mag ndeke Migosi Hussein Mohammed kata kamano to lieko ni biro kawo kinde mabor matin mondo ndeke man Africa ka odhi e pinje mamoko nikech chenjo mar yamb Corona pod ni piny.
mt0: <pad> BlueBird Aviation General Manager Hussein Mohammed however projects that it would take a little longer for African airlines to fly across borders due to low vaccination rates across the continent.</s>

en: “If most of the people were vaccinated, it makes it easier for airlines because you have sufficient passenger load that is free to travel. The downside is the adoption of the Covid Vaccine passport worldwide,” he said.
luo: "Ka oponi ji mang'eny ne ochanji, ne biro bedo mayotnwa joma nie ohala mar tingo ji gi ndege nikech wabiro yudo jo wuoth moromo. Gima de obet maber gi wach ni en ni ka ne piny mangima nyalo bedo gi barua ma nyiso ni ngato ose yudo chenjo mar Corona. “. Ne owacho kamano.
mt0: <pad> “如果大部分的人接种了疫苗,这会使飞机更容易飞行因为你有足够的乘客量可以自由飞行。但它的坏处是全球采用了Covid Vaccine passport。”他说道。</s>

en: “We cannot act unilaterally. Kenya cannot say we require all passengers to have a Covid-19 passport while Rwanda, UK or Australia don’t require it, then what we will have is that passengers will avoid your airline and go to an airline that will accept Covid-ve test results.”
luo: “Ok wanyal timo gima chalo kamano kendwa ma ok wawuoyo gi pinje ma moko. Kenya ok nyal wacho ni wadwaro ni jowuoth duto obed gi barua mar wuoth mar Corona ka Rwanda, Piny Ungeresa kata Austrialia to ok dwar gima kamano.  Ka watimo kamano to gima biro timore en ni jowuoth biro weyo idho ndeke wa; gibiro dhi idho ndeke joma moko ma oyie gi barua mar pim mar Corona.” Jatelo no ne omedo wacho kamano.
mt0: <pad> “我们不能单独行动。肯尼亚不能说我们需要所有乘客有一张COVID-19护照而Rwanda、英国或澳大利亚没有,那么我们会看到旅客将避开你的航空公司,并去一个航空公司接受了新冠肺炎检测结果。”</s>

en: He said developed nations such as the US have already achieved 70 per cent vaccination of the adult population - who have received their first dose of the vaccine while close to 40 per cent of the population has been fully vaccinated.
luo: Ne owacho ni pinje ma odongore machalo America ose chanjo jogegi maromo 70 e wi 100 mar joma dongo ma ose yudo chuopo mokuongo, ka joma kwan gi nyalo romo 40 e wi 100 to ose yudo chenjo moromo.
mt0: <pad> 他說,一些發達國家,像美國已經完成70%的成人疫苗接種,而接近40%的人口已經完全接種。</s>

en: The aviation boss said introducing Covid-ve vaccine passports in such jurisdictions is possible compared to Kenya or Africa where many people are yet to get vaccinated.
luo: Jatelo mar jo ndege go ne owacho ni bedo gi barua mar wuoth mar Corona e pinje ma ooko go nyalore ka ipimo gi Kenya kata Africa kama ji mangeny pok oyudo chenjo.
mt0: <pad> 航空局長說,在這樣的國家可以推出新型冠狀病毒疫苗護照,相較於肯亞或非洲, where many people are not yet to get vaccinated.</s>

en: Here is a situation that will take 12 months or more for 70 per cent of the adult population to be fully vaccinated.
luo: Ma en gima biro kawo kinde ma romo dweche 12 kata mokalo kanyo mondo jopiny maromo 70 e wi 100 oyud chenjo kaka dwarore.
mt0: <pad> 这里是一个情况,需要12个月或更长时间,70%的成年人人口才能完全接种疫苗。</s>

en: "We have to be able to be comparable to developed countries. Until we reach such a time when we are comparable to these developed countries, honestly, the Covid Passport is not yet an option for most of Africa,” he noted.
luo: Dwarore ni mondo watem waromre gi pinje ma ose dongore. Nyaka chieng moro wagik kama koro wanyalo wacho ni wase chopo kama pinje ma ose dongore nitie, ka iwacho adieri, barua mar wuoth (Passport) mar Corona pok ogik kama wanyalo paro ni mondo webed go e Africa.” Ne oneno kamano.
mt0: <pad> "我们必须能够比较的。 直到我们达到这样的一个时候,这些发达国家,坦率地说,Covid护照还没成为非洲大部分的选择。”</s>

en: Mr Mohammed sees a combination requiring passengers to produce Covid-19 certificates showing that they are fully vaccinated and those with Covid-ve results before boarding a flight.
luo: Migosi Mohammed neno ni ndalo biro chop ma jo wuoth ibiro dwaro ni obed gi marua matin manyiso ni ose chanj gi kod duoko mar chenjo kapok ngato oidho ndege.
mt0: <pad> Mr Mohammed sees a combination requiring passengers to produce Covid-19 certificates showing that they are fully vaccinated and those with Covid-ve results before boarding a flight.</s>

en: “I see that for the next 12 months and probably beyond, that there might be a consensus among people in the aviation industry worldwide agreeing on a specific Covid passport requirement for all travels,” said Mohammed.
luo: “Aneno ni e dweche 12 ma biro kata mokalo kanyo, winjruok biro bede kuom jogo matiyo e migawo mar ndeke e piny mangima madwaro ni ji nyaka bedi kod barua maduong (Passport) mar wuoth moro amora”.  Mohammed ne owacho kamano.
mt0: <pad> 我看見在未來十二個月,也許更長的時間裏,人們在航空業全球同意一個特定的COVID-19護照要求於所有旅行中。</s>

en: The Kenya Revenue Authority (KRA) has raised alarm over an increase in excisable products with counterfeit stamps in the market.
luo: Bad migawo ma solo osuru e Kenya miluongo ni The Kenya Revenue Authority (KRA) ywak ni nitie mibadhi kuom johala ma loso gik ma bandia ma dwa chalo mag Piny Owacho puodho jo ohala.
mt0: <pad> Kenya Revenue Authority (KRA) has raised alarm over an increase in excisable products with counterfeit stamps in the market.</s>

en: Kenya Association of Manufacturers lists cigarettes containing tobacco substitutes, wines and other alcoholic beverages obtained by fermentation of fruits as some of the excisable goods.
luo: Riwruok mar johala ma iluongo ni Kenya Association of Manufacturers owacho ni gik machalo ndawa, gik ma imadho ma iluongo ni - wines - kod kuong ma olosi gi olembe ma okuogi mawach e moko kuom gigo ma onego ochulne osuru.
mt0: <pad> Kenya Association of Manufacturers lists cigarettes containing tobacco substitutes, wines and other alcoholic beverages obtained by fermentation of fruits as some of the excisable goods.</s>

en: Others include mineral water, fruit juices, cosmetics and beauty products, and compounded spirits of alcoholic strengths exceeding 10 per cent.
luo: Gik mamoko gin pige ma oketie chupni ma ihuso, olembe ma imadho, gik ma medo ber mar mon kod kuong ma oriw man gi teko makalo 10%.
mt0: <pad> 其他包括矿物水、水果汁、化妆品和美妆产品,以及混合酒的酒精含量超过10%。</s>

en: “The public is forewarned that having excisable goods affixed with counterfeit excise stamps is an offence, consequences, if found, shall be confiscation, seizure and destruction of the goods by the commissioner,” KRA said in a statement.
luo: Jopiny omi siem ni keto gima puodho gik ma ihuso ma okwan malo ka ma okalo e lwet Piny Owacho ibiro maki gi Sirikal ma kethi gi jatelo mar Sirikal ma ochung ne weche machal kamago.” KRA ne ondiko kamano.
mt0: <pad> “The public is forewarned that having excisable goods affixed with counterfeit excise stamps is an offence, consequences, if found, shall be confiscation, seizure and destruction of the goods by the commissioner,” KRA said in a statement.</s>

en: “A person who contravenes the provisions of the law shall also be upon conviction subjected to a fine not exceeding Sh5 million or imprisonment to a term not exceeding three years.”
luo: “Ngat no ma oketho chieke ma oket gi Piny Wacho go bende ka ose ter e od bura to ibiro dwar ni ochul pesa mar ketho chik maromo tara gana 5,000,000 ka ok kamano to ibiro miye kum mar twech ma ok okalo higni adek.”
mt0: <pad> “A person who contravenes the provisions of the law shall also be upon conviction subjected to a fine not exceeding Sh5 million or imprisonment to a term not exceeding three years.”</s>

en: KRA also warned that the means of conveyance used to carry such goods is liable for forfeiture as provided under section 211 of the East African Community Customs Management Act 2004.
luo: KRA bende nyocha ologo chik ni gino ma otigo tingo misigo mwandu ma ok ochulnegi osuru ibiro maki ma kaw gi Piny Owacho kaluwore gi chik namba 211 mar riwruok mar East Africa Communty ma tayo yore mag chulo osuru mane okathe e higa 2004.
mt0: <pad> KRA also warned that the means of conveyance used to transport such goods is liable for confiscation as provided under section 211 of the East African Community Customs Management Act 2004</s>

en: The taxman has ordered parking attendants in Nairobi to photograph number plates of vehicles whose owners have failed to pay parking fees.
luo: KRA onyiso jogo ma ngiyo kama ngeche ichunge e Nairobi mondo ogo picha namba gechego ma weg gi ok ochulo osuru.
mt0: <pad> Taxman has ordered parking attendants in Nairobi to photograph the number plates of cars whose owners have failed to pay parking fees.</s>

en: The decision is prompted by the rising number of motorists disputing penalties imposed for failure to pay parking fees.
luo: Wach ni obiro nikech kwan mar nyamburko mangeny ma weg gi ok oyie gi chudo ma idwaro ni gichul nikech ne ok gi chulo pesa mar chungo geche gi kunde ma oket gi Piny Owacho ma Nairobi.
mt0: <pad> 这个决定是因为越来越多司机在争论停车费罚款的处罚,因为他们没有支付停车费。</s>

en: “To address these complaints, parking attendants in county uniform will henceforth photograph the number plates of non-compliant motor vehicles for reference purposes in case of disputes.”
luo: Mondo mi weche ma kamagi rum, jogo ma ondiki gi Piny Owacho ma Nairobi mar ngiyo kunde ma ichunge geche go, ma orwako lewni mar tich mondo -  chakre sani ka dhi nyime - ogo picha namba mar nyamburko go ma weg gi ok chudi mondo obedi e andika mar Piny Owacho.
mt0: <pad> 為了解決這些抱怨,停車場的服務員將在州裝上拍攝無法遵守的汽車號碼標誌以便於參考。</s>

en: KRA has also banned the physical VIP parking stickers replacing them with a system where a list of all vehicles that qualify for VIP parking have been uploaded into the Nairobi Revenue System (NRS) parking system.
luo: KRA bende oweyo golo barupe matindo ma Piny Owacho ma Nairobi ose bet ka miyo jodito ma gichungo go mitokni e buma ma Nairobi ka koro gikelo yo manyien ma ondikie nying joma ok owinjore ochul osuru  machal kamano.
mt0: <pad> KRA 也禁止了实体的VIP停车贴纸,并把它们换成了系统,一个列表所有的车子可以进入VIP停车的地方已经被上传到Nairobi Revenue System (NRS)停车场系统。</s>

en: The Kenya Revenue Authority (KRA) took over the collection of revenue in Nairobi County last year following an agreement signed between the then-governor Mike Sonko and President Uhuru Kenyatta.
luo: Bad Piny Owacho ma choko osuru no - The Kenya Revenue Authority (KRA) – ne okawo choko osuru mar Piny Owacho ma Nairobi higa ma okalo bang keto kokgi e winjruok e kind jatend Piny Owacho ma Nairobi Moluor Mike Sonko kod Ker mar Kenya Uhuru Kenyatta.
mt0: <pad> Kenya Revenue Authority (KRA) took over the collection of revenue in Nairobi County last year after an agreement signed between the then-governor Mike Sonko and President Uhuru Kenyatta.</s>

en: “According to Article 5.5 of the Deed of Transfer of Function from the Nairobi City County Government to the National Government gazette, February 25, 2020, and per section 160 of the Public Finance Management Act, 2012...the Nairobi City County Government appoints the Kenya Revenue Authority as the principal-agent for overall revenue collection for all county revenue for twenty-four months, with effect from March 16, 2020” read part of the Gazette Notice signed by Finance Executive Allan Igambi.
luo: “Kaluwore gi winjruok namba 5.5 mar kaw tiche ma moko mag Piny Owacho ma Nairobi tero e Piny Owacho ma Malo mane ondiki e oboke mar Sirikal mane ogol dwe mar Ariyo tarik 25, 2020 kendo ka luwore gi chik namba 160 mar kaka pesa mar jopiny owinjore oti mane olosi 2012, Piny Owacho ma Nairobi ne omiyo ja sol osuru ma Kenya - Kenya Revenue Authority kaka ja sol osuru makende ma biro choko osuru ei Nairobi kuom kinde maromo dweche piero ariyo gagwen, chakre dwe mar Adek Tarik 16, 2020”. Ma ne ondikie oboke mar sirikal ma mane oketi e kogno gi jatelo ma ochung ne weche mag omuom e Piny Owacho ma Nairobi.
mt0: <pad> According to Article 5.5 of the Deed of Transfer of Function from the Nairobi City County Government to the National Government Gazette, February 25, 2020, and per section 160 of the Public Finance Management Act, 2012...the Nairobi City County Government appoints the Kenya Revenue Authority as the principal-agent for overall revenue collection for all county revenue for twenty-four months, with effect from March 16, 2020” read part of the Gazette Notice signed by Finance Executive Allan Igambi.</s>

en: Former Controller of Budget Agnes Odhiambo had proposed that counties contract KRA as their revenue collection agents.
luo: Jal no mane ochung ne nyiyo kaka pesa jopiny ma Kenya ikeyo e bad migepe ma opogore opogore e higni ma okalo Nyadendi Agnes Odhiambo ne owacho ni Piny Owacho mag kor gweng’ mondo omi KRA tich mar choko negi osuru e kor gwenge gi.
mt0: <pad> 前财政控制 Agnes Odhiambo曾建议县份雇用KRA为他们的税收搜集员。</s>

en: “Counties are collecting less revenue than their potential, and this is because of poor systems and leakages,” she said in August 2019.
luo: “Piny Owacho mag kor ngwenge sani choko osuru matin ne kaka owinjore gichoki kendo ma timore nikech onge chenro maber ma gin go ka obedore gi kuo.” Ma ne Nyadendino ne owacho e dwe mar Aboro 2019.
mt0: <pad> “Counties are collecting less revenue than their potential, and this is because of poor systems and leakages,” she said in August 2019.</s>

en: Artificial intelligence won't replace investment managers, but it could improve returns
luo: Gik ma olosi gi lwet dhano masani konyo kor ka kano pesa kama ngato nyalo yude ohala ok nyalo kawo kar ji ma ose bet ka timo tije go.
mt0: <pad> 人工智能不会取代投资经理,但它可以改善回报率。</s>

en: It shouldn’t be news to anyone that artificial intelligence (AI) is developing rapidly and drastically reshaping our future.
luo: Ok en gima nyien ni kuomwa ni gik ma olosi kod lwet dhano gi sani medore kendo gibiro kelo pogruok e dak mar dhano ma kiny.
mt0: <pad> Artificial intelligence (AI) 正在快速发展,并大幅改变我们的未来。</s>

en: Yet what the average pension-contributing individual might not have thought about is how this development will affect the management of his or her pensions and savings in the years ahead.
luo: Katakamano gima ngat no masani chulo pesa ma obiro chamo ka ose weyo tich ok ongeyo en kaka yore masani itiyogo gi biro kelo lokruok e yo ma pesa ne mar aheri kod keno mare biro bed nyime kono.
mt0: <pad> 但什么普通的养老金资助者可能没有考虑过是这项发展将如何影响他的养老金和储蓄管理在未来几年。</s>

en: How might AI affect pensions and savings?
luo: En ango ma paro manyien masani biro kelo e weche mag pesa mar aheri kod keno ma nyalo konyo ngato nyime?
mt0: <pad> 人工智能可能如何影响养老金和储蓄?</s>

en: Asset and wealth management firms are working on ways to use AI to improve their investment decisions and to extract insights from historical data, which should increase efficiency, accuracy and compliance.
luo: Kembe ma ngiyo mandu mag ji temo rango kaka ginyalo tiyo gi paro manyien manyalo konyogi ngado bura kuom kaka ginyalo keto mwandu kuonde ma biro miyo gi ohala maber; kaka ginyalo tiyo gi ndiko machon mokan mondo okony gi e yor tiyo mapiyo ka maonge gima okethore kendo kaluwore gi chike mag piny.
mt0: <pad> Asset and wealth management firms are working on ways to use AI to improve their investment decisions and extract insights from historical data, which should increase efficiency, accuracy and compliance.</s>

en: Other services, like robo-advisory, are also taking off.
luo: Paro mamoko machalo Jo Robo ma ngado ne ji rieki bende sani chako yangore e lela.
mt0: <pad> 其他服务,如机器人咨询,也开始增长。</s>

en: With the global AI asset management market size expected to be worth almost USD13.5 billion within the next six years, it’s clearly a booming part of the business.
luo: Ka ji tiyo gi weche masani ma iluongo gi dho ngere ni artificial intelligence (AI), yore ma ji biro loso go mwandu e piny ma ngima ilieko ni biro romo pesa mag jo America tara gana 13,000,500,000 kuom higni auchiel mabiro; ma en dongruok mar ohala maber!
mt0: <pad> 你不知道</s>

en: The development of technology in finance and computer-aided algorithms has also contributed to rising interest in low-cost, rules-based, quantitatively-oriented passive investment strategies.
luo: Medruok mar gik ma itiyogo e yore ma pesa wuothogo e piny kod weche mag komputa omiyo sani nitie chenro ma oketi makelo ma miyo nwengo mar ohala bet maber, ji tiyo kaka chik dwaro kod kano pesa ma bup.
mt0: <pad> The development of technology in finance and computer-aided algorithms has also contributed to the rising interest in low-cost, rules-based, quantitatively-oriented passive investment strategies.</s>

en: Over the last five years, such strategies have grown by about USD2 trillion while traditional active management strategies declined by roughly the same amount.
luo: Kuom higni abich ma ose kalo, chenro ma chal kamagi omiyo dongruok ose betie maromo pesa mar jo America ma dirom tara gana gana 2,000,000,000,000 ka yore mane itigo chok to omedo dok chien marom mana gi dongruok ma ose bedono.
mt0: <pad> 在过去的五年里,这些策略已经增长了大约2万亿美元,而传统管理策略则下降了差不多相同的数量。</s>

en: Traditional market capitalization-weighted indices – like mutual funds or exchange-traded funds (ETF) – have also grown over the last five years.
luo: Yore mane itiyogo chon e weche mag pesa machalo kano pesa gi ji mangeny - mutual funds - kod timo ohala e yo masani bende ose medore e higni ma okalogo.
mt0: <pad> 传统市场资产权重指数(Market Capitalization Weighted Indexes,简称:MSCI)也增长了过去五年。</s>

en: This has been aided by minimal costs and strong performance due to the extended bull market.
luo: Ma ose timore nikech tiyo gi pesa matin kod yuto maber nikech choro ma omedore.
mt0: <pad> 这被低成本和强表现所帮助,因为市场持续上涨。</s>

en: However, these indices are now being rivalled by other weighting systems that deploy technology to deliver better outcomes and mitigate risks.
luo: Kata kamano, sani kor nitie yore moko mabeyo ma itiyogo maloyo machon go ma sani miyo tich bet mayot kendo lal bedo matin.
mt0: <pad> 然而,这些指数现在被其他权重系统所竞争,使用技术来带来更好的结果和减少风险。</s>

en: For example, as stakeholders increasingly focus on the harmful role of carbon in global warming and the importance of other ESG-related issues in mitigating portfolio and social risks, asset owners are using technology to adjust market capitalization-weighted benchmarks.
luo: Kuom ranyisi, sama ji sani medo keto wangegi e yiro mamedo liet e piny kod weche mamoko machal kamago, jo mwandu to sani rango mana kaka ginyalo tiyo gi yor mbuyi kuom kelo medruok mar mwandu gi.
mt0: <pad> 例如,随着参与者越來越關注碳的負面作用在全球溫暖中以及其他ESG相關問題的重要性在降低資產和社會風險上,資產所有者正在使用技術來調整市場資本化量-重點標<0xE5><0x87><0x96>指標。</s>

en: In this way, we expect the role of AI in index investing will have a knock-on effect of improving asset owner and asset manager decisions, focusing them on working with portfolio companies over longer time horizons and supporting companies that, for instance, need to transition away from poor carbon outcomes.
luo: Ka wadhi kama to nitie geno ni yore ma ji loso go mwandu ka gitiyo gi gik masani biro kelo yot ne jo mwandu kuom ngado bura kaka ginyalo dhi nyime maber, ka gitiyo kanyakla gi kembe ma ochungne yore mag loso mwandu. Kuom ranyisi, ginyalo konyo kembe madwaro weyo tiyo gi gigo ma golo iro mangeny e piny.
mt0: <pad> 这样,我们认为角色的人工智能在指数投资中会产生一个反作用,改善资产所有者和资产管理师的决定,使他们专注于与资产组合公司合作长远的时间视图,并支持企业,例如,需要转变从低碳排放的结果。</s>

en: We further expect that this will lead asset owners to engage more transparently with their constituents (for example, pensioners or retail clients) to explain why such decisions are optimal.
luo: Bende wan gi geno ni wach ni biro miyo jo mwandu wuoyo e yoo ma onge miriambo gi jogo ma gikonyore go machalo joma ose weyo tich kod ji achiel achiel ma konyore kuom gi ka ginyiso gi gima omiyo gingado bura kamano.
mt0: <pad> 我们还希望这会使资产所有者更加透明地与他们的组成部分(例如,养老金或零售客户)交流,解释为什么这些决定是最佳的。</s>

en: AI will gradually play a greater role in critically assessing human judgements in investment decision-making frameworks, to moderate or counter short-term behavioural biases or even to make judgements without human input.
luo: Gima itiyo go sani ma iluongo ni AI biro konyo ahinya e yoo ma dhano ngado go bura kaka gi nyalo medo mwandu gi, ka gi pieyo kata radhni gi ranyisi mar kido marach kata ka dhano ok ochiwo paro moro amora.
mt0: <pad> AI 会逐步扮演一个更大的角色在投资决定框架中,以平衡或消除短期行为偏见,甚至可以做出判断没有人类参与。</s>

en: This will mean a streamlined ability to predict what will happen and the best course of action for financial forecasting.
luo: Ma biro keto chenro maber ma nyalo koro gima biro timore ndalo mabiro kendo gima onego otim kuom chenro mar tiyo gi pesa e yor loso mwandu.
mt0: <pad> 这意味着能够预测未来,并选择最佳商业计划。</s>

en: This is an improvement on a currently very manual process that suffers from inherent human biases.
luo: Ma en bedruok kuom yoo machon ma pod ji tiyogo man gi chandruok ma bede nikech dwaro mar dhano.
mt0: <pad> 这是个改进,现在非常手动的流程,由于人性偏见而受到影响。</s>

en: Could AI displace investment managers? We don’t think so.
luo: Bende en adieri paro ma iluongo ni Artificial Intellegence (AI) nyalo ketho tich ne jogo matiyo sani e yore makelo medruok kuom mwandu? Ok wane ka ma nyalo timore.
mt0: <pad> 人工智能能取代投资经理吗?我们不这样认为。</s>

en: For AI to be successful in any of this, AI still needs humans.
luo: Mondo AI obed gima itiyo maber, pod obiro dwaro joma tiyo kode.
mt0: <pad> 為了讓 AI 成功在任何這種事上, AI 仍然需要人類。</s>

en: What are some of the ethical considerations?
luo: Ang’o gini ma owinjore ji oket e pach gi?
mt0: <pad> 你不知道吗?</s>

en: Firms will need to invest in experts to monitor the AI and ensure it functions and make adjustments when needed
luo: Kembe biro dwaro mondo joma oluoch gi wach mar AI orangi kaka otiyo mondo one ni otimo tich maber kendo oketo puogruok kama dwarore.
mt0: <pad> 公司需要投资专家来监控人工智能,确保它运作,并做出调整时需要。</s>

en: This means that investment decisions will still be largely reliant on individual judgement and common patterns of biases, much like they have for the past 20 years.
luo: Ma nyiso ni ngado bura kuom kaka jo mwandu nyalo bedo mwandu gi pod biro mana tim gi dhano kaluwore gi kaka dwaro mar dhano masani chal.
mt0: <pad> 这意味着投资决定将仍然很大程度上依靠个人判断和常见的偏见,就像过去 20 年一样。</s>

en: Using AI in investment management also creates new risks and challenges.
luo: Tiyo gi AI e yor medo mwandu bende kelo lal kod chandruok ma moko e chiro.
mt0: <pad> 使用人工智能在投资管理中也创造了新的风险和挑战。</s>

en: A model is only as good as the data you put into it – so model opacity and data integrity matter.
luo: Ngama oloso gi lwet dhano nyalo mana tiyo maber kaluwore gi kit gigo ma okete.
mt0: <pad> A model is only as good as the data you put into it – so model opacity and data integrity matter.</s>

en: And questions about the ethics in justifying or bounding AI investment decisions will also need to be answered, as well as issues surrounding the regulation of AI systems, the risks of heightened pro-cyclical investment activity and the current lack of a monitoring framework, as AI plays an ever-increasing role in the investment decision-making process.
luo: Penjo kuom kaka ji biro bedo gi kido maber ka gitiyo gi AI kuom ngado bura mar ohala bende biro dwarore mondo oduoki maber, ka achiel gi chike matayo kaka AI owinjore oti, chandruok ma tiyo gi yoo manyien ni nyalo kelo kendo gi bedo maonge yoo ma inyalo pim go kaka otiyo nikech AI konyo ahinya kuom ngado bura kaka jomwandu nyalo kelo bedruok e mwandu gi.
mt0: <pad> 也需要回答关于道德的决定投资AI,以及有关监管 AI系统的问题,风险的上升的投资活动和目前缺乏一个监控框架,因为人工智能在投资决策过程中扮演着越来越大的角色。</s>

en: These questions matter because of the need to maintain and improve the level of trust and confidence in investment management and the broader financial system in general.
luo: Penjo gi duto gin gik ma roteke nikech dwaro ni ji obedo gi yie kuom tiyo gi paro manyien e weche mag rito mwandu kod yore ma itayo go kaka pesa wuodho e piny.
mt0: <pad> 这些问题重要是因为需要保持和改善信任和信心的程度在投资管理和整个金融体系中。</s>

en: This is partially achieved by explaining transparently how ethical and social responsibility factors can be included in the investment decision-making process at the portfolio, strategic and regulatory levels, so that AI can be developed with proper balance.
luo: Ma nyalo timore ka oler ne ji e yoo ma oyangore kaka kido maber kod kawo ting mar tich inyalo bedi e seche ma ji konyore gi paro e weche mag rito mwandu e okang’ ma opogore opogore kaka e kambi kod ka bad Piny Owacho ma ngiyo wechego. Ma biro miyo AI obed gima ngiyo koni gi koni.
mt0: <pad> 这部分做到了通过公开地说明如何将道德和社会责任因素纳入到投资决定-making过程的各个阶段,包括在资产组合、战略和监管层面上,这样AI才能发展得有适当平衡。</s>

en: At the same time, trust and confidence can only be gained if frameworks are developed to control pro-cyclical investment activity, monitor AI decision-making impacts in financial markets, and enforce the role of human interaction in the investment-management process to oversee and communicate decisions (whether by human or AI).
luo: E seche go, bedo gi chung ma ojawore kod yie ma otego no nyalo mana bede ka nitie yore ma oketi mondo otaa kaka AI tiyo kendo chero kaka bura ma ogandi ka itiyo gi rieko manyien ni kelo pogruok e yore ma pesa ringe e piny kendo keto chike ma tayo kaka dhano biro tiyo gi Ai e yore duto ma dwarore - obed ni en tich dhano kata AI.
mt0: <pad> 同樣,信任和信心只能得到當框架被發展來控制投資活動,監視AI決策的影響在金融市場上,並且嚴格執行人際交流的角色於投資管理過程中,以監察和傳達決定(不管是人或 AI)。</s>

en: What should we be doing about these questions?
luo: Mondo mi weche mabeyo mag dongruok manyien ni odhi nyime, owinjore wadwar jogo manie e pawno mondo otaa kendo omed siro dongruok mar AI e yore mag kano mwandu.
mt0: <pad> 我们应该做什么关于这些问题?</s>

en: In order to allow for these positive developments, we need to identify the key stakeholders to manage and encourage positive AI development in the investment management process.
luo: Ma biro dwaro sirikal, jogo man gi mwandu, jogo ma rito mwandu, jo keno, jogo man go loch matut e yor kano mwandu, jogo ma osomo chike kod joma ochung ne ji achiel achiel ma bende tiyo tinj ni.
mt0: <pad> 為了讓這些積極發展,我們必須找出關鍵的利益攸關者來管理和鼓勵積極AI發展在投資管理過程中。</s>

en: These include regulators, asset owners, asset managers, custodians, investment consultants, legal experts and representatives of retail investors.
luo: Ma biro dwaro sirikal, jogo man gi mwandu, jogo ma rito mwandu, jo keno, jogo man go loch matut e yor kano mwandu, jogo ma osomo chike kod joma ochung ne ji achiel achiel ma bende tiyo tinj ni.
mt0: <pad> 他们包括监管者、资产所有者、资产管理公司、保释人、投资顾问、法律专家和零售投资者的代表。</s>

en: We need to bring stakeholders together to agree upon an appropriate framework of ethical inputs, regulation and monitoring systems for AI.
luo: Owinjore wakel ji kanyakla mondo gi winjre kaka weche mag kido maber, chike kendo ngiyo kaka yore ringo e wach mar AI.
mt0: <pad> 我们需要把参与者聚在一起,以便达成一个合适的框架,对伦理性输入、监管和监控系统进行人工智慧。</s>

en: Regardless of regulation and monitoring systems, asset managers also need to take it on themselves to address some of these issues in their existing investment process.
luo: Kata obedo ni ni nitiere chike mag piny owacho kod chenro mar ngiyo kaka tich tiyore, jogo ma keto mwandu mari kuonde ma medruok nitie nyaka koro kaw thuolo mar neno ni giloso weche ma otenore gi rito mwandu gi.

en: We are ultimately optimistic that properly managed AI will support human judgement in managing pensions and savings – and maybe even improve your returns! – by reinforcing best practices and mitigating known biases.
luo: An gi geno ma otegno ni paro masani itiyo go manyien ni biro konyo ji kor ngado bura kaka weche mag aheri ma ngato yudo ka oweyo tich kod keno ma ji bedogo biro dhi maber kendo biro kelo medruok e weche go ka yore go mago ma ose ne ni dhi maber ema imedo tigo kendo kuonde ma nitie chandruok bende ineno kak ilosi.

en: President Uhuru Kenyatta has directed the Kenya Meat Commission (KMC) to partner with relevant State agencies to standardise their products for the export market.
luo: Ker Ohuru Kenyatta ogolo chik ne bad Piny Owacho ma yango chiaye – Kenya Meat Commision – mondo oti kanyakla achiel gi bede Piny Owacho mamoko ma timo tije ma oyiengore gi gima gitomo mondo opim ringo ma giyango ma inyalo usi e chiro ma ooko.
mt0: <pad> President Uhuru Kenyatta has directed the Kenya Meat Commission (KMC) to partner with relevant State agencies to standardise their products for the export market.</s>

en: The president, who was speaking during the official re-opening of KMC in Athi River, Machakos County yesterday, said he was optimistic of the meat products reaching the European market.
luo: Ker no ma nyo owuoyo e nyasi mar yawo kar yang’o ringo (KMC) ma oger Athi River e Piny Owacho ma Machakos ne owacho ni en gi adieri ni ringo ma iyango kanyo biro chopo e pinje mag jo wagunda.
mt0: <pad> 总统在开业仪式上说,他对肉制品的出口到欧洲市场感到乐观。</s>

en: “We have done it before when Kenyan meat and meat products were sold worldwide and I believe once again meat products should join the growing list of food items that we export to the rest of the world,” he said.
luo: “Nitie kinde mane wase uso ring'o ma oa Kenya e piny mangima; kuom mano, an gi yie ni ring'o bende owinjore obed achiel kuom chiemo ma watero e pinje ma oko.” Ne owacho kamano.
mt0: <pad> “We have done it before when Kenyan meat and meat products were sold worldwide and I believe once again meat products should join the growing list of food items that we export to the rest of the world,” he said.</s>

en: The Head of State said he expects the country’s beef exports to also hit the Middle East as well as emerging markets, where the population is growing and consumers have more purchasing power.
luo: Jatend piny ne owacho ni ogeno ni ring'o ma Kenya tero oko biro chopo e pinje mag warabu gi chirni masani yudore kunde ma moko ma kwan dhano medore kendo ji nigi pesa maber mar ng'iewo gigo ma gidwaro.
mt0: <pad> 總統說他預計中國的豬肉出口將也擊中東以及新兴市場,當人口增長且消費者有更多的購買力。</s>

en: “The Africa continental free trade arrangement coming into force provides an opportunity that should benefit the livestock sector by harnessing the entire supply chain in the meat industry,” he said.
luo: “Chenro mar jo Africa mar loso chiro maduong ma ji ni thuolo mar uso maonge weche mageny biro kelo ohala ne joma pidho jamni ma biro miyo nengo chiaye dhi malo ka oa kuom japith, ja uso, ngama loso ringo nyaka chop kuom jachiemo.” Ne owacho kamano.
mt0: <pad> “The Africa continental free trade arrangement coming into force provides an opportunity that should benefit the livestock sector by harnessing the entire supply chain in the meat industry,” he said.</s>

en: The Head of State said the livestock sector’s potential extends to hides and skin, which informed his administration’s push to breathe life into the tannery industry.
luo: Jatend piny ne owacho ni pidho chiaye nigi yore mag loso pesa machalo kaka uso piende kendo ma ema omiyo ne sirikande otemo matek mar neno ni kama ing'iewe piende bende koro tiyo.
mt0: <pad> The head of state said the livestock sector’s potential extends to hides and skin, which informed his administration’s push to breathe life into the tannery industry.</s>

en: The president, while lauding the positive changes at the commission since its transfer to the Ministry of Defence, said time was ripe for KMC to reclaim its role in the country’s economy.
luo: Ker, ka puoyo lokruok maber ma jo lweny okelo e kar yango ringo no – Kenya Meat Commision (KMC) bang kete e bwo Migawo Ma Rito Piny (Minstry of Defence) ne owacho ni saa ose chop ne KMC mondo ochak okel dongruok e piny Kenya.
mt0: <pad> 总统赞扬了KMC的积极变化,并说时间到了KMC重新回归其角色在国家经济上。</s>

en: He said interest from Kenya Prisons, National Youth Service, Kenya Wildlife Service, and police training college contracting KMC for their supplies was a sign of the renewed trust in the commission.
luo: Ne owacho ni bedo ni migepe sirikal mag Jo Jela – Kenya Prisons, Joma Tiego Nyithindo – National Youth Service, Joma Rito Le – Kenya Wildlife Service kod Joma tiego Obila – Police Training College dwaro miyo KCM tich mar tero negi ringo ma gichamo nyiso ni ji sani nigi yie kuom jo yang’ ringo no.
mt0: <pad> He said interest from Kenya Prisons, National Youth Service, Kenya Wildlife Service and police training college contracting KMC for their supplies was a sign of the renewed trust in the commission.</s>

en: KMC, which was initially under the Ministry of Agriculture, was in September 2020 transferred to the Ministry of Defence.

mt0: <pad> KMC, which was originally under the Ministry of Agriculture, was in September 2020 transferred to the Ministry of Defence.</s>

en: While the move has been contested in court, President Kenyatta yesterday defended the decision albeit with a lot of care.
luo: Kata obedo ni wach mar lokruok no oseter e doho mondo ong'i ane ka bende ne otime ka oluwore gi chike mag piny Kenya, Ker Kenyatta nyoro otemo lero ni gino ne otim kaluwore gi chike mag Kenya, kotang'.
mt0: <pad> While the move has been contested in court, President Kenyatta yesterday defended the decision albeit with a lot of care.</s>

en: “Past administration has made efforts to jumpstart KMC, but for reasons which are known never succeeded and a lot of public funds went astray,” he said.

mt0: <pad> “The past administration has made efforts to jumpstart KMC, but for reasons that are known never succeeded and a lot of public funds went astray,” he said.</s>

en: He noted the transfer had eased payments to farmers — some who had gone for four years without compensation after supplying animals.

mt0: <pad> He noted the transfer had eased payments to farmers — some who had been without compensation for four years after supplying animals.</s>

mt0: <pad> “The commission’s business reorganisation plan has kicked off in earnest with offsetting debts to all farmers,” said Defence Cabinet Secretary Monica Juma.</s>

en: The fight against growing cases of cybercrime on Monday got a boost with the approval of new 40 standards directed at safeguarding consumer privacy.
luo: Kedo gi njore mag ndiko e mbuyi nyocha wuok tich oyudo teko bango kalo chike 40 manyien go ma idwaro ni ogeng’ dug joma tiyo gi yor mbuyi.
mt0: <pad> 星期一,40个标准被批准了。</s>

en: According to the Communications Authority of Kenya, cybercrime incidences rose by over 50 per cent in the fourth quarter of last year to 56.2 million from 35.1 million threats reported in the previous quarter.
luo: Kaluwore gi bad migawo mar Piny Owacho ma ochung ma chiwo baruwa mar tich ne johala mag yore mbuyi, koso ma joma tiyo gi yore mbuyi ne obedogo e dweche agwen magik e higa mokalo ne okalo 50 e wi 100 ka oaye kwan maromo tara gana 351000,000 nyaka 562,000,000 kuom buok mane owachi ni ne obede e kinde machal kamano kane pok ogik higa ma okalo.
mt0: <pad> According to the Communications Authority of Kenya, cybercrime incidences rose by over 50 per cent in the fourth quarter of last year to 56.2 million from 35.1 million threats reported in the previous quarter.</s>

en: Of note, malware and application attacks continued to rank highly among the factors that have contributed to the surge in cyber-security challenges.

en: On Monday, the Kenya Bureau of Standards (KEBS) said it has approved forty (40) new standards to be used by auditors, managers and management teams, trainers and assessors in the ICT to enhance information and cybersecurity and safeguard consumer privacy.
luo: Chieng wuok tich, bad migawo mar Piny Owacho ma pimo gik ma iloso e Kenya ma iluongo ni Kenya Bureau of Stands (KEBS) nyoch owacho ni gise puodho ranyiny mat pimo moromo 40 ma koro ibiro tiyo go gi jononro, jotelo mag kembe kod jok mamoko manie kiwango mar ngiyo kaka tich tiyore, joma tiego ji, joma ngiyo kunde ma okethore e tudruok mar mbuyi mondo obed keyo wach kod gengo njore ma itimo kuonde go mondo omi joma tiyo gi yor mbuyi kik weche gi wuok oko kuom joma ok owinjore yud gi.

en: The new standards outline various techniques and methods for securing corporate information by an individual or managers charged with the responsibility of ensuring institutional data is safe.

mt0: <pad> 新的标准列出不同方法和技术来保护公司信息,由个人或管理人员负责保护组织数据的安全。</s>

en: Consumers are increasingly adopting digital technology, the data generated creates both an opportunity for enterprises to improve customer engagement and a responsibility to keep it safe.

en: "The new guidelines provide a robust system to fight against cybersecurity threats, breach of privacy and other information security measures to ensure that Confidentiality, Integrity and Authenticity (CIA) of information is maintained during the creation, usage, storage and transfer of information,” says Bernard Njiraini, Managing Director, KEBS.
luo: “Chike ma nyien go miyo nigi yore mabeyo mar kedo gi njore mar joma tiyo gi yor mbuyi, golo weche ngato ooko kata wach moro machielo ma miyo ji bedo kod siri, kido maber kod weche ma oriere tir e seche ma imanyo, itiyo kendo ikano wach ma ngato oyudo”. Mano ne owachi gi Migosi Bernard Njiraini ma en jatelo maduong mar migawo ma pimo gik ma oloso ka jopiny pok otiyo kodgi mondo gine ni onge gima rach.

en: The standards also stipulate a framework for ensuring privacy in information and communication technology (ICT) systems that store and process personally identifiable information (PII).

en: Key among the approved standards include guidelines for information security management systems auditing, code of practice for electronic discovery, vulnerability handling process, online privacy notices and consent, cloud service metering and billing modes.
luo: Maduong kuom chike ma nyocha opuodhi go otingo ler kaka inyalo ne ni nitie rit maber kuom weche mag ji, tiyo gi yor stima, gik ma okungore ma onego oriti maber, lendo ne ji gik ma ok owinjore oyangi e lela, dwaro thuolo mar tiyo gi wach ma omakore gi ngato kata jomoko kod chudo e yoo mbuyi.

en: Others include the competence requirements for information security testers, the framework of trust for processing of multi-sourced data.
luo: Moko otingo dwaro ni jogo ma ngiyo yore mag ritruok e weche mag tich e yor mbuyi kod yore ma ochikore tir kuom keyo weche ma ogol kuonde ma opogore opogore.

en: It comes few weeks after the United Kingdom listed Kenya among countries in Africa to benefit from Sh3.3 billion cyberwar chest.
luo: Ma timore mana bang juma matin ma ose kalo ka piny wasunge ma iluongo ni United Kingdom nyocha indiko Kenya kaka achiel kuom pinje man Africa ma owinjire oyud pesa maromo 3,300,000 mondo okony gi kedo gi jo njore go.
mt0: <pad> 这来几周后,英国列肯尼亚在非洲国家中受益的Sh3.3 billion网络战争钱包。</s>

en: The money targets supporting national cyber response units, advising on consumer safety awareness online and setting up a joint Interpol cyber hub that will help nations mount joint operation on cybercriminals.
luo: Ma timore mana bang juma matin ma ose kalo ka piny wasunge ma iluongo ni United Kingdom nyocha indiko Kenya kaka achiel kuom pinje man Africa ma owinjire oyud pesa maromo 3,300,000 mondo okony gi kedo gi jo njore go.
mt0: <pad> The money aims to support national cyber response units, advise on consumer safety awareness online and set up a joint Interpol cyber hub that will help nations mount joint operation on cybercriminals.</s>

en: The United Kingdom (UK) through its Foreign Secretary Dominic Raab noted with concern the rising number of criminals that target online consumers and disrupting ease of doing business in the modern world.
luo: Jagoro ma UK ma ochunge ne weche ma oko Migosi Dominic Raab nyocha owuoro ahinya bedruok mar weche mag njore ma temo mayo joma sani ngiewo gik moko e yor mbuyi; ma ose ketho yoo mayot ma sani itimo go ohala
mt0: <pad> 英国 (UK) 通过其外长 Dominic Raab注意到了日益增长的数字的犯罪分子,他们瞄准了线上消费者,并妨碍了商业活动在现代世界。</s>

en: As part of the new approach to bring down cybercriminals, the UK jointly with INTERPOL, is setting up a new cyber operations hub in Africa working across Ethiopia, Ghana, Kenya, Nigeria and Rwanda to support joint operations against cyber-crime.
luo: Kaka achiel kuom paro manyien mar duoko chien jo njore mag yoo mbuyi, UK ka tiyo kanyakla gi okwach kich ma tiyo piny mangima ma iluongo ni INTERPOL kuom keto kamoro e piny jorotenge ma Africa momdo iti e pinje machalo Ethiopia, Ghana, Kenya, Nigeria kod Rwanda mondo okony e yor tiyo kanyala kuom kedo gi jo njorego machando ji e yoo mbuyi.
mt0: <pad> 作为新方法来打击网络犯罪者,英国和INTERPOL一起在非洲设立了新的互联网运营中心。</s>

en: “We are working with like-minded partners, to make sure that the international order that governs cyber is fit for purpose,” he said.
luo: “Watiyo gi jogo ma wan go gi paro machal mar neno ni piny mangima orito weche matek ne jo njore.” Migosi Dominic Raab ne owacho kamano.
mt0: <pad> “我们与同情伙伴合作,确保国际秩序对网络的监管是合适的。”他说道。</s>

en: “We want to see international law respected in cyberspace, just as we would anywhere else. And we need to show how the rules apply to these changes in technology, the changes in threats, and the systemic attempts to render the internet a lawless space.”
luo: “Wadwaro neno ni chik ma rito weche njore e piny ma ngima omi luor mana kaka de watimo kamoro amora machielo. Kendo owinjore wanyis kaka chike gi tiyo e yor gik ma itiyo go sani; lokruok kuom buok ma jo njore chiwo kod yoregi ma gitemo mondo omi wach tiyo gi yor mbuyi obed kama onge chik ma tayo.”
mt0: <pad> “我们想要看到国际法在网络上受到尊重,就像其他地方一样。 我们需要展示如何这些技术变化、威胁变化和系统性尝试使互联网变成一个无法律的空间。”</s>

en: The Kenya Bankers Association (KBA), a lobby group for local banks has noted a significant shift in bank customer preferences for digital services which, according to the association’s Customer Satisfaction Survey of 2020, stood at 43 per cent.

mt0: <pad> Kenya Bankers Association (KBA), a lobby group for local banks, has noted a significant shift in bank customer preferences for digital services which, according to the association’s Customer Satisfaction Survey of 2020, stood at 43 per cent.</s>

en: "While the banking industry's digital resilience has continued to promote continuity in the financial services sector, rising cases of fraud need to be addressed further through consumer education", says Habil Olaka, Chief Executive Officer, KBA.

mt0: <pad> "While the banking industry's digital resilience has continued to promote continuity in the financial services sector, rising cases of fraud need to be addressed further through consumer education", says Habil Olaka, Chief Executive Officer, KBA.</s>

en: The government will have the authority to restrict Kenyans’ access to certain websites if the new law that could stoke up opposition from anti-censorship advocates sails through.
luo: Piny owacho biro bedo gi teko mar tamo jo Kenya mondo kik dhi kuonde mnitie e gedo mar yor mbuyi – Internet – ka oponi chik ma nyalo kelo ywaruok e kind sirikal kod joma makwedo weche ma kamago opuodhi mondo oti e Kenya.
mt0: <pad> 政府有权限制肯尼亚人访问某些网站,如果新法律通过了。</s>

en: According to proposals in the Computer Misuse and Cybercrimes (Amendment) Bill, 2021, the government can classify certain websites as inaccessible from Kenya and recommend their access be blocked.
luo: Kaluwore gi weche ma ondike e chik mar tiyo marach gi gir ndiko kod somo ma iluongo ni computer kod timo kosa gi tiyo gi yoo mbuyi ma iloso 2021, Piny Owacho nyalo keto moko kuom udi ma oger e yoo mbuyi mondo kik jo Kenya ng’i kendo sirikal nyalo wacho ni mondo kuonde ma kamago olor.
mt0: <pad> According to proposals in the Computer Misuse and Cybercrimes (Amendment) Bill, 2021, the government can classify certain websites as inaccessible from Kenya and recommend their access be blocked.</s>

en: The Bill which was submitted to the National Assembly last week further proposes a Sh20 million fine or 25-year prison sentence for the possession or distribution of pornographic material.
luo: Chik ni, ma nyocha oor e od bura ma duong ma Kenya – parliament e juma ma okalo, dwaro ni ngat ma oyudi ka nigo kendo keyo weche mag hera mondo ochul pesa mar keth ma kamano maromo tara gana 20,000,000 kata yudo kuom mar twech e jela mar higni 25.
mt0: <pad> The Bill which was submitted to the National Assembly last week also proposes a fine of Sh20 million or 25 years in jail for possession or distribution of pornographic material.</s>

en: “The principal object of this Bill is to amend the Computer Misuse and Cybercrimes Act, No. 5 of 2018 to provide for the prohibition against the sharing of pornography through the Internet,” notes the amendments in the Bill proposed by Garissa MP Adan Duale.
luo: “Gima duong ma chik ma nyien ni dwaro timo en ni mondo oloki chik ma chon mar tiyo kod computer marach kod ketho chik sama ngato tiyo gi yoo mbuyi ma en chik namba 5 mane okale e higa 2018 mondo mi omed rido matek ne joma keyo picha mag jogo man duge ka okalo e yoo mbuyi – internet – mondo ji one.” Mano e gima loko chik no wacho e kwayo mar ja chung’ ma od bura ma Garissa Moluor Adan Duale.
mt0: <pad> 你唔知</s>

en: “The Bill also seeks to provide an additional function of the National Computer and Cybercrimes Coordination Committee which is to recommend websites that may be rendered inaccessible within the country.”

mt0: <pad> “The Bill also seeks to provide an additional function of the National Computer and Cybercrimes Coordination Committee which is to recommend websites that may be rendered inaccessible within the country.</s>

en: The amendments come months after the Court of Appeal struck out a petition to suspend 26 controversial sections in the law enacted in 2018.
luo: Loko chik no timore kuom dweche bang’ ka od bura ne owito oko dwaro ni 26 kuom chik machon no mane ochako tiyo 2018 ma jomoko ne neno ni rach ka itiyo go e piny Kenya.
mt0: <pad> 修改来月后,最高法院驳回了一份申请,要求禁止26个争议性条文的法律。</s>

en: The Bloggers Association of Kenya, Law Society of Kenya, Article 19 and Kenya Union of Journalists sought a stay of execution until an appeal against the law heard.

mt0: <pad> Bloggers Association of Kenya, Law Society of Kenya, Article 19 and Kenya Union of Journalists asked for a stay of execution until an appeal against the law was heard.</s>

en: In an affidavit to support their case, the Law Society of Kenya Chief Executive Mercy Wambua cites cases where specific individuals had been arrested under the law accused of disseminating false information in respect to Covid-19 related deaths.

en: “The arrest, arraignment and prosecution for Covid-19 related publications under the statute is likely to have a chilling effect," stated Ms Wambua in her affidavit.
luo: Meko, tero ngato e od bura kendo keto ne bura kuom ndiko weche mag Corona e bwo chik mane okal higa 2018 no, biro miyo ji luoro.” Nyadendi Wambua ne owacho e burua mar kuongruok mane okete lwete no.
mt0: <pad> “The arrest, arraignment and prosecution for Covid-19 related publications under the statute is likely to have a chilling effect,” Ms Wambua said in her affidavit.</s>

en: “Bloggers, activists, journalists and whistleblowers will be discouraged from publishing information on a suspected violation of the Ministry of Health Covid-19 guidelines - with grave public health consequences.”
luo: “Joma ndiko e mbuyi, joma ochung’ ne ratiro mar dhano, jo fwap weche kod keyo kachiel gi jogo ma di dwar ulo weche matimore maricho ei piny ok bi bedo kod chir mar ndiko weche ma gingeyo kuom ketho chike mag rito ngima ma Migawo Mar Ngima – Ministry of Health - ne ogolo ma nyalo kelo chandruok maduong e piny.”
mt0: <pad> Bloggers, activists, journalists and whistleblowers will be discouraged from publishing information on a suspected violation of the Ministry of Health Covid-19 guidelines - with grave public health consequences.</s>

en: However, the government has defended the law noting that criminalisation of the acts described is an exercise of the State’s duty to care to its citizenry.
