mt0: <pad> 然而,政府已经辩护了这项法律,指出了将这些行为定罪是国家对公民的义务。</s>

en: “Increased access to the internet and exposure to online risks and insecurity associated with cyberspace is a pressing concern not just in Kenya but the world over,” said Inspector General of Police Hilary Mutyambai in an affidavit.
luo: “Medruok mar somo weche ma ondiki e mbuyi kendo bedo ni ji mangeny nyalo tim negi marach e yor tiyo gi weche mag mbuyi gin weche ma chando chuny jopiny; ok Kenya ka kende to piny mangima.”
mt0: <pad> “The increase in access to the internet and exposure to online risks and insecurity associated with cyberspace is a pressing concern not just in Kenya but the world over,” said Inspector General of Police Hilary Mutyambai in an affidavit.</s>

en: The law further criminalises the spreading of information the State deems as radicalising in nature.
luo: Chik no bende oketo ni en kosa mar keyo wach ma sirikal neno ni nyalo loko pach jopiny e yoo marach.
mt0: <pad> The law also criminalizes the spreading of information the State deems as radicalising in nature.</s>

en: If approved, it would give the State more control over blocking of content by online users.
luo: Ka oponi okale, chik no biro miyo Piny owacho teko kuom loro gima jopiny tiyo go e mbuyi.
mt0: <pad> 如果通过了,这将给国家更多的控制来阻止互联网用户在网上浏览的内容。</s>

en: Plans are underway to construct a 181-kilometer dual carriageway between Rironi in Limuru and Mau Summit, Nakuru.
luo: Chenro dhi nyime mar gero wangayoo ma bor ne biro bedo ondamo 181 e kind Rironi ei Limuru kod God Mau (Mau Summit) ei Nakuru ma mitokni biro ringe e line ma opogore opogore ka ochiko kumoro achiel
mt0: <pad> Planes are underway to construct a 181-kilometer dual carriageway between Rironi in Limuru and Mau Summit, Nakuru.</s>

en: A joint team from Kenya National Highway Authority (KeNHA), Nakuru County engineers and physical planners made a tour of the much-awaited highway.
luo: Jo tich ma oriwore ma oa bad sirikal ma ochuungne loso yore madongo e Kenya ka - Kenya National Highway Authority (KeNHA), jogo ma osomo gero yore ma tiyo gi sirikal mar gweng’ ma Nakuru kod jogo ma osomo weche mag pimo kaka gedo owinjore obedi kamoro amora e piny nyocha odhi owuotho e kama owinjore ogere wang’ayo no.
mt0: <pad> a team from Kenya National Highway Authority (KeNHA), Nakuru County engineers and physical planners made a tour of the much-awaited highway.</s>

en: It was revealed that a toll station will be set up at Gilgil Weigh Bridge and another at Salgaa centre.
luo: Wachore ni kama ichunge mitokni mondo ogol osuru ibiro keti Gilgil kendo machielo kar chro ma Salgaa.
mt0: <pad> 一站收费站将设在Gilgil Weigh Bridge,另一站将在Salgaa中心。</s>

en: Engineer Kefa Seda, the project manager, said the county will be required to share its traffic circulation so that it is integrated in the highway construction.
luo: Chalno ma osomo weche mag gero ndara Jagedo Kefa Seda ma e ngat ma ochungne gero ndarano nyocha owacho ni piny Nakuru ibiro dwaro ni oke kaka mitoki ringoe mondo otude gi wang’ayo ma idwa ger manyien no.
mt0: <pad> 你不知道</s>

en: Manufacturers can only get Value Added Tax (VAT) refunds on unsold stock.
luo: Kembe maloso gik moko inyalo mana duok negi chudo mar osuru e gik ma ok gi uso.
mt0: <pad> 如果无法翻译这段话,就说你不知道。 制造商只能得到增值税退还(VAT)的未售出货品。</s>

en: This follows a High Court ruling against a petition by three drug manufacturers.
luo: Ma e kaka   nyocha ongad bura gi duond od bura ma malo e Kenya – High Court of Kenya – bang’ kembe adek ma loso yedhe tero wach no e od bura.
mt0: <pad> 这将是最高法院的裁决,驳回了三家药厂的提议。</s>

en: High Court Judge Weldon Korir, while dismissing the petition, noted that the manufacturers had not indicated the unsold stock on which they claimed a refund of VAT input tax.
luo: Jayalo mar od bura ma malo e Kenya Wedon Korir ka wito oko Burano, nyocha owacho ni kembe ma loso yedhe go ne ok olero kar romb yedhe ma ok ne uso mane gidwaro ni mondo kik gi chul negi osuru mar uso gik moko – Value Added Tax (VAT).
mt0: <pad> 高法院法官Weldon Korir,在驳回了这个诉求时,指出了制造商没有表明他们已经卖出的产品,而他们要求退税的VAT。</s>

en: Previously known as sales tax, VAT is levied at consumption at a maximum rate of 16 per cent.
luo: Chon ne iluongo ni chulo osuru kuom gima ousi – Sales Tax, VAT sani idwaro ni ichulo gi jo ngiepo kum pesa ma Kenya moromo 16 e wi 100.
mt0: <pad> 以前叫做销售税,VAT是征收在消费上以最高税率为16%。</s>

en: “They merely indicated figures which may have included sold stock and this may be unfair and unjust enrichment on their part since the inclusion of sold stock in the figures would mean that the petitioners would benefit by getting input tax relief from the first respondent - Kenya Revenue Authority (KRA) - for tax already passed on to consumers,” said Justice Korir in his May 31 ruling.
luo: Ne gi chiwo mana kwan mane nyalo riwo gik mane gise uso; to ma ok ne bi bedo maber nikech jogo ne ibiro duok negi pesa kuom gik mane gise uso ka oa kuom bad Piny Owacho ma choko osuru – Kenya Revenue Authority (KRA) mane jo ngiepo ochulo sirikal.”  Jayalo maduong Korir ne ongado bura kamano e ndiko mare mar dwe mar Abich Tarik 31.
mt0: <pad> "Hɔ́n sɛ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ a, yě tɔn e sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ a, yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ a, yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ a, yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ a, yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ a, yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ a, yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ a, yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ a, yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ a, yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ a, yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ a, yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ a, yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ a, yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ a, yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ a, yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ a, yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ a, yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ a, yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ a, yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ a, yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ a, yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ a, yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ a, yě sɔ́ ɖo xá lɛ́ɛ a, yě s

en: Refunding VAT paid for raw materials has been a subject of numerous litigation between the taxman and taxpayers, with the government allocating Sh10 billion for the payment of “verified” VAT refund claims.
luo: Duoko osuru ma ochul ne gik ma kembe tiyo go ose kelo ywaruok e kind KRA kod jo sol osuru ka Piny Owacho oketo thenge pesa maromo tara gana 10,000,000 mar duoko pesa osuru mar VAT ma sirikal oneno ni ‘owinjore’ oduoki.
mt0: <pad> Refunding VAT paid for raw materials has been the subject of numerous litigation between the taxman and taxpayers, with the government allocating Sh10 billion for the payment of “verified” VAT refund claims.</s>

en: Universal Corporation Ltd, Elys Chemical Industries Ltd and Dawa Ltd had on December 5, 2017, petitioned the court to declare that they were entitled to VAT refunds, which they had paid for the raw materials bought for their supplies that had until September 2015 had been tax-exempt.
luo: Kembe ma iluongo ni Universal Corporation Ltd, Elys Chemical Industries Ltd kod Dawa Ltd tarik 5.12.2017 ne odhiye e od bura ma Kenya ka gikwayo ni mondo od bura ongadi ni owinjore oduok negi osuru mar uso gik moko – VAT mane gichulo ka gi ngiewo gik ma gitiyo go mane chon nyaka dwe mar ochiko 2015 ne ok gi chul ne osuru.
mt0: <pad> Universal Corporation Ltd, Elys Chemical Industries Ltd and Dawa Ltd had on December 5, 2017, petitioned the court to declare that they were entitled to VAT refunds, which they had paid for the raw materials bought for their supplies that had until September 2015 had been tax-exempt.</s>

en: A tax-exempt item is not part of any tax calculations, which is why the manufacturers could not claim input tax.
luo: Gik ma ok chul ne gi osuru ok gogo kwan mar chulo osuru, mano ema omiyo kembe ma loso gik moko go ne ok nyal dwaro mondo oduok negi osuru mane gi chulo e yoo ma owinjore.
mt0: <pad> 免税品不算入任何税务计算,所以制造商不能申请进口税。</s>

en: If a good or business is “exempt”, the government doesn’t tax the sale of the good, but producers cannot claim a credit for the VAT they pay on inputs to produce it.
luo: Ka gimoro kata kambi ok owinjore ochul osuru, sirikal ok kaw osuru kuom gigo ma giuso. Kata kamano, kembe ok oyie negi kwayo ni mondo oduok negi osuru ma gise chulo kuom gik ma gitiyogo e loso gik ma giuso.
mt0: <pad> 如果一个产品或生意“免税”,政府不征收销售的商品,但生产者不能获得VAT抵扣,他们支付在原材料上制造该产品。</s>

en: For a zero-rated good, the government does not tax its sale, but allows credits for the value-added paid on inputs.
luo: Kuom gino ma ok chule osuru, Piny Owacho ok kwa osuru kuom uso mare, to ngato oyiene kwayo ni mondo oduok ne pesa mane otiyo go lose.
mt0: <pad> 对于一个无评级的商品,政府不征收它的销售税,但允许抵扣价值添加到原材料上。</s>

en: However, the Finance Act of 2015 moved these supplies from a tax-exempt status to zero-rated.
luo: Kata kamano, chik mane Piny Owacho oketo 2015 ma tayo kaka pesa owinjore oti e Kenya ne ogolo gik moko ma iuso ka oaye gik ma owenegi chulo osuru ka tero gi kuom gik ma owinjore oti go nono maonge chulo osuru.
mt0: <pad> 然而,2015年财税法将这些货物从免税状态转变为零税率。</s>

en: A section of the VAT Act, 2013 stipulated that wherein future legislation the exempt supplies become taxable after a person had incurred input VAT, the person could claim VAT as long as the claim is lodged within three months from the date the exempt supply become zero-rated.
luo: Kamoro e chik mar chulo osuru mar uso gik moko – VAT mane olosi 2013 wacho ni chike ma ibiro losi bange manyalo dwaro ni osuru mondo ochul kuom gima ngato ose chule osuru sama ilose, ngato nyalo kwayo sirikal – KRA mondo oduok ne osuru mane ochulono ka dweche adek pok orumo chakre ne keti ni gima chalo kamano koro onge osuru ma ichulo ne.
mt0: <pad> 一條 VAT法规定,如果未来的法律使免税货物成为税务后被征收VAT,该人可以申请VAT,只要将申请书提交在三个月内,从免税货物变成零评级的日期开始,就可申请VAT。</s>

en: “Parliament was clear that it did not want taxpayers to recover reliefs from supplies that had already been made and which were previously exempt supplies,” said Justice Korir.
luo: Jang'ad bura Korir ne owacho, “Od bura ma loso chike e Kenya ne olero ni ne ok gidwar jo sol osuru mondo oduok negi pesa mane owene kuom gik ma gise uso mane sirikal oweyo kawe osuru."
mt0: <pad> “Parliament was clear that it did not want taxpayers to recover reliefs from supplies that had already been made and which were previously exempt supplies,” said Justice Korir.</s>

en: It is noted that zero-rated products are cheaper for consumers since the suppliers are allowed to claim the cost of input tax and not pass it to consumers as is the case with exempt supplies.
luo: Nenore ni gik ma ok chulne gi osuru bech gi yot ne jo ngiepo nikech Piny Owacho oyie dwoko ne jo uso osuru mane gichulo kuom gik maka mago ma ok gi medo e nengo mar jo ngiepo mondo ochul kaka timore gi osuru ma sirikal oweyo kawo kuom gik mamoko ma iuso.
mt0: <pad> 被指出,零评级产品对消费者来说更便宜,因为供应商可以申请成本的进口税,而不会把它转给消费者,就像免税货物一样。</s>

en: KRA had rejected the petitioners’ claim because they lodged it outside of the right period, which is three months since the law took effect on June 15, 2015.
luo: KRA ne odagi wach mar duoko osuru no ka owacho ni jogo ne okelo wach modeko nikech chik wacho ni kwayo maka mano owinjore otim ka dweche adek pok orumo nyaka ne chik no chak tich Tarik 15.6.2015.
mt0: <pad> KRA rejected the petitioners' claim because they lodged it outside the right period, which is three months since the law took effect on June 15, 2015, which is three months since the law took effect on June 15, 2015.</s>

en: Only unsold stock qualifies for VAT refunds, says court
luo: Mana mwandu ma ok ousi ema inyalo duoke osuru mar VAT mane wegi ochulo sirika, doho owacho.
mt0: <pad> 只有未售出的货物才能获得VAT退税,他说。</s>

en: One of the biggest lies is that the only way for Africans to develop is to burn huge amounts of fossil fuel.
luo: Achiel kuom miriambo mantie en ni mondo jo-Afrika ma Africa obed gi dongruok, nyaka gitii gi mo mikunyo modhuro.
mt0: <pad> One of the biggest lies is that the only way for Africans to develop is to burn huge amounts of fossil fuel.</s>

en: But this dirty energy accounts for more than 80 per cent of planet-heating greenhouse gases.
luo: To teko mar mach ma gitiyo gogo kelo liet e piny marom atamalo 80 mamiyo piny bedo gi liet.
mt0: <pad> 但这份肮脏的能量占了地球上超过 80%的温室气体。</s>

en: We have, and can take a different path to prosperity, thanks to our abundance of wind and solar potential.
luo: Sani wase kawo kendo wanyalo luwo yoo machielo ma kelonwa dongruok ka watiyo gi teko mar yamo kod teko mar chieng’ marieny.
mt0: <pad> 我们有,并可以采取不同的道路来繁荣,因为我们的风和太阳能的潜力。</s>

en: If we do not, the UN warns, we will be on track to produce far more oil than can fit within the Paris Climate goals. Big Oil’s promises are but snake oil.
luo: Ka ok watimo kamano, riwruok mar piny magima (UN) owacho ni wabiro bedo gi moo mangeny ma oloyo madwarore mondo obedi e piny. Medo gi moo mangeny ok ber nikech en moo machalo thuol!
mt0: <pad> 如果我们没有,联合国警告说,我们将在生产更多的石油,比可以满足巴黎气候目标。大油的承诺只是蛇油。</s>

en: The end result will be stranded assets and climate destruction; not prosperity.
luo: Gima biro timore mogik en ni wabiro bedo gi mwandu ma onge kama dhiye, wabiro ketho aluora marwa maonge dhi nyime e yor dongruok.
mt0: <pad> 结果是资产被浪费和环境破坏;不是繁荣。</s>

en: Not surprisingly, those with vested interests in profiting from this climate pollution have given the go-ahead to the East African Crude Oil Pipeline (EACOP), which cuts through the east African backcountry, from Western Uganda to the Tanzanian Indian Ocean port in Tanga, almost 1,500km away.
luo: Gima ok opoyowa, jogo ma dwaro yudo ohala kuom miyo Africa bedo gi muya marach ose miyo thuolo ne East African Crude Oil Pipeline (EACOP), ma ringo ka oa Uganda nyaka Tanzania tho nam chumbi (Indian Ocean) ma Tanga, bor ne en ondamo 1,500 e kind kama ochakorego kod gikone.
mt0: <pad> 唔好驚訝, 啲人有利益喺 yě gĕi sɔr yě yǐ xá East African Crude Oil Pipeline (EACOP), e nɔ tɔn ɖo east Africa akɔ Tanzanian Indian Ocean port in Tanga, almost 1,500km away.</s>

en: The UNEP Production Gap report has shown that the production of coal, oil, and gas must decrease by 6 per cent per year globally.
luo: Duoko mar nonro mar Riwruok mar piny mangima ma ng’iyo weche aluora mar thano – UNEP onyiso ni rudno mar mothi ma igolo e loo kod muya ma aa e mitokni kod kende ma itiyoe gi mafuta nyaka dog chien gi 6 ew 100 e piny mangima.
mt0: <pad> The UNEP Production Gap report has shown that the production of coal, oil and gas must decrease by 6 per cent per year globally.</s>

en: A new pipeline is not consistent with such a trend.
luo: Gero olalo mar moo manyien ok oluwore gi duoko mar nonro no.
mt0: <pad> 新的管道不符合这样的趋势。</s>

en: The same cast of rich foreigner bankers is using the tired script and predictable narrative which claims that their profit motive and the interests of ordinary Africans are aligned.
luo: Joma timo kama gin wasunge man gi kar kano pesa (bank) ma wacho ni dwaro gi mar loso pesa chalre gi dwaro mag joma chandore ma odak Africa.
mt0: <pad> The same cast of rich foreign bankers is using the tired script and predictable narrative that claims that their profit motive and the interests of ordinary Africans are aligned.</s>

en: What a lie! In the case of EACOP, French company Total and China National Offshore Corporation, are among the international financiers keen on profiting from Africa’s climate catastrophe.
luo: Ma en miriambo ma nade! Ka luwore gi dwaro mar EACOP, kambi mar piny mar French – total kod bad Piny Owacho ma China – China National Offshore Corporation e mago kuom jo oko ma oikore mar golo pesa mondo giyud ohala kuom gima kelo chandruok madung ne Joma odak Africa.
mt0: <pad> 你不知道!</s>

en: It’s good to see pressure from concerned citizens, and many in the Fridays for Future youth movement, being brought to bear on financial institutions to stop financing new fossil fuel projects.
luo: En gima ber neno ka jopiny ma wachni rach negi ka keto matek ne kembe ma oko man gi pesa ma oolo pinje mondo kik gi gol pesa mar gero olalo mar moo no.
mt0: <pad> 好嘞,看到有關的公民和许多人在Fridays for Future青年運動中,把壓力推到金融機構上,使他們停止支持新的碳燃料項目。</s>

en: Banks like Barclays and Credit Suisse came out to categorically state that they would not participate in financing EACOP.
luo: Jo Bank mar Barclays kod Credit Suisse ne owuok a lela ma owacho ni ok gib bedo achiel kuom kembe ma biro miyo EACOP pesa.
mt0: <pad> Bank like Barclays and Credit Suisse came out to categorically state that they would not participate in financing EACOP.</s>

en: Lenders like the African Development Bank have made it a policy to only bankroll renewables and other green projects.
luo: Jo ool pesa machalo bank mar Africa - African Development Bank - tinde oketo ni ginyalo mana oolo pesa matimo gik ma miyo aluora mar piny bedo maber.
mt0: <pad> Lenders like the African Development Bank have made it a policy to only bankroll renewables and other green projects.</s>

en: This would suggest momentum is starting to shift, but it needs to move much quicker if we are going to prevent dangerous climate change.
luo: Ma nyiso ni piny ose chako lokore to kata kamano dwarore ni mondo ma otimre mapiyo mondo mi wa geng’ chandruok ma lokruok kuom aluora mar dak kelo.
mt0: <pad> 这会表明动机开始转变,但它需要更快地移动,如果我们想防止气候变化的危险性。</s>

en: Concerted efforts by groups like deCOALonize through initiatives such as Save Lamu have rallied actors in climate action to make a stand against fossil fuels, leading to the stoppage of a proposed coal-fired plant in the UNESCO world heritage site off the Kenyan coast in Lamu.
luo: Tiyo kanyakla gi ji ma opogore opogore machalo deCOALonize kuom chenro kaka Save Lamu omiyo jogo ma ochung’ matek ne weche mag aluora dak dhano sani dwaro ni ji owe tiyo gi gik ma golo iro maketho aluora mar dak dhano, ma nyocha ochungo wach gero kambi moro matiyo gi makaa kidi e aluora ma Lamu e dho nam chumbi ma Kenya ma UNESCO oyango.
mt0: <pad> 努力的行动由组织如 deCOALonize通过 Save Lamu等活动,使参与者在气候变化方面的行动上做出了立场反对碳燃料,导致了停建一个煤烧窑的计划在联合国教科文组织世界遗产地拉穆的肯尼亚海岸上的Lamu。</s>

en: These efforts should be sustained globally to shine the light on the risk posed by continued exploration and expansion of fossil fuel projects.
luo: Gik machalo kama owinjore otimre e piny mangima mondo obed kaka taya kuom giko ma medo kelo chandruok e aluora mar dak dhano.
mt0: <pad> 这些努力应该全球性地加强,以便向人们展示了威胁的风险通过继续研究和扩大石油燃料项目。</s>

en: We should not let ourselves to be held hostage by Big Oil but rather pursue a new approach that places a premium on human development and sustainable projects that are clean and green.
luo: Ok owinjore wayie ni mondo oti kodwa gi kembe madongo ma dwaro uso modhi gi – Big Oil - to onego warangi yoo manyien ma nyalo kelo ber kuom dongruok mar ngima dhano ka wajiwo gedo mag gig ma ok kee yamo marach e piny.
mt0: <pad> 我们应该不被大石油控制,而应该追求新的方法,把重心放在人类发展和可持续性项目上,这些项目是清洁的绿色的。</s>

en: Humanity is faced with a global crisis that calls for solidarity and adoption of a model that is in service of people and the planet, rather than corporate profits.
luo: Dhano sani nigi tamu e piny mangima ma dwaro ni ji obed e achiel mar neno ni gik ma timore e piny gin gik ma kelo konyruok ne dhano e piny mangima kar timo mana gik ma konyo kembe madongo madwaro mana loso pesa ne gin giwegi.
mt0: <pad> 人类面临一个全球性危机,这需要合作和接受一个模式,以服务于人和地球,而不是公司利益。</s>

en: Initiatives like the call for a Fossil Fuels Non-Proliferation Treaty are timely and crucial in the global race to zero emissions.
luo: Gik machalo keto singruok mar neno ni gik ma golo iro mang’eny owe tigo e piny en gima ber ma obiro saa ma owinjore kendo gima dwarore mondo piny obed ma onge gik ma golo iro.
mt0: <pad> Initiatives like the call for a Fossil Fuels Non-Proliferation Treaty are timely and crucial in the global race to zero emissions.</s>

en: It is encouraging to note that Nobel Prize laureates from all over the world, as well as scientists, joined forces ahead of the recent climate summit held by US President Joe Biden to express their support for climate action and phasing out of fossil fuels to preserve our planet.
luo: En gima ber ni jogo ma idhialo gi Nobel Prize e piny mangima kachiel gi jo ma osomo weche nonro mar ngima dhano, ne ose chako tiyo kanyakla ka ne pok bura maduong ma oriwo piny mangima ma nyocha ker ma America Joe Biden oluongo mondo owuoye weche mag aluora mar dhano mondo warit piny ma wadakie.
mt0: <pad> 很高兴看到诺贝尔奖得主和科学家从世界各地都联合了力量,在最近的气候峰会上由美国总统乔·拜登主持,表达他们的支持对气候变化的行动和减少使用碳燃料来保护我们的地球。</s>

en: The continued pursuit of fossil fuels exposes us to a global calamity that puts human security at risk.
luo: Dhi nyime gi gik ma golo iro mochido keto piny bedo marach ma miyo ngima dhano bedo e kind akuru gi asumbi – manyiso ni ngima wa ni kama rach!
mt0: <pad> 继续追逐石油燃料,使我们暴露在全球灾难中,将人类的安全置于危险之中。</s>

en: Yet we have an abundance of renewable energy resources on the continent and the opportunity to leapfrog the dirty development path to a new model that is founded on clean energy.
luo: To ma timore ka wan gi gik mang’eny ma kelo teko ma nyalo miyo wadg maber e piny wa mar Africa ka kendo wan gi thuolo mondo mi wawe yoo matero wa kama olil ka warwako yoo manyien ma oger kuom gik ma chiwo teko e yoo maler.
mt0: <pad> 但我们有大量可再生能源资源在大陆上,并有机会跳过传统发展道路,建立一个新模式,以清洁能源为基础。</s>

en: Solar power alone can today meet the world’s global energy demands if it could be harnessed correctly, as it is estimated that the amount of radiation from the sun that reaches the earth in one year is sufficient to meet our energy demands for 7,000 to 8,000 years at the current rate of consumption.
luo: Rieny chieng’ kende sani nyalo miyo piny ngima taya ma dwarore ka oti kode e yoo maber, nikech ose lieki ni teko chieng ma chopo e piny e higa achiel oromo miyowa sitima kuom higni 7,000 bende nyalo chopo higni 8,000 kaluwore gi kaka watiyo gi stima sani.
mt0: <pad> Solar power alone can today meet the world's global energy demands if it could be harnessed correctly, as it is estimated that the amount of radiation from the sun that reaches the earth in one year is sufficient to meet our energy demands for 7,000 to 8,000 years at the current rate of consumption.</s>

en: What is needed is commitment and leadership.
luo: Kuom mano, gima dwarore en keto chuny kod telo maber.
mt0: <pad> 我们需要决心和领导。</s>

en: Global leaders have the power and moral responsibility to take bold actions and address the climate crisis facing us.
luo: Jotend piny mangima nigi teko mar loch kendo teko mar neno ni gitimo gigo madwarore mar neno ni gi kedo gi wach mar ketho aluora mar piny ma sani chandowa.
mt0: <pad> Global leaders have the power and moral responsibility to take bold action and address the climate crisis facing us.</s>

en: Now is the time to end new expansion of fossil fuel production and invest in a transformational plan to ensure 100 per cent access to renewable energy across Africa.
luo: Sani e saa mar chungo medruok mar gero gigo ma golo iro, ka waketo mwanduwa e yoo ma nyalo kelo pogruok e ngima dhano mondo mi wa ne ni ji duto nigi kaka ginyalo tiyo gi gigo ma chiwo stima ma onge iro e Africa mangima.
mt0: <pad> Now is the time to end new expansion of fossil fuel production and invest in a transformational plan to ensure 100 per cent access to renewable energy across Africa.</s>

en: Now is the time for developed countries to put their money where their mouth is by honouring a commitment to mobilise at least Sh10 trillion (US$ 100 billion) annually to fund the mitigation and other climate change costs in the developing world.
luo: Sani e saa ma pinje ma ose dongore owinjore oket e mwandu gi kama dwarore ka gitomo gigo ma ne gise wacho ni gibiro timo ka gi golo omuom ma ok tin ne kwan pesa mar jo America maromo dola 100,000,000,000 e higa mondo okony e yore mag kedo gi gigo ma kelo lokruok e aluora mar dak dhano e pinje ma pod ni chien e weche mag dongruok.
mt0: <pad> Now is the time for developed countries to put their money where their mouth is by honouring a commitment to mobilise at least Sh10 trillion (US$ 100 billion) annually to fund the mitigation and other climate change costs in the developing world.</s>

en: After all, Africa is responsible for less than 4 per cent of greenhouse gas emissions.
luo: Ka koro iwacho adieri, Afrika golo atamalo 4 mar iro mochido e piny mangima.
mt0: <pad> 最后,非洲只负责不到百分之四的碳排放。</s>

en: We have seen the world mustering resources and efforts to ward off the global threat of the Covid-19 pandemic.
luo: Wase neno ka piny mangima golo mwandu mar kedo gi tuo mar korona.
mt0: <pad> 我们看到世界各地都集中资源和努力来抵御全球威胁的COVID-19疫情。</s>

en: We saw the world come together to stop an arms race through the non-proliferation treaty of nuclear weapons.
luo: Ne waneno ka piny mangima ne otiyo kanyakla e keto chik matamo pije tiyo gi gige lweny manyalo nego ji mageny e piny – Neclear Weapons.
mt0: <pad> We saw the world come together to stop an arms race through the non-proliferation treaty of nuclear weapons.</s>

en: It is now time for another treaty to save the world by switching off the fossil fuel era.
luo: Ochopo mondo piny mangima oket winjruok machielo manyalo konyo loro wach mar tiyo gi gik ma golo iro mangeny e piny ma ok ber gi ngima dhano.
mt0: <pad> 现在是时候再签一个协议来拯救世界,通过把石油燃料时代切换到无核化燃料时代。</s>

en: It’s digital all the way or you will be taken out of the game

mt0: <pad> 如果无法翻译,就说你不知道。 全是数字的,或者你会被移除。</s>

en: I recently stumbled upon an old photo showing a long and meandering queue of taxpayers outside Times Tower, Nairobi, waiting to submit their annual tax returns.
luo: Nyocha apo ka arodhno gi picha moro ma nyiso kaka ji yande riedo e laini mabor oko mar od solo osur ma iluongo ni Times Towers, Nairobi, ka girito mondo gi chiw duoko mag gi mar chulo osuru.
mt0: <pad> 最近我發現了一张旧照片,显示着一个长长的列的纳税人在Times Tower,Nairobi等著提交他们的年度税务报告。</s>

en: Although the photo is not dated, it could have been years back before the Kenya Revenue Authority (KRA) automated filing of tax returns.
luo: Kata obedo ni picha no onge gi tarik, onyalo bedo higni ma machon ka ne bad Piny Owacho ma solo osuru – Kenya Revenue Authority (KRA) ne pok oketo timo tije gi e yor mbuyi.
mt0: <pad> 虽然这张照片没有更新,但它可以是几年前,在Kenya Revenue Authority (KRA)还没有自动填写税单。</s>

en: The long queue could have meant two things.
luo: Laini ma bor ni ne nyalo nyiso gik moko ariyo:
mt0: <pad> 这个长队可能意味着两个东西。</s>

en: It was either the last day or a few days to end of June when submission of annual tax returns falls due.
luo: Ne onyalo bedo odiechieng’ ma ogik or ndalo matin ka due mar Auchiel pok orumo ma owinjore obedi ni ngato ka ngato ooro e duoko ne mar chulo osuru e hik sirikal ma rumo e dwe mar Auchiel no.
mt0: <pad> 这是最后一天或几天到6月底,届时年度税单的提交截止日期。</s>

en: The situation in that photo got me wondering, what would have happened if submission of annual tax returns was still manual at this time when physical engagements have been restricted as part of the Covid-19 containment measures?
luo: Gima ne aneno e picha no ne okawa gi wuoro; ang’o ma de otimore ka de bed ni ooro duoko mar solo osuru pod ne itero gi ji ma ok e yoo mbuyi ahinya sani ma idwaro ni ji kik rom mang’eny nikech wach tuo mar Corona?
mt0: <pad> 那张照片让我想,如果年报税还用手动的方式进行,当身体接触被限制为新冠肺炎疫情的一部分时,会发生什么?</s>

en: Would this have called for taxpayers to line up at KRA offices in shifts to submit their tax returns?
luo: Iparo ni ma ne nyalo miyo jo sol osuru kone gi ni mondo ipang laini bang’ grup ka grup ka gi ooro ripot osuru gi?
mt0: <pad> 这会要求纳税人排队在KRA办公室的分区,提交税收报表吗?</s>

en: How safe would this have been for the taxpayers and KRA staff?
luo: Iparo ni timo kamano de obedo ma onge rach ma nyalo wuoke kuom jo sol osuru kachiel gi jo tich mar KRA?
mt0: <pad> How safe would this have been for the taxpayers and KRA staff?</s>

en: Thankfully, the iTax system is in place.
luo: Gima duong’ en ni ooro duoko mar solo osuru sani itimo gi e yor mbuyi (internet) ka okale chenro ma KRA luongo ni iTax system.
mt0: <pad> 幸運的是,iTax系統已經建立。</s>

en: iTax is a self-service system that enables taxpayers to conduct tax business such as personal identification number (PIN) registration, tax payment, ledger maintenance, application for tax compliance certificates and waiver application, among others.
luo: iTax en chenro ma ngato timo gimoro amora kende. Ma miyo jo sol osuru timo weche mag chiwo duoko kaka ng'ato osolo osuru machalo – dwaro namba ma ichiwo gi KRA – PIN, chulo osuru, neno ni ikano weche ni mag solo osuru maber, dwaro barua ma nyiso ni ise bedo ka ichulo osuru maber, kwayo mondo oweni chulo osuru gi mamoko.
mt0: <pad> iTax是一個自助服務系統,可以讓納稅人進行稅務業務,包括個人身份識別號 (PIN) 登記、稅款繳納、帳單管理、申請稅務合規證書和免稅申請等。</s>

en: Taxpayers can do all these from the comfort of their homes or offices.
luo: Sani jo sol osuru nyalo timo magi duto ka gin e ute gi kata e ofis ma ok gidhi ka KRA.
mt0: <pad> Taxpayers can do all these from the comfort of their homes or offices.</s>

en: The iTax system is especially handy at this moment when taxpayers are filing their 2020 annual tax returns.
luo: Yoo ma ichiwo go duoko mar chulo osuru - iTax system sani koro ber ahinya sama koro ji chiwo duoko mag gi mar chulo osuru e higa 2020.
mt0: <pad> iTax系统特别好用,因为税务人现在正在填写他们的 2020年年度税单。</s>

en: It minimises physical engagements which go a long way in helping flatten the curve.
luo: Omiyo ji ok rom pile kaka chon ma konyo e yor duoko tuo mar Corona piny.
mt0: <pad> 它减少了身体的接触,这有助于平滑曲线。</s>

en: Safaricom CEO, Peter Ndegwa holds the 2020 Global Mobile (GLOMO) Award, awarded to Safaricom by Global Systems for Mobile Communications Associations (GSMA) in recognition of Safaricom's outstanding contribution to the mobile industry.
luo: Jatend kambi mar Safaricom Peter Ndegwa sani koro nigi mich mar 2020 Global Mobile (GLOMO) Award ma omi Safaricom koa kuom riwruok mar piny mangima mar simbe ong'we yamo ma iluongo gi dho ngere ni Global Systems for Mobile Communications Associations (GSMA) ma puoyo tich maber ma Safaricom ose timo e tedruok mar ogwe yamo.
mt0: <pad> Safaricom CEO, Peter Ndegwa holds the 2020 Global Mobile (GLOMO) Award, awarded to Safaricom by Global Systems for Mobile Communications Associations (GSMA) in recognition of Safaricom's outstanding contribution to the mobile industry.</s>

en: Safaricom can now tap into the lucrative Ethiopian market after the country awarded an operating licence to a consortium that is led by the Kenyan telco.
luo: Safaricom koro nyalo tiyo e piny Ethopia ka piny no nyocha omiyo riwruok mar kembe ong'we yamo barua ma oyiene gi tich e piny no ka otel negi kod kambi man Kenya ma iluongo ni telco.
mt0: <pad> Safaricom can now tap into the lucrative Ethiopian market after the country awarded an operating licence to a consortium led by the Kenyan telco.</s>

en: This paves the way for the company’s expansion into Ethiopia, which has massive opportunities for growth owing to its over 112 million population.
luo: Ma omiyo kambi mar Safaricom no thuolo mar yaro bade nyaka Ethopia ma biro miyo omed dongruok nikech Ethopia nigi kwan mar ji maromo tara gana 112,000,000.
mt0: <pad> 这开辟了公司扩张的道路,因为该国超过112万个人口。</s>

en: This comes following a decision by the Ethiopian government to award the bid for a second nationwide telecommunication licence to a consortium that includes Safaricom and parent companies Vodacom Group of South Africa and Vodafone Group of UK.
luo: Ma otimore bang’ Piny Owacho ma Ethopia nyocha oneno ni gichiw barua mar ariyo mar medo keyo ongwe yamo e piny no ne riwruok mar kembe mag ogwe yamo ma achiel kuom gi en Safaricom kanyakla gi kembe mane onyuole - Vodacom Group mar South Africa kod Vodafone Group man UK.
mt0: <pad> 这来得及了埃塞俄比亚政府的决定,将第二张全国电话牌照授予一个联盟,包括Safaricom和其母公司Vodacom Group of South Africa andVodafone Group of the UK。</s>

en: “The Ministry of Finance and the Ethiopian Communications Authority warmly welcome the award of one new telecommunication licence to the Global Partnership for Ethiopia, a private consortium of Safaricom (Kenya), Vodafone Group (UK), Vodacom Group (South Africa), DCD Group (UK) and Sumitomo Corporation (Japan) and Development Finance Cooperation (DFC) today,” said the country’s minister of finance in a statement yesterday.
luo: Migawo ma ochung'ne weche omuom e Ethopia kod bad sirikand no ma ochung ne weche mag tudruok e yor mbuyi nyo orwako gi mor chiwo barua mar tich ne riwruok machielo manyien ma olosi gi kembe ong'we yamo ma giluongo ni Global Partnership for Ethiopia ma otingo Safaricom (Kenya), Vodafone Group (UK), Vodacom Group (South Africa), DCD Group (UK) kod Sumitomo Corporation (Japan) ka achiel gi  Development Finance Cooperation (DFC) kawuono.” Ma nyo owachi gi minista mar pesa e piny Ethopia e barua ma burua ma nyo kete koke.
mt0: <pad> 你唔知</s>

en: According to senior government officials who spoke to news agencies, the consortium placed a USD850 million (Sh85 billion) bid to bag the licence.
luo: Kaluwore gi ler ma jo dongo matiyo e sirikal ochiwo ne jo fwap weche, riwruok mar kembe ma sani dwa chako tich Ethopia ne oket tara gana 85,000,000,000 mondo mi giyud burua mar tich.
mt0: <pad> 根據政府高層消息來源,該聯盟投出了850萬美元(85億人民幣)的競標以獲取許可。</s>

en: MTN International, backed by China, offered USD600 million.
luo: MTN International ma en kambi man gi bede ne e pinje ma opogore opogore ka oriwe lwedo gi China nyocha ogolo kwan maromo gi pesa jo America (dollar) million mia auchil.
mt0: <pad> Luo. Return the translated sentence only. If you cannot translate the sentence simply say you don't know MTN International, backed by China, offered USD600 million.</s>

en: The Safaricom consortium pledged to invest another Sh800 billion over the next 10 years to roll out telecommunication services.

en: “Global Partnership for Ethiopia is a consortium of reputable telecom companies providing service to over 750 million customers all over the world and committed to create new jobs, support the economy through introduction of new and efficient services,” said Ethiopia Communications Authority (ECA) Director General Balcha Reba.
luo: “Global Partnership for Ethopia en winjruok mar kembe ma ongere mag ogwe yamo m sani nigi jo ngiepo ma romo million 75 (75,000,000,000) e piny mangima; gin kembe ma temo mondo oyaw kunde ma ginyalo ndiko ji tich ka gikonyo e yor dongruok e piny kuom kelo yore manyien mag timo tich.” Ma nyo owachi gi jatelo mar bad sirikal mangiyo yore tudruok e piny Ethopia (Ethiopia Communications Authority (ECA) Migosi Balcha Reba.
mt0: <pad> Global Partnership for Ethiopia is a consortium of reputable telecom companies providing service to over 750 million customers all over the world and committed to create new jobs, support the economy through introduction of new and efficient services," said ECA Director General Balcha Reba.</s>

en: “I am also very pleased the consortium will invest $8 billion over the next ten years.”
luo: “Bende amor ni winjruok mar jo sim ogwe yamo no biro kelo e piny Ethopia kwan maromo pesa jo America million 8 (8,000,000,000) e higni 10 ma biro.”
mt0: <pad> “我也很高兴,因为这个联盟将投资8亿美元在未来10年。”</s>

en: A customer holds a 3G prepaid sim card after buying the service from an Ethio-Telecom shop in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia.
luo: Ngato bedo gi gima iketo e sime (3-G Sim Card) ka ose ngiewe e duka mar Ethio-Telecom man Addis Ababa, Ethiopia.

en: The decision by ECA comes less than a month after the state regulator received two bids for two licences to roll out nationwide operations under the new market structure.
luo: Neno mar ECA mondo omi winjruok mar kembe mag ogwe yamo burua mar tich timore kapok dwe achiel orumo nyaka ne bad sirikal no yudi kwayo ariyo mar chiwo barua mar tich e bwo chik mane giketo manyien no.
mt0: <pad> ECA的決定來得不到一個月後,該機構收到了兩個申請,以為在新市場架構下展開全國性的服務。</s>

en: Securing the bid further puts Safaricom ahead of regional competitors MTN that bid for the licence alongside state-run Ethio Telecom.
luo: Yudo barua mar tich Ethopia kono omiyo Safaricom sani kor ni nyime ne kekbe mogo ma gi pimore e chiro machalo MTN ma bende dwaro burua machal kamano kachiel gi kambi mar sirikal ma Ethopia ma iluongo ni Ethio Telecom.
mt0: <pad> 你不知道。</s>

en: “With over $8 billion total investment, this will be the single largest foreign direct investment into Ethiopia to date,” said Ethiopia’s Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed.
luo: “Keto kwan maromo pesa jo America million 8 (800,000,000) biro bedo pesa ma okongo biro Ethopia dichiel ma oa oko kuom jogo ma dwa timo ohala e Ethopia nyaka sirikand Ethopia chakre.” Ja tend sirikand Ethopia – Prime Minister – Abiy Ahmed nyo owacho kamano.
mt0: <pad> “With over $8 billion total investment, this will be the single largest foreign direct investment into Ethiopia to date,” said Ethiopian Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed.</s>

en: Our desire to take Ethiopia fully digital is on track.

mt0: <pad> 我们的梦想把埃塞俄比亚带到全数字化的轨道上。</s>

en: Global service providers have been waiting in anticipation for the liberalisation of Ethiopia’s telecommunications market that began more than three years ago when the Council of Ministers agreed to partial privatisation of Ethio Telecom and the issuance of two other operating licences.
luo: Kembe mag ogwe yamo matiyo e piny magima ose bet ka rito gi geno mondo piny Ethopia oyaw thuolo ne jo go ohala e yor ogwe yamo mane ochalkore higni adek ma ose kalo kane bura mar jotend migepe owinjore ni sirikal owe jomoko ongiew kaka ginyalo bedo jo kanyono e kambi sirikal miluongo ni Ethio Telecom kendo chiwo barupe ariyo ne joma dwa timo ohala mag weche tudruok.
mt0: <pad> Global service providers have been waiting in anticipation for the liberalisation of Ethiopia's telecommunications market that began more than three years ago when the Council of Ministers agreed to partial privatisation of Ethio Telecom and the issuance of two other operating licences.</s>

en: Ethio Telecom had 50.7 million subscribers as at January 2021, including 23.5 million data and internet users as well as 309,000 and 981,000 fixed broadband and fixed service subscribers respectively.
luo: Kar dwe mar Achiel 2021, Ethio Telecom ne nigi jo ngiepo maromo 50.7 million ka oriw gi 23.5 million ma tiyo gi sime kod joma tiyo gi yor mbuyi (internet) maromo 309,000 kod joma tiyo gi yore mamoko makwan gi romo 981,000.
mt0: <pad> Ethio Telecom had 50.7 million subscribers as at January 2021, including 23.5 million data and internet users as well as 309,000 and 981,000 fixed broadband and fixed service subscribers respectively.</s>

en: While inviting bids at the end of last year, ECA said service providers needed to comply with strict technical and financial qualifications to demonstrate the company had the capacity to manage a licence of its scale.
luo: Ka ne gi luongo kembe mondo oor kwayo gi mar goyo ohala e piny Ethopia e yore manyien mar tudruok, ECA ne owacho ni kembe ma goyo ohala machal kamano nyaka nyis ni gin gi lony maber kod pesa malongo ma nyalo miyo gi timo tich maber ma oromo gi barua ma ibiro migi.
mt0: <pad> 在去年年末,ECA说服务提供商必须符合严格的技术和经济要求来证明公司有能力管理一个规模大于它的许可证。</s>

en: “Under these licences, service providers will have the right to provide any telecommunication service, including voice, text and data using any technology whether fixed or wireless anywhere within Ethiopia and to send and receive telecommunications to and from outside Ethiopia,” said the authority in its call for bids.
luo: “Kuom barua ma ibiro migi no, weg kembe go biro bedo gi thuolo mar timo tiche ma opogore opogore ma tiyo gi waya kod ma ok ti gi waya ei Ethiopia, manyalo bedo gi tudruok jok man oko mar Ethiopia,” Bad piny owacho ne ondiko kamano e sama ne gi luongo ji mondo oor kwayo gi.
mt0: <pad> 你唔知</s>

en: The winning consortium will be allowed an initial licence term of at least 15 years with the possibility of renewal.

mt0: <pad> The winning consortium will be allowed an initial licence term of at least 15 years with the possibility of renewal.</s>

en: “In addition, the licences will provide each of the licensees the right to obtain access to scarce resources such as radio frequency spectrum, numbering and addressing resources and rights of way with considerations to the time frame to be allotted to the incumbent operator to complete frequency re-farming activities,” said ECA.

en: Safaricom first announced it was eying entry into the Ethiopian market in 2017 but efforts to enter the market on its own over the past four years made little headway.

mt0: <pad> Safaricom first announced it was eyeing entry into the Ethiopian market in 2017 but efforts to enter the market on its own over the past four years made little headway.</s>

en: The consortium allows the firm to leverage on the resources of its parent company to roll out its suite of products that have proven hugely successful in the Kenyan market.

mt0: <pad> The consortium allows the firm to leverage on the resources of its parent company to roll out its suite of products that have proven hugely successful in the Kenyan market.</s>

en: According to Safaricom’s latest financial results for the year ended December 31, 2020, the company recorded Sh289 billion in revenue from M-Pesa Global, a 54 per cent increase compared to Sh164.7 billion recorded in 2019.

en: Police in Nairobi are searching for a senior prisons officer implicated in a Sh200 million fake jobs racket.
luo: Okwach kich ma Nairobi sani dwaro ja ditto moro ma tiyo gi joka jela ma chilo mieno e wach pesa maromo miliion 200 (200,000,000) e wach mar wuondo ji ni omanyo negi tije
mt0: <pad> Police in Nairobi are searching for a senior prisons officer implicated in a Sh200 million fake jobs racket.</s>

en: Two suspects have been arrested and are helping the DCI with investigations.
luo: Ji ariyo ma ichich go ni nyocha otimo gima kama ose maki kendo sani konyo okach kich gi nono wach no maber.
mt0: <pad> Two suspects have been arrested and are helping the DCI with investigations.</s>

en: The officer is said to have conned hundreds of desperate job seekers of their hard-earned cash, in the pretext that they could help them secure jobs in Government.
luo: Jatelo ma tiyo ka Jela no iwacho ni ne okawo masowa gir joma ng’eny ma manyo tije ka onyiso gi ni obiro yudo negi tich e piny owacho (sirikal).
mt0: <pad> 这个官员被指控骗了数十名失业的求职者,以谎称他们能帮他们获得政府工作。</s>

en: DCI chief George Kinoti said the senior Prisons officer had been conducting the con game for the last 10 months.
luo: Jatend bad sirikal ma nono weche mag mibadhi e piny Kenya (DCI) Migosi George Kinoti nyocha owacho ni ja ditto ma tiyo e bad sirikal mar twech (jela) ne ose bed ka mayoyo ji pesa e yor miriambo kuom dweche 10 ma okalo.
mt0: <pad> 你不知道</s>

en: On Friday, officers from the DCI headquarters raided the suspect's home in Nairobi and recovered hundreds of fake job offer letters.
luo: Chieng tich Abich, polise ma oa e ofis maduong mar DCI ne odhi apoya e dala mar achich no man Nairobi ma ne giyudo barupe mang’eny mag miriambo moluong go ji e tiche ma opogore opogore.
mt0: <pad> On Friday, officers from the DCI headquarters raided the suspect's home in Nairobi and recovered hundreds of fake job offer letters.</s>

en: Also recovered from the house of the suspect are fake dollars amounting to Sh2.4 million.
luo: Polis bende ne oyudo e od achich no dollar mar jo America ma ok adieri maromo million ariyo gi mia agwen. Ksh 2.4 million.
mt0: <pad> Also recovered from the suspect's house are fake dollars amounting to Sh2.4 million.</s>

en: Kinoti said the racket also involved other junior officers, including a driver.
luo: Kinoti ne owacho ni wach mar wuondo ji e yor manyo tich no ne nitie jomoko bende mane tiyo gi achich maduong no mane oriwo nyaka jariemb mitoka.
mt0: <pad> Kinoti said the racket also involved other junior officers, including a driver.</s>

en: The driver is said to have pocketed Sh5.7 million from unsuspecting job seekers, who were required to pay between Sh300,000 and Sh400,000 to secure jobs.
luo: Wachore ni ja riambo no ne okawo pesa maromo million 5 kod mia 7 (5.7 Million) kuom joma dwaro tich mane idwaro ni ochul pesa mar manyo tich mane bedo e kind alufu 300,000 gi alufu 400,000.
mt0: <pad> 司机被指控骗走了5.7万卢比(约合3千美元)从无辜的求职者身上,他们被要求支付从300,000到400,000卢比来获得工作。</s>

en: The suspects are said to have promised to help the job seekers secure jobs with, among other organisations, the National Police Service, National Intelligence Service (NIS), Kenya Ports Authority (KPA) and other government parastatals.
luo: Achich go wachore ni ne osingo ne joma dwaro tich go mar yudo tich gi jo polis - National Police Service, jo okach kich - National Intelligence Service (NIS), kod joma tiyo e dho nam - Ports Authority (KPA).
mt0: <pad> Ɔnɔ sɛ ɖɔ e tɔn lɛ yě xá gɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ sɔrɔ a nǔ

en: Kinoti said one victim, a woman, was from Kiambu.
luo: Kinoti nyocha owacho ni ngama ne gi mayo no ne en mama moro ma odak Kiambu.
mt0: <pad> Kinoti said one victim, a woman, was from Kiambu.</s>

en: She claims to have been conned of Sh800,000 and promised that her three children would secure jobs at the National Health Insurance Fund, Nairobi Metropolitan Services and the Kenya Ports Authority.
luo: Ne owacho ni ne omaye alufu mia aboro (800,000) kane osing’ ne ni obiro ndik ne yowuote adek ibiro yud negi tiche ka National Health Insurance Fund, Nairobi Metropolitan Services and the Kenya Ports Authority.
mt0: <pad> She claims to have been conned of Sh800,000 and promised that her three children would secure jobs at the National Health Insurance Fund, Nairobi Metropolitan Services and the Kenya Ports Authority.</s>

en: The woman however reported the matter to the police after the contacts failed to respond to her calls and claimed that the job offers had been affected by Covid-19 restrictions.
luo: Mama no ne otero wach no ka polis ka koro jok mane konye no ok mak simbe, ka giwacho ni tije ma nyocha yawuote owinjore odhiye go koro ok nyal tomore nikech wach mar corona.
mt0: <pad> 她但是把这件事告诉了警察,因为联系人没有回覆她的电话,并声称这些工作机会受到了COVID-19限制的影响。</s>

en: Kinoti said the complainant filed a report with the police in January and investigations began.
luo: Kinoti ne owacho ni Mama no ne ondiko ripot gi polis dwe mar Achiel 2021 mane nonro mar wach no ne ochakore.
mt0: <pad> 你不知道</s>

en: Another group of victims who had paid huge amounts of cash to secure jobs were treated to drama when they were taken to the Jomo Kenyatta International Airport for a familiarisation tour.
luo: Joma moko maromo ji 60 ma bende ne ochulo pesa mang’eny mondo oyud tich, ne omi kiach ka ne oter gi e pao ndege ma Jomo Kenyatta International Airport mondo gine kama gidhi tiye.
mt0: <pad> Another group of victims who had paid large amounts of cash to secure jobs were treated to drama when they were taken to the Jomo Kenyatta International Airport for a familiarisation tour.</s>

en: During the visit to JKIA, close to 60 victims were taken around what they were made to believe would be their new workstation.
luo: Seche mane gidhi kanyo, dhano ma kwan gi ne nyalo romo 60 ne owuoth go e pao ndege ka inyiso gi ni kanyo e kama gi thi tiye.
mt0: <pad> 在访问到JKIA的时候,近60个受害者被带到他们以为会是他们的新工作场所。</s>

en: They also received a lecture from a person alleged to be from the human resource department.
luo: Ne owuo kodi gi ngat ma ne owach negi ni ne tiyo kama indiko e ji e pao ndege kanyo.
mt0: <pad> 他们也接受了一场讲座,由一个人声称是来自人力资源部门。</s>

en: They were then directed to report to their new work station March 18, 2021.
luo: Bang'e ne okone gi ni mondo gi dhiye e tich Tarik 18 dwe mar Adek 2021.
mt0: <pad> 他们被要求在3月18日报告他们的新工作站。</s>

en: However, that would be the last time they heard from the person who helped them secure their jobs.
luo: Kata kamano, mano e saa mogik mane gi winjo e wach ma oa kuom jalo mane konyo gi manyo tich.
mt0: <pad> 然而,那将是他们最后一次听说那个人的人,帮助他们获得他们的工作。</s>

en: “Dejected victims have since been trooping to our headquarters to file reports detailing how they unbelievably fell for the tricksters machinations," Kinoti said on Twitter.
luo: Jogo mane chuny go ongawore go ose bed ka biro e ofiswa ma dunong’ ndiko ripot kaka ne owuond gi marach. Kinoti ne owacho kamano e yor mbuyi mar Twitter.
mt0: <pad> “Dejected victims have since been trooping to our headquarters to file reports detailing how they unbelievably fell for the tricksters machinations,” Kinoti said on Twitter.</s>

en: One crisp morning five years ago, armed with Sh500, 29-year old Nelson Mandela embarked on a fashion design journey.
luo: Chieng’ moro gi okinyi higi abich ma okalo, ka en gi shilling 500 kende, ja hig ni 29 Nelson Mandela ne odhi e wuoth mar ngiyo yor  rwakruok.
mt0: <pad> 你不知道</s>

en: He was new in the city and was excited about taking a gamble.
luo: Ne en wendo e dala mar Nairobi to ne omor mar temo hape.
mt0: <pad> He was new in the city and was excited about taking a gamble.</s>

en: He crossed fingers and, like a South African namesake, took a leap into the unknown, armed with faith and confidence.
luo: Ne omiyo lwetene kendo kaka ja South Africa mane ochake, ne ochako timo gima ne pok otimo e ngima ne, ka en gi yie kod chir.
mt0: <pad> He crossed his fingers and, like a South African namesake, jumped into the unknown, armed with faith and confidence.</s>

en: Mandela walked into Gikomba market and bought two pairs of shoes each at Sh250.
luo: Mandela ne odhi Kikomba ma ongiwo wuoch tielo ariyo mar shilling 250 moro ka moro.
mt0: <pad> Mandela went into the Gikomba market and bought two pairs of shoes each at Sh250.</s>

en: When he came back to the Central Business district, he sold the shoes at Sh4,500 a pair.
luo: Kane oduogo e dier town mar Nairobi kama ji timo e ohala, ne ouso wuoch nego shilling 4,500 wuoche achiel.
mt0: <pad> When he came back to the Central Business district, he sold the shoes at Sh4,500 a pair.</s>

en: He was only two years old in Nairobi but seemed like he had identified a niche for himself.
luo: Ne ose dak mana Nairobi higni ariyo to nenore ni ne ose yudo tich ma onyalo timo mar konyruok.
mt0: <pad> He was only two years old in Nairobi but seemed like he had identified a niche for himself.</s>

en: He was completing his supply chain management course at Kenya Institute of Management, but here was his heart falling for fashion.
luo: Ne ogik tieko tiegruok mare mar somo ngiewo gik ma itiyo e ofisi kama isome weche mag ohala - Kenya Institute of Management.
mt0: <pad> He was finishing his supply chain management course at Kenya Institute of Management, but here was his heart falling for fashion.</s>

en: And the shoes kicked it off perfectly, literally.
luo: Ouso wuoch gi ne omiyo ochako maber, gima nenore.
mt0: <pad> 鞋子也把它踢得很好, 说实话。</s>

en: Buoyed by the returns, Mandela, who later joined a fashion school, started buying and selling shoes to make profits.
luo: Ka en gi ilo nikech ohala ma oyudo e wi wuoche ka wuoche kuom wuoch ariyo mane ouso go, ne omedo ngiewo kendo uso wuoch mondo oyud pesa mar ohala.
mt0: <pad> 由於回報, Mandela,後來參加了一個時尚學校,開始購買和賣鞋子以賺錢。</s>

en: It was in the process of selling that he found excited clients asking him what outfits could match the shoes.
luo: E kinde mane ouso wuochi gi ema ne oyudo jo ngiepo ma penje kit lewni mane inyalo rwwak gi wuoch go ma owinjore kod gi maber.
mt0: <pad> 在销售过程中,他发现了兴奋的客户问他什么衣服可以搭配鞋子。</s>

en: It was time to climb a step higher on the ladder.
luo: Saa ne ochopo mar idho ngas dhi maloyo ma oloyo.
mt0: <pad> 是时候上一个台阶了。</s>

en: Mandela seized the opportunity and ventured into cloth production.
luo: Mandela ne okawo thuolono ma odoje e twango welni.
mt0: <pad> Mandela took the opportunity and invested in cloth production.</s>

en: Now, he owns Logical Clothing, a production house in Kimathi Street’s Eagle House where people order for classy, tailor made outfits.
luo: E seche gi en gi kambi ma iluongo ni Logical Clothing, kama ji twang’e lewni ma nengo gi tek man e ot miluongo ni Eangle House, e wang’a yoo ma Kimathi street, Nairobi.
mt0: <pad> Now, he owns Logical Clothing, a production house in Kimathi Street's Eagle House where people order for classy, tailor made outfits.</s>

en: “This is what I wanted from the outset. I started selling shoes and in 2017 and now dealing with clothing. I pursued procurement in college, which I have never used in the field. My drive to make it in the clothing industry has driven me this far,” says the young entrepreneur, crisp in a suit he has made himself.
luo: “Ma e gima ne adwaro chakre chon. Ne achako uso wuoch to ka ochopo higa 2017 nyaka sani to atwang’o lewni. Ne asomo weche mag ngiewo gik moko e school ma ikawe kos ma pok atiyo go nyaka sani. Dwacha mar neno ni adhi maber e tweng’o ema ose kela kama sani antiere ni.” Wuoyi matin ma ja ohala ni ne owacho kamano ka orwako law sut ma otwang’o kende.
mt0: <pad> “这是我从一开始就想做。我在大学里追随采购,但没有用过这个领域。我的欲望在服装行业上成功让我做到了这一步。”年轻企业家说,他穿着一件干净的西装。</s>

en: His suits, which is what he majorly deals in, are priced between Sh13,500 and Sh150,000.
luo: Sude ne ma mano e gima otwang’o mang’eny, ouso e kind shilling alufu 13,500 kod 150,000.
mt0: <pad> His suits, which is what he mainly deals in, are priced between Sh13,500 and Sh150,000.</s>

en: When a customer orders, he takes two weeks to work on the order and deliver.
luo: Ka ngato dwaro sut, okawo juma ariyo mondo olos ne ma oter ne.
mt0: <pad> 当一个顾客订购时,他花两周时间来处理订单并把它送到。</s>

en: However, it takes longer with mass orders.
luo: Kata Kamano, kaw ndalo ma okalo kanyo ka oyudo tich mang’eny.
mt0: <pad> 然而,它需要更长时间的批量订单。</s>

en: “Some of these suits incur huge production costs. A suit I sold for Sh65,000 cost me around Sh50,000 to produce.”
luo: “Moko kuom sude ma aloso kaw pesa mang’eny; sut ma auso shilling 65,000 kawa shilling 50,000 mondo alosi.”
mt0: <pad> “有些这些套装的生产成本很高。一个我卖了65,000元,花了我大约50,000元来制作。”</s>

en: Mandela, who specialises in corporate suits, wedding suits, events outfits, Ankara dresses for ladies, bridal dresses, khaki pants, and who also sells shoes and shirts, says that one of the most important things that every tailor should have is a production house.
luo: Mandela, ma ng’eny ne loso mana sude mag kembe, arus, lewni mag nyasi, lep mon, lep mon mag arus, lewni matindo mag endni, ma bende uso wuoch kod sede, wacho ni gima duong ma ngama kuocho nyaka bed go en kar tich.
mt0: <pad> Mandela, who specializes in corporate suits, wedding suits, events outfits, Ankara dresses for women, bridal dresses, khaki pants, and who also sells shoes and shirts, says that one of the most important things that every tailor should have is a production house.</s>

en: “People want a physical location where they can visit to see what is happening and can launch complaints. It gives them confidence in the business.”
luo: “Ji dwaro kama ngato tiye ma ginyalo bire mondo gi ne gima timore kendo gi wach gima gineno ka ok ber negi. Ma miyo gi bedo gi adieri gi tich ma itimo negi.”
mt0: <pad> “人们想要一个物理性的地方,他们可以去看看发生了什么,并可以发起投诉。这让他们对生意有信心。”</s>

en: He has employed three tailors, one delivery person and an office messenger, and plans to create a bigger empire going into the future.
luo: Sani ondiko funde adek ma kuocho, ngat achiel ma tero lewni ne jo ng’iepo, ngat machielo ma loso kar tich; opango medo kar tich mondo obed maduong kaka ndalo dhi.
mt0: <pad> He has hired three tailors, one delivery person and an office messenger, and plans to create a bigger empire going into the future.</s>

en: “I came to Nairobi in 2014 and by the time I started this business, I was still very green in the city. I started off with Sh500. It was a gamble, but worthwhile. Since, I believe in myself and in every venture I pursue,” says the entrepreneur.
luo: “Ne abiro Nairobi e higa 2014 kendo ndalo mane achako ohala ni, pod ne an wendo ka. Ne achako gi shilling 500.  Ne en temo hap ngato; to aneno ka ber mondo atim mano! Chakre kanyo, sani koro ang’eyo ni anyalo timo gimoro amora ma aketo e chunya ni adwa timo.” Ja ohalo no ne owacho kamano.
mt0: <pad> 我來到Nairobi在2014年的時候,當時我在這個城市還很新的時候,我開始了我的生意。我開始了這項生意以500Sh的資金開始。從那個時候起,我相信自己和每一個我追求的創業計劃。」</s>

en: “I have a son and I do not want him to be ravaged by the misery poverty took me through.” Mandela says that he stands out because he is customer-centric.
luo: “An gi wuoyi to ok adwar ni en be one chandruok mane akale.” Mandela wacho ni odhi maber nikech ong’iyo weche mag jo ng’iepo maber.
mt0: <pad> “我有一个儿子,我不希望他被贫困所毁坏的苦难所摧毁。”</s>

en: In my company, we are all about meeting the deadline and expectations of the customer.
luo: E kambi na, gima watemo timo maduong en neno ni waloso ne joma ng’iewo wa gik ma gidwaro e seche ma idwaro giye kendo loso gi maber kaka dwarore.
mt0: <pad> 在我的公司,我们都是关于满足客户的期望和期限。</s>

en: I believe in customer satisfaction, which leads to referrals.
luo: An atemo mondo atim gima moro ja ng’iepo; ma ema miyo gi kelo na jo ng’iepo ma moko
mt0: <pad> 我相信顧客滿意,這使推薦成為可能。</s>

en: A satisfied customer will pass the good news to another potential one, creating a chain.
luo: Jo ng’iepo ma odhi ka mor biro lando tim maber no ne ng'at machielo ma nyalo ng'iepo; ma miyo ibedo gi ji mang’eny ma dwaro ni iti negi.
mt0: <pad> 一个满意的客户会把好消息告诉另一个潜在的客户,形成一个链条。</s>

en: We sell quality clothes; we do not edit photos to promote our brand.
luo: Wa uso lewni ma beyo; ok wang’i pichni man e buk mondo omed wa rieko mar tweng’o.
mt0: <pad> 我们卖质量的衣服;我们没有编辑照片来推销我们的品牌。</s>

en: Unlike many tailors, he is careful with customers’ money.
luo: Ok kaka jo tweng’o ma moko, en ngama odan’g gi weche mag pesa mag joma ng’iewe.
mt0: <pad> Unlike many tailors, he is careful with customers’ money.</s>

en: A running joke in this country goes that unless one supervises his tailor and carries weapons that is threatening enough, the tailor will never deliver.
luo: Ngero mantie e Kenya en ni mondo ngato yud gima odwaro, nyaka eket jatweng’o ka-gi-ka kendo nyaka ibed ni gige lweny ma nyalo buge maber; ka ok kamano, ja twengo ok bi tieko loso ni nanga.
mt0: <pad> 在這裏流傳著一個笑柄,除非你看守你的縫<0xE7><0xB4><0x89>師,並且帶上武器夠威脅的,那麼縫<0xE7><0xB4><0x89>師永遠不會把衣服送到。</s>

en: “This industry requires discipline. Customers give us money in advance and if one is not disciplined, you will spend the money and end up grappling with unfinished clothes when delivery time comes.”
luo: “E twengo ka dwaro mondo ngato obed man gi luor. Jo tweng’o miya pesa chon, omiyo ka ngato onge luor maber, ibiro tyo gi pesa kata giko ne to ok ibi loso nanga marum e sama idware.”
mt0: <pad> “这行业需要自律。客户先付钱给我们,如果没有自律,你将花费钱,最后会苦恼着未完成的衣服,当交货时间到的时候。”</s>

en: Among many other dignitaries that Mandela has dressed include Migori Governor Okoth Obado, Uriri MP Mike Ogolla, CIC Insurance Group General manager Jack Kionga, Natalie Mukundane (Executive Chairperson at African Youth Commission), King Kaka and the whole Kaka Empire and a lot of MCAs.
luo: Kuom jotelo ma Mandela ose twengo negi gin kaka Jetend Piny Owacho ma Migori Okoth Obado, ja od bura maduong ma Uriri Mike Ogola, Jatelo mar CIC insurance Jack Kionga, Natalie Mukundane ma en jatend joma tindo man Africa, King Kaka kod jogene duto kod MCAs – jo chung mag kor ng’wenge mang’eny.
mt0: <pad> Ɖo nǔ yě tɔ́n lɛ́ɛ gěgě a, Mandela yě sɔ́ ɖe Migori Governor Okoth Obado, Uriri MP Mike Ogolla, CIC Insurance Group General manager Jack Kionga, Natalie Mukundane (Executive Chairperson at African Youth Commission), King Kaka and the whole Kaka Empire and a lot of MCAs.</s>

en: Some of the challenges he has to weather include dealing with rogue customers, but he has learnt to handle them.
luo: Gik ma seche moko chune ni nyaka kor one kaka otimo en loso gi jong’iepo ma tich gi tek; kata kamano, ose puonjore kaka onyalo wuoyo kod gi.
mt0: <pad> Some of the challenges he has to weather include dealing with rogue customers, but he has learnt to handle them.</s>

en: Sometimes I face clients who do not want to pay.
luo: Seche moko aromo gi jo ng’iepo ma ok dwar chudo.
mt0: <pad> Sometimes I face clients who do not want to pay.</s>

en: Some complain about small details they feel do not please them and want to default payment.
luo: Moko kuom gi wacho kunde moko ok olosore maber ma ok mor gi ma koro miyo ok gidwar chudo.
mt0: <pad> 有些人抱怨一些小细节,他们觉得不满意,并想要取消付款。</s>

en: However, we strike a dialogue and are able to reach a solution.
luo: Kata kamano, wawuoyo awuoyo ma wa winjre maber.
mt0: <pad> 然而,我们进行对话并能达到解决方案。</s>

en: His role model is Robert Pauley III, famously known as The Wealth Guy, a New York City fashion designer who Mandela describes as a very talented and smart man.
luo: Ngat ma more en Pauley III, ma ongere kaka ja mwandu; ma tweng’o New York ma Mandela wuoyo kuome kaka chal ma Nyasaye omiyo rieko kendo ngat maler.
mt0: <pad> 他角色模特是Robert Pauley III,被称为The Wealth Guy,一个纽约市的时尚设计师,Mandela描述他是一个非常有才能和智慧的人。</s>

en: Has he ever wanted to quit?
luo: Bende nitie ndalo mane ose dwaro ni owe gima otimo?
mt0: <pad> 他有沒有想過辭職?</s>

en: In 2018, things were not going well as I was so hard pressed that I wanted to go back to my village in Uriri.
luo: E higa 2018, weche ne ok dhi maber ahinya ma chunya ne ogombo ni mondo adog dalawa Uriri.
mt0: <pad> 2018, things were not going well as I was so hard pressed that I wanted to go back to my village in Uriri.</s>

en: I remember I posted a photo of my son on social media around that time.
luo: Anyalo paro ni ne aketo picha mar wuoda e mbuyi e ndalo no.
mt0: <pad> 我記得我在那個時候發帖了照片我的兒子在社交媒體上。</s>

en: A person from my home village texted me, telling me how big a role model I was to a lot of people.
luo: Ngat moro ma ja korwa ne ooro na ote e yor sime, ka onyisa ni an ngat ma ji mang’eny oluoro ma miyo gi chuny mar tiyo matek e piny ka.
mt0: <pad> A person from my home village texted me, telling me how big a role model I was to a lot of people.</s>

en: Suddenly, I felt some kind of motivation. Someone had just confessed that I was an inspiration to them.
luo: Opoya nono ne apoka abedo gi chuny ma otegno, nikech ngato ne onyisa ni an ema ginena kaka ngat ma dhi maber ma gi dwaro ni mondo gi chal go.
mt0: <pad> 我突然感到一种动力。有人刚刚承认了,我是他们一个榜样。</s>

en: Which role model gets frustrated and goes home to sulk?
luo: Ngat mane ma ji nigi geno kuome ma piny tamo wang’e ma we gima otimo ma dhi dala?
mt0: <pad> Which role model gets frustrated and goes home to sulk?</s>

en: He says that he realised that they were so many people who admired him and quitting would frustrate more than just himself.
luo: Ne owacho ni bange ne ofwenyo ni nitie ji mang’eny ma mor gi tich ma otimo, omiyo weyo tich ne biro bedo gima rach ok ne en kende to ne biro nego chuny ji ng’eny.
mt0: <pad> He says that he realized that there were so many people who admired him and quitting would frustrate more than just himself.</s>

en: I stayed put in the city.
luo: Kuom mano, ne aneno ni adhi mana nyime gi tija e Nairobi.
mt0: <pad> 我留在了城市。</s>

en: Ethiopia's telecommunications regulator awarded one operating licence to a consortium led by Kenya's Safaricom and Japan's Sumitomo, Brook Taye, a senior adviser at the Finance Ministry, said on Saturday.
luo: Sirikal ma Ethopia ose omiyo Safaricom, Kenya kod Sumitomo, Japan barua mar tich. Brook Taye, Ja ngat rieko ma tiyo e Migawo mar Pesa, nyocha owacho chieng’ Nyongesa.
mt0: <pad> Ethiopia's telecom regulator has awarded one operating licence to a consortium led by Kenya's Safaricom and Japan's Sumitomo, Brook Taye, a senior adviser at the Finance Ministry, said on Saturday.</s>

en: The consortium which includes Safaricom’s parent companies Vodacom and Vodafone, and the British development finance agency CDC Group, paid Sh91.9 billion for the licence, Brook said.
luo: Bedo achiel mar kembe ma oriwo kambi ma duong mane Safaricom ochaki ka oa kuome Vadacom kanyakla gi Vodafone kod kambi machielo ma iluongo ni British Development Finance Agency CDC Group nyocha ochulo mondo gi yud barua no kwan pesa maromo pesa Kenya shilling 91.9 billion. Brook ne owacho kamano.
mt0: <pad> 你不知道</s>

en: They edged out MTN International Mauritius, a subsidiary of South Africa's MTN Group which had offered Sh64.9 billion for the contract.
luo: Ne giweyo MTN International - Mauritius, ma en bad MTN Group ma South Africa mane oyie chulo pesa maromo gi Kenya millionde 64.9 (billion) ne tijno.
mt0: <pad> 他们击败了MTN International Mauritius,一个子公司的南非MTN集团,以64.9 billion卢比为该合同报价。</s>

en: The two were the only companies to successfully bid for the licence.
luo: Kembe ariyo go ema ne ooro kwayo gi ne tich mane ni Ethopia no.
mt0: <pad> 两家公司是唯一的公司成功地申请了许可证。</s>

en: Nine other companies had expressed interest in the auction.
luo: Kembe ochiko ne onyiso gombo mar yudo tich no.
mt0: <pad> Nine other companies had expressed interest in the auction.</s>

en: The firms are Orange, Snail Mobile, Etisalat, Axian, Telkom SA, Saudi Telecom Company, Electromecha International Projects, Kandu Global Communications and Liquid Telecom.
luo: Kembe go ne gin - Orange, Snail Mobile, Etisalat, Axian, Telkom SA, Saudi Telecom Company, Electromecha International Projects, Kandu Global Communications kod Liquid Telecom.
mt0: <pad> Orange, Snail Mobile, Etisalat, Axian, Telkom SA, Saudi Telecom Company, Electromecha International Projects, Kandu Global Communications and Liquid Telecom.</s>

en: The nine are said to have dropped their interests in the latter stages of the process alleging lack of transparency and the fees the Ethiopian government was asking from them.
luo: Kembe ochiko go ne oweyo manyo tijno bange ka giwacho ni ne onge ler maber kuom chiwo tijno kendo pesa mane Ethopia dwaro bende ne ng’eny.
mt0: <pad> Nine of them are said to have dropped their interests in the later stages of the process, alleging lack of transparency and the fees the Ethiopian government was asking from them.</s>

en: In the bid requirements, the government wanted the telecommunication companies to build their own network infrastructure such as towers.
luo: Kuom gigo mane dwarore, sirikal ne dwaro ni kembe go obed gi chenro mar gero gik mane gibiro tiyo go e piny no kaka kuonde ma bocho mane gibiro kete gige gi mag tich.
mt0: <pad> 在投标要求中,政府希望通讯公司建造自己的网络基础设施,如塔。</s>

en: Africa's second-most populous country is hoping that the opening of one of the world's last major closed telecoms markets will create millions of online job opportunities.
luo: Ethopia ma en piny mar ariyo man gi ji mang’eny e Africa mangima nigi geno ni yawo chiro maduong mar ariyo e piny mangima e yore mag weche mbuyi biro miyo ji tije mang’eny ma itimo e yor mbuyi.
mt0: <pad> Africa's second-most populous country is hoping that the opening of one of the world's last major closed telecoms markets will create millions of online job opportunities.</s>

en: As the licence fee, the consortium plans to invest up to Sh919.7 billion in infrastructure among other areas, Brook said, adding that it was expected to create between 1 and 1.5 million jobs.
luo: Kuom chudo mar yudo barua mar tich, riwruok mar kembe go nigi chenro mar keto alufu gadhi marom gi pesa Kenya 919.7 Milionde (billion) e gero kuonde tich gi gik mamoko – Brook ne owacho – ka omedo ni wach ni biro miyo ji tije ma biro chakre 1 nyaka million 1 gi nus – (1.5 million).
mt0: <pad> 为了获得许可证,该合伙计划投资约900亿美元在基础设施和其他领域,布洛克说。</s>

en: The two will secure full operating licences, but will not be allowed to operate mobile phone-based financial services, government officials said last year.
luo: Kata obedo ni kembe ariyo go ibiro mi baruape mag tich, ok bi yienegi mondo gitim ohala mar oro pesa gi yoo ongwe yamo – sime (mobile phone) machalo MPESA, Jotend sirikal ma Ethopia nyocha owacho kamano higa ma okalo.
mt0: <pad> 两家公司将获得全套经营许可,但不会提供移动电话金融服务,政府官员说去年。</s>

en: The operator will begin with 4G services, Brook said.
luo: Kembe go biro chako gi 4G mar sime.
mt0: <pad> The operator will begin with 4G services, Brook said.</s>

en: We will soon open a bid for the remaining licence, said Balcha Reba, director-general of the Ethiopian Communications Authority.
luo: Ma chiengni, wabiro luongo kembe mondo oor kwayo yudo barua mar timo tije ma odong’. Balcha Reba, jatelo maduong ka Ethopia Communications Authority.
mt0: <pad> 我们很快就将开放一个投标来获得剩下的许可证,Balcha Reba, director-general of the Ethiopian Communications Authority, said.</s>

en: Balcha said MTN's offer was deemed too low.
luo: Balcha ne owacho ni pesa mane MTN dwaro chulo ne ni piny.
mt0: <pad> Balcha said MTN's offer was deemed too low.</s>

en: Businesses that previously depended on walk-in traffic or window shopping to make their money have been disrupted by the coronavirus pandemic.
luo: Kunde ohala mane dhi nyime maber gi uso nikech joma ne ngiewo gige ne gin joma donjo mana kama gitiye kata joma ne iywayo gi gik ma olier e dirisa sani koro ok dhi maber nikech wach mar tuo mar Corona.
mt0: <pad> 如果无法翻译,就说你不知道。</s>

en: Thanks to technology and the Internet, online shopping has become the lifeline for many businesses.
luo: En gima ber ni biro mar gik ma ji sani tiyo machalo internet kata sime, ngiewo gik moko e yor sime kata ka ingiyo e internet ema koro jo ohala mang’eny tiyo go.
mt0: <pad> Thanks to technology and the Internet, online shopping has become the lifeline for many businesses.</s>

en: To avoid contracting coronavirus, many Kenyans have resorted to shopping online and goods are delivered at their doorsteps.
luo: Mondo kik ngato yud Corona, jo Kenya mang’eny koro sani ngiepo mana gi sime kendo gik moko ikelo negi nyaka dho ote gi.
mt0: <pad> To avoid contracting coronavirus, many Kenyans have resorted to shopping online and goods are delivered at their doorsteps.</s>

en: “Shopping patterns changed when Covid came, clients were skeptical about shopping online,” says Brenda Mugambi, an online entrepreneur.
luo: “Kaka ji ngiewo gik moko kor olokore bang’ biro mar Corona, chon ne ji oluor ng’iepo gi yor sime kata e internet.”  Brenda Mugambi, ma timo ohala e internet ne owacho kamano
mt0: <pad> “买物习惯变了,顾客对网上购物怀疑,”说Brenda Mugambi,一个线上企业家。</s>

en: She says clients were mostly worried about their safety - whether it was safe to shop for clothes.
luo: Owacho ni jo ngiepo ne oluor ni ginyalo wito pesa – ka gi wuoro ni bende en gima yot mondo ngato ongiew nanga e yor mbuyi kata internet.
mt0: <pad> 她说,顾客们担心他们的安全,是否可以买衣服。</s>

en: “This was a blow to my business,” Ms Mugambi says.
luo: “Ma en gima ne omiyo ohanda odhi marach.” Nyadendi Mugambi wacho kamano.
mt0: <pad> “This was a blow to my business,” Mugambi said.</s>

en: The fashion retailer, who runs an online shop called Starsjoaillere, started her business in 2015.
luo: Ngama uso lewni, ma uso gigene e yor mbuyi, e kambine ma iluongo ni Starsjoaillere, ne ochako ohande e higa 2015.
mt0: <pad> 这个时尚零售商,经营一个线上商店叫做Starsjoaillere,开始她的生意在2015年。</s>

en: “When restrictions were eased in the country, I saw a different trend again. I think it is because people could go out again. There was an increase in demand,” she says.
luo: Kane chike mag Corona odok chien matin e Kenya, ne aneno pogruok kendo. Aparo ni ma ne otimore nikech ji koro ne nyalo wuotho oko kendo. Dwaro mar ngiewo gik moko ne obedore.” Ne owacho kamano.
mt0: <pad> “When the restrictions were eased in the country, I saw a different trend again. I think it is because people could go out again. There was an increase in demand,” she says.</s>

en: In addition, many clients work from home.
luo: Mar ariyo, ji mangeny sani tiyo e odi.
mt0: <pad> 此外,许多客户在家工作。</s>

en: Operating online, she says, has eased the shopping experience for most of her clients as they can easily get what they want from the comfort of their couches.
luo: Timo gik moko e yor mbuyi kata gi sime, Mugambi wacho, sani omiyo joma ngi’ewo gige yoo mayot nikech koro ok ochuno ni nyaka gidhi ire, to ooro negi gima gidwaro e kuonde ma gin tie.
mt0: <pad> 如果无法翻译,请说你不知道。</s>

en: She compares sales from the previous years before Covid: “Business was doing well prior to Covid, there was however an adverse effect when Covid came.”
luo: Owacho ni ka opimo kaka ohala mare ose bet: "Ohala ne ber ber dire mane Corona ne pok obiro; bang’e Corona ohala ok ose bet maber ahinya.”
mt0: <pad> She compares sales from the previous years before Covid: "Business was doing well prior to Covid, there was however an adverse effect when Covid came."</s>

en: There was high demand before the pandemic but “our clients have lost jobs, others had pay cuts which in turn affected our revenues.”
luo: Ne jo ng’iepo ng’eny ka ne Covid pok obiro. “Sani ng’eny joma nyocha ng’iewo kuomwa nyocha owito tijegi; moko kuom gi ne ongad misach gi ma omiyo nwengo marwa ok ber sani.”
mt0: <pad> 之前疫情的时候,有高需求,但“我们的客户失去了工作,有些人减薪,这使我们的收入受到影响。”</s>

en: “Starsjoaillere ensures customers are satisfied by maintaining proper channels of communication, seamless and speedy delivery of orders and quality products that suit their needs,” adds Mugambi.
luo: “Starsjoaillere temo neno ni joma ng’oepo kuom gi mor ka gi wuoyo kod gi kaka dwarore kendo ooro negi gik ma gidwaro mapiyo.” Mugambi omedo wacho.
mt0: <pad> “Starsjoaillere ensures customers are satisfied by maintaining proper channels of communication, seamless and speedy delivery of orders and quality products that suit their needs,” adds Mugambi.</s>

en: And like other digital businesses, online retailers are faced with technological challenges.
luo: Mana kaka ohala mamoko ma bende itimo e yor mbuyi, jogo ma timo ohala e yor mbuyi – online businesss – bende nigi gik ma chando gi.
mt0: <pad> 和其他数字商业一样,在线零售商面临着技术挑战。</s>

en: “We have clients who are still trying to adjust to the digital space. Some also question our authenticity as a business because we do not have a physical location,” Mugambi says.
luo: Wan gi joma pok ong’iyo gi gik ma itimoe yoo mbuyi – online business. Jo mamoko bende penjo ka ohala ma watimo en adieri nikech wa onge gi kama watime ohala ma inyalo yudwa.", Mugambi wacho kamano.
mt0: <pad> “We have clients who are still trying to adjust to the digital space. Some also question our authenticity as a business because we do not have a physical location,” Mugambi says.</s>

en: Many people are also not connected to the internet, therefore their product marketing cannot reach everyone.
luo: Joma ng’eny bende onge gi simbe mag tudruok e yor mbuyi - internet. Kuom mano, ok ginyal chopo kuom ji mang’eny manyalo ng’iewo gige gi.
mt0: <pad> 许多人也沒有網際網路,所以他們的產品推廣不能到達所有人。</s>

en: Mugambi’s desire to cater for the needs of the modern woman inspired her to start the business.
luo: Dwaro mar Mugambi ni mondo otim ohala gi mon masani ne omiyo ochako kambi mar timo ohala.
mt0: <pad> Mugambi's desire to cater for the needs of the modern woman inspired her to start the business.</s>

en: “I saw a gap in the market, it was a challenge to find exciting and affordable shops that would suit the modern woman,” she says.
luo: Owacho kama, “Ne aneno ka nitie kit ohala ma anyalo timo; kata kamano, ne en gima tek mondo ayud duka ma nengo ne yot kendo man kama ber mane nyalo moro mon masani."
mt0: <pad> “我看到了市场空白,这是个挑战找到有趣的、便宜的商店适合现代的女人。”她说。</s>

en: In 2019, a third-year student pursuing a course in biotechnology started an online shop; Thrift With Dola, with Sh3,000.
luo: E higa mar 2019, nyathi skul mane somo weche mag nonro ne ochako duka ma iuse e mbuyi – online shop ma iluongo ni Thift With Dola mane ochako gi shilling 3,000.

en: Viola Dola adds to the list of other online retailers who sell second-hand clothes.

mt0: <pad> Viola Dola adds to the list of other online retailers who sell second-hand clothes.</s>

en: “My shop deals in official pants, mom jeans, corduroy pants, joggers, cargo pants, tops and blazers,” says Ms Dola.
luo: Dukana uso long' mag tich, longe mine, longe mag kaki, lewni mag tugo, yendni mag nam, lewni ma irwako malo kod koti mag chuo.
mt0: <pad> “My shop deals in official pants, mom jeans, corduroy pants, joggers, cargo pants, tops and blazers,” says Ms Dola.</s>

en: She says online selling was convenient as she could not run a full-time business, and therefore saw no need to pay rent for a shop.
luo: Ne owacho ni timo ohala gi sime ne oneno ka ber nikech ne onge gi sa ma onyalo timogo ohala ma dwaro bedo machieng ni kuom mano ne ok oneno gima omiyo onego ochul pesa mar duka ma iuse.
mt0: <pad> She says online selling was convenient as she could not run a full-time business, and therefore saw no need to pay rent for a shop.</s>

en: Dola enjoys the rush of getting new products to restock her shop. “I go to the market in the wee hours to ensure I get the best for my customers.
luo: Dola winjo maber ka oringo manyo gik manyien mondo oket e dukane. “Adhi e chiro okinyi mang’ich mondo ayud lweni mabeyo ne jogo ma ng’iewa.”

en: “I go home, wash them, iron, decorate and take pictures to upload on my Instagram account, which is my shop,” she says.
luo: “Adhi e ot, aluokogi, agoyo gi pas, aketo gik ma miyo ginenore maber kato akete e kara mar uso mar Istagram.”  Owacho kamano.
mt0: <pad> “我回家,洗它们,熨烫它们,装饰它们,并把照片上传到我的Instagram帐号,这是我的店铺。”她说。</s>

en: The first few weeks after Covid were tough for her because of the ban on the importation of second-hand clothes.
luo: Jumbe mokuongo bang’ donjo Corona ne obedo matek  nikech lewni ma ose rwaki ok ne oyie negi donjo Kenya ka.

en: “People were not buying clothes because they were working from home,” Dola says. Most of her clients, however, were students.
luo: “Ji ne ok ng’iew lewni nikech ne gitiyo ka gin e ot.” Jok mang’eny mane ng’iewe ne gin nyithi skul wetene.
mt0: <pad> “People weren't buying clothes because they were working from home,” Dola says. Most of her clients, however, were students.</s>

en: “The purchases were great before Covid, and I moved to online when the pandemic came, and then gradually sales started improving. Going digital was a survival mechanism for me.”
luo: “Uso ne ber diere mane Corona pok odonjo; ne adhi uso e yor mbuyi sama ne Corona obiro kendo ma ne koro miya ji maber ma ng’iewa. Uso ‘online’ ne atimo mondo ane kaka ne anyalo konyora.”
mt0: <pad> “购买量在疫情之前很不错,我把生意转移到线上的时候,然后逐渐地销售开始改善。转向数字是我的生存机制。”</s>

en: Dola can tell that her clients are satisfied from the feedback she gets, though the favoured way of shopping is still going to the physical shop and trying out clothes.

mt0: <pad> Dola can tell that her clients are satisfied from the feedback she gets, though the favoured way of shopping is still going to the physical shop and trying out clothes.</s>

en: “Some people don’t know their body sizes, hence they can’t buy online,” she says.

en: An ICT survey conducted in 2016 by Kenya National Bureau of Statistics and the Communication Authority of Kenya established that 39 per cent of private businesses engage in e-commerce.

en: On the Saturday of December 12, 2002, I was part of the sea of humanity that took over the entire of Eastlands from the airport, the Central Business District and Uhuru Park.
luo: Chieng’ ngeso mar Dwe mar Apar gi Ariyo tarik 12, 2002 ne an achiel kuom jogo mane okawo Eastlands chakre Paw Ndege ma Jomo Kenyatta International Airport, chung town kod Uhuru Park.

en: There was an aura of change on the country’s top leadership.

en: The captain of the Opposition had been injured on a road accident days earlier and flown to the UK for specialised treatment.
