en: And he was returning home for the ballot that would end the 40-year-era of the independence party.
luo: Kendo ne oduogo dala mar goyo kura mane biro tieko higni 40 ma riwruok mar siasa mane okelo loch e Kenya ose tiyo go.
mt0: <pad> He was returning home for the ballot that would end the 40-year-era of the independence party.</s>

en: At that time, nobody worried much that the captain was injured because around him was a robust team.
luo: E seche go, onge ngama ne chunye otho ni jatend joma pinge ne ohinyore nikech ne nitie jogo mane tiyo kode mane loso yore duto.
mt0: <pad> 那时,没有人担心队长受伤,因为他周围有一个强大的团队。</s>

en: The climax of the day was a chaotic rally at Uhuru Park late into the evening.
luo: Gima duong’ chieng’ no en romo mane ji dhi bedogo Ohuru Park go odhiambo.
mt0: <pad> The climax of the day was a chaotic rally at Uhuru Park late into the evening.</s>

en: The import of my discussion today is from the speech of the then vice captain, the late Michael Kijana Wamalwa.
luo: Gima omiyo andiko en gima ne jalup jotend jo opposition ma ose nindo Wamwala Kijana owacho chieng’ no.
mt0: <pad> The import of my discussion today is from the speech of the then vice captain, the late Michael Kijana Wamalwa.</s>

en: In his wisdom, he had captured the essence of the moment with these words: “For a great leader to realise his greatness, he must stand on the shoulders of other great leaders.”
luo: Ka ne owuoyo, ne owacho weche gi: “Mondo jatelo ma lich lich ne onenre, nyaka ochung’ kuom goke jowete” ma nyiso ni nyaka konye gi jo-wetene.
mt0: <pad> 在他的智慧中,他把这个时刻的精髓抓到了这些话: "一个伟大的领导人要实现他的伟大,他必须站在其他伟大的领导人的肩膀上。"</s>

en: This statement sums ups the workings of an economic system. The economic growth that we measure under the Gross Domestic Product (GDP) is a sum total of several independent variables interacting under the directive of top leadership in the country.
luo: Wach ni owuoyo kuom kaka nwengo piny chalo. Dongruok mar yuto mar piny ma iluongo ni Gross Domestic Product (GDP) en gima nyiso kaka gik moko itimo e piny e bwo jotelo mogik e piny.
mt0: <pad> 这句话总结了经济系统的工作原理。经济成长我们测量在总国内生产总值 (GDP)上是总和多个独立的变量相互作用,它们被领导着最高领导层在国家里。</s>

en: Extractive political institutions destroy the genius of economic forces to organise the national endowments, talents and the reward system to generate the desired economic outcomes.
luo: Siasa ma rach ketho gik mangeny e piny ma nyalo miyo piny bed gi dongruok maber.
mt0: <pad> 你不知道</s>

en: In the eyes of the late Wamalwa, for an economy to redistribute the national wealth equitably, then policy and political leaders must not only focus on the parts of the economy but also their interactions as a whole.
luo: Kuom kaka Wamalwa ne neno, mondo yuto mar piny oke e piny maromre, mano dwarore ni chike ma oketi kod jotend siasa nyaka ng’i kuonde ma kelo mwandu ne piny kendo kaka gi romo mondo gi kony piny.
mt0: <pad> 在老Wamelwa的眼中,一个经济要公平地分配国家财富,那么政策和政治领导者应该不仅仅关注部分的经济,而是他们之间的互动。</s>

en: In the current regime, big infrastructure projects have been highlighted as the pillars of President Uhuru Kenyatta’s legacy.
luo: E sirikal ma sani tiyo, gigo ma oger ma dongo dongo machalo wang’ yore ema iwacho ni e gik madongo ma Piny Owacho otimo ma ibiro par go tich mar Ker Uhuru Kenyatta.
mt0: <pad> 在现在的政府中,大型基础设施项目被强调为基石总统乌胡鲁肯亚特的遗产。</s>

en: Unfortunately, a legacy is not something that you can do projects towards, but the outcome of several daily activities happening across all government sections and departments.
luo: Kuom hawi marach, gima ngato otimo ma inyal pare go ka ose weyo tich ok en gero gik moko to en gima ji neno ni otimore e bede sirikal ma opogore opogore.
mt0: <pad> 遗产不是可以做项目来实现的,而是一系列每天都发生的活动遍及所有政府部门和部门。</s>

en: Empirical evidence on economic development identify investments in physical capital, human capital, technological progress, natural resources and property rights, and political stability as drivers of economic growth.
luo: Gik ma nyiso dongruok mar piny nenore e dongruok mar gik ma oger, somo mar dhano, gik manyien ma sani itiyo go, mwandu ma nie loo, neno ni jopiny nigi duol kuom mwandu gi; kod neno ni piny okwe e yor siasa e gik ma miyo piny bedo gi dongruok kor ka yuto mare.
mt0: <pad> Empirical evidence on economic development identifies investment in physical capital, human capital, technological progress, natural resources and property rights, and political stability as the drivers of economic growth.</s>

en: On the other hand, government consumption spending, political and social instability, trade barriers and socialism reduce economic growth.
luo: Kamachielo, pesa ma Piny Owacho tiyo e chulo gik ma ok kel bedruok kaka misara kod marupu ma imiyo jotich, siasa marach kod tungni mar piny, gik ma miyo ohala ok nyal timore maber kod keto ni gik moko duto gin mwandu mar jopiny miyo piny ok nyal dongre maber.
mt0: <pad> 另一方面,政府的消费支出,政治和社会的不稳定性,贸易障碍和社会主义主义降低了经济的发展。</s>

en: If these are the drivers and inhibitors of growth, how then do we appraise the preoccupation with the legacy projects?
luo: Ka magi e gik ma miyo piny dongore kendo nyalo tamo piny dongruok, ere kaka wanyalo keto e ratili mar pim, wach ma sani ji osiko ka wacho ni gedo mar wanga yore ema ibiro paro go jatelo ma tiyo sani ka oweyo tich?
mt0: <pad> 如果这些是驱动和抑制增长的因素,那么我们如何评价对遗产项目进行关注?</s>

en: All sectors matter individually and collectively.
luo: Migepe duto dwarore ahinya kar gi kendgi kendo kanyakla.
mt0: <pad> 所有部门都重要,个人和团体。</s>

en: Investments in physical capital include machinery, tools and building that enhance workers productivity.
luo: Dongruok e gik ma igero oriwo masinde, gik ma itiyo go mag lwedo kod gedo mar udi ema miyo jotich medo tiyo matek.
mt0: <pad> 投资在物理性资本包括机器、工具和建筑,使工人的生产力提高。</s>

en: It is unacceptable that the economy is heavily reliant of subsistence farming using equipment of the agrarian era.
luo: Ok en gima nenore maber ni dongruok mar piny otenore mana e yor pur mar chiemo ma sani pod itimo gi gik machon ma nyaka nene!
mt0: <pad> 不可以接受,经济高度依赖于自给农业,使用农耕时代设备。</s>

en: This implies that the country has failed to leverage on modern productive capacities to exploit her labour force.
luo: Ma nyiso ni pinywa ok nyal tiyo gi gik ma sani mana mondo mi gi hiny kata gichand jotich.
mt0: <pad> This implies that the country has failed to leverage on modern productive capacities to exploit its labour force.</s>

en: Human capital refers to the combination of education, health and other non-physical assets of the nation’s workers to enhance their productivity.
luo: Sama sirkal kwano dhano kaka mwandu, gikwano gik ma ng'atno nigo monyalo tiyogo e kelo dongruok ne piny. Gigo oriwo sombe, ngima mar dende, kod nyalo mamoko ma en go ma ok nenre gioko.
mt0: <pad> Human capital refers to the combination of education, health and other non-physical assets of the nation’s workers to enhance their productivity.</s>

en: Relevant education that impacts economic growth is both formal and informal.
luo: Somo manyalo konyo e dongruok e yore yuto mag piny oriwo somo mar skul, kod puonjruok ma ng'ato yudo oko mar skul.
mt0: <pad> Relevant education that impacts economic growth is both formal and informal.</s>
